body: Fidelity had the best financial app in the App Store. Clean  simple  easy to use.  Why did you have to completely rewrite it?  This is not an improvement.

title: New Update
body: Like it better then the last version.

title: Wow what an update!
body: A completely different experience using the app after the update. Very easy navigation and has now become my number one source for market news! Great job Fidelity!

title: Excellent
body: The new app is superior to its predecessor in just about every way.  Navigation is much improved and the overall interface is great both functionally and aesthetically.  As always  there a few review trolls bashing the app and a few reviewers lamenting the lack of some arcane feature; but  this app covers the most ground for the most people beautifully.

title: Hurry up  and wait!
body: You should have stopped while you were ahead! All the hype and anticipation over the upgrade  and we now have a slow  plodding app. Please bring back its predecessor. Please! 1/4 ???? for pretty. Note that you can't send this review without at least 1 star! 1/4 star!

title: Good Update...
body: Good update so far. Would like to make custom notifications for daily portfolio changes.

title: Awful upgrade!
body: I use this app to trade stocks and to track my holdings. I don't use it to read news. The screens in the old version were compact and contained more information. The new positions screen is unusable in portrait mode and requires more effort (swiping in all directions) to see less usable info. Too much white space and too many columns. If Fidelity's intent was to generate more redirected clicks on affiliated financial news services  they have succeeded. Otherwise  massive failure.

title: Too Glitzy
body: The 3.0 version of the Fidelity app is ridiculously over produced and designed. All I want to do is see how much money is in my retirement account  not be entertained by custom transitions. My time is valuable to me and I don't want to spend my time scrolling around.   It is nice that they've gotten rid of the hamburger menu in exchange for a tab bar.

title: Great
body: I really like the new format. The news feeds are great as well.

title: 5 stars
body: Excellent update!!

title: You guys rock!
body: Great update. The app just keeps getting better and better. Easy on the eyes. Convenient. Easy to use. You must've worked overtime on this one. Thanks!

title: Awesome app!
body: Great app!

title: Pretty underwhelming update
body: UI is very clunky  font sizes are too large which forces you to use landscape mode even on a 6s plus  the "feed" doesn't provide useful information  etc. Wish I had the ability to downgrade to prior version.

title: Great new update
body: I am a millennial entrepreneur and I'm enjoying the new update fidelity has created  letting user customize news feeds with relevant topics.

title: Great Improvements
body: If your looking for a great financial app look no further than Fidelity. What a great improvement to any already great app!

title: Awful
body: Too much scrolling. Too cluttered. Too many photos. Too Yahooish.  Losers and gainers charts are now ridiculous flip files that require  yep  more scrolling. Just a bad update for me. I miss the simpler app.

title: Bad
body: After the update  font cannot be changed  meaning you can only see 5 - 6 individual stocks at once  and you can only see three columns under your current holdings  which are symbol  quantity and last price.  All the important things are hidden because of the size of font.  This is extremely inconvenient.  Get the original one back.   Also  the platform is very complicated after the change.  Fidelity needs to learn from all the successful companies by adopting "simplicity." Such as Apple Airbnb or Uber.  Make things simple and easy to read.... Totally failed and I'm very disappointed after the update.  Service is still good though.

title: Redesigned UI is dumber than a homemade radio.
body: Boo!  The new UI is atrocious! The city background zooming in and out makes me hear the "Twilight Zone" theme in my head. You had the UI right with your last version - just needed a few big fixes. Roll back the older  more intuitive UI. Can your developnent team please hire UX people ASAP?

title: Hate the Updated Version!
body: Not sure why they updated a very good app to this! Looks like an amateur wrote this. Bring back the old version!

title: Fidelity is the best!
body: There is a reason why I consolidated everything with Fidelity. Read the title...

title: Fidelity update
body: All my news on one app now. So much better! Now they need to send me all winners each day too ????

title: Beautiful app!
body: Fidelity knocked it out of the ballpark with the new update-the old version was good but could use improvements and Fidelity delivered with the update. The customization is amazing and the news and analysis are beautifully rendered  all in all a solid app that is up-to-date with latest tech. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

title: Two Features Please
body: The new application is very nice  but it still doesn’t have the two most important features I’ve been asking for recently in these reviews.  Please consider these for the next update:  First request: Please allow two account login profiles to log in to the app via Touch ID. Currently only one person may log in under their login profile  but when a second person later tries to log in under their separate login profile  it isn’t initialized for Touch ID  so they must re-type their password and re-setup Touch ID.  Then with the first person returns  same problem  they have to reinitialize Touch ID again  which defeats the purpose of the quickness of Touch ID and delays placing trades at critical moments.  Need to be able to toggle back and forth between two Touch IDs without having to keep re-entering passwords every time please.  Second request: Please display the “limited margin” balances for IRAs in the app.l as is done on the full webpage. This is a critical piece of information that is missing for mobile users. Currently the app only displays cash balances  not the full detailed balances that include the “limited margin” balances such as limited margin credit  intraday  and overnight.  This would be more in the keeping of the spirit of the new app to have the balances displayed the same way they are on the full webpage.

title: Version 3.0 is a fail
body: How did they take an already bad app and make it worse?    New app takes even longer to load on my 6s than previous version. The animations of balances are unnecessary.  The developers should get a Schwab account  download the app  and take notes.

title: New update is legit!
body: No other investment app can touch this for design and functionality. Well done  Fidelity!

title: Great improvement over a great app!
body: Love the new interface but the only thing is it is a little slow to start on my iPhone 6. Also is there a shortcut to my cash management account activity?

title: Love new improvements! My fave app!
body: Fidelity already had an amazing app for me to check my positions  but they have certainly outdone themselves with the newly improved app!! I love having the ability to do research on companies and have the ability to view charts and graphs. I love it!!

title: Winning
body: The update is a winner like the customization feature tailored too your personal preference ????

title: Overall good  some details need to fix
body: I've been using Fidelity for years and I'm glad to see its getting better and better in all aspects. This update makes chart more convenient and clear  layout is efficient. One tiny bug I'd like to point out is on chart section  I can't see the most recent day info(high low last etc. )

title: Horrible
body: Wow...  I don't understand why the old app had to change. I feel that the new version is a disorganized mess (visually and otherwise). It's incredibly difficult to locate information that was I was once able to identify quickly. The "cards" muddle up an already confusing and visually unappealing interface.   I wish I hadn't upgraded. This is a mess.  Fire your UX designer. This is atrocious.

title: Should have left well enough alone
body: Well  Fidelity managed to gee whiz the usefulness right out of their mobile app. What was once relatively clean  quick  and easy to work with is now slow  involves extra steps  and is totally annoying. What's the matter with apps that just work and make life easy  especially financial apps? Who needs fancy graphics  photos and additional menu steps that slow things down? I just want to get to my business in the quickest possible manner  without having to navigate through some web designer's wet dream ????

title: Fidelity App
body: Love it!

title: Social benchmarks are awesome
body: I love the redesign and social benchmarks.

title: Very cool!
body: Love the opening screen and I like the learning's that you cAn use.  Every thing is more personalized.  The feature for depositing checks seems much more user friendly.  I LIKE IT!!

title: Nice update
body: I really like the update!

title: I must say  I like it.
body: The new look is pleasing to the eye and the setup is easy to navigate.  It's a very fluid experience that seems well thought out.  Well done.

title: New app is amazing!
body: I love the Feed!

title: What bank?
body: I love fidelity  its website and this app. Bank?  What bank?  I don't need no stinking bank!  Do everything you need and more through Fidelity.

title: does not work on iphone 4s
body: installs on 4s but does not allow login. get message "account information unavailable. Error getting account information. Please try to login again."  Does this error message mean the fidelity server does not recognize iphone 4s?

title: Allows basic trading
body: Wish this app would show me lots per position and quickly let me sell them right from there. Also  re-unlocking using Touch ID would be a great feature addition.

title: Love this app  although
body: Revised 5/18/16: please stop messaging me about Apple Pay. It should appear only once  not every time you login. Fix and you'll be back to 5 stars  This app has made me a customer for life!  Especially with the check photo deposit.    Recommend adding a feature to see my Fidelity Amex credit card account.

title: Was this tested?
body: Development & testing in China and India?  Come on Fidelity - you should be ashamed & embarrassed.

title: Quick Access Balance Rarely Works
body: It's frustrating to tap the quick access button to see my balance without logging in and almost every time the app says it is unable to load the content and to try again. Why have this option if it never works?!

title: Quick Access
body: Great app once I'm signed in. But the Quick Access function only works once or twice after app is downloaded. This is a very convenient feature which should be fixed.

title: Fidelity
body: Easy app to use.

title: Elegant Interface/Packed with Functionality
body: 10 year long Fidelity customer and now this app is my go to access point. I appreciate the thought put into the design that allows so much to be done in so little real estate!

title: Log in log in log in
body: Quick access never works.  Have to log in just to check the market.  Let me decide how secure I want my apps!

title: Horrible For Apple Watch
body: This app routinely fails to update/refresh the info displayed on the Apple Watch.  The app is an exercise in frustration to use.

title: One of the worst
body: Terrible mobile app. It might as well not exist since you have to go to the full site to basically do anything with your account other than seeing a balance. They should be ashamed of themselves for producing an app like this for an organization like Fidelity.

title: Quote search app crashes
body: Please fix   app crashes and it is very annoying  when searching quote.

title: No more real time quote when not sign in
body: This new version does not have real time stock quote  when you are not login. Even though I already set it up as the app feature  that offers real time quote when not sign in. Please fix asap  thanks.

title: Real time quotes bug
body: 30 day Real time quotes bug.   Not working on iPhone 6

title: No order status  delayed quotes
body: I have used 2 apps from other brokerages for trading purposes. Fidelity's app is by far the worst of these 3. There are no order status  which also means I can't modify the trade on the app after it has been placed. And the quote provided me on the app was almost 20minutes delayed!   I'm also disappointed that the detailed charts do not provide more technical analysis such as the stochastics and bollinger bands.   Overall this app  for the purpose of trading  is very limiting. Please make this app better!!

title: Can't deposit a check
body: The mobile check deposit feature is nice in theory  but whoever is in charge of programming it should be fired. I get error messages far more often than confirmation messages. My favorite is when the app tells me that the check was not filled out completely when it's blatantly obvious that it was. Please fix ASAP.

title: Ok
body: The app would be much better if it went straight to your log in page

title: Automatic Check Photo Technology Fails
body: The Mitek auto check photo taking technology fails more often than it works. I would rate you much higher if you got rid of it. I'm tired of blurry check deposit photos that I have to retake many times.

title: Great app
body: This is the best app in the industry! Hands down

title: Good for Basic Account Information
body: The app is fine for a quick check of my portfolio at the end of the trading day. I have had sketchy results with various other parts of the app so I rely on my computer to do any serious portfolio business. Also  every rep I have talked with has been outstanding. I call them my human app!

title: Touch ID doesn't work
body: I have been locked out of my accounts because Touch ID isn't working.

title: Just went blank
body: I just tried to deposit a check  but the screen went black when I took the photo and it won't change.

title: Lacks some basic things
body: Doesn't allow you to add a bank account. You'll need to go to the website for that.  Doesn't reset IRA contributions limit when funds don't go through. It still thinks I contributed even though the funds weren't transferred.

title: Great app
body: I've had this app for about 2 years  use it at least weekly and never had any major problems. I love how easy it is for me to contribute to my retirement account through this

title: Detailed.. Smart.. Alright..
body: The Fidelity financial app keeps track of all your account information in a nice and neat application powered by Touch-ID. I like it and use it all the time to check on my cash and investment accounts. The UI could be better but does the job. CHECK IT OUT!

title: Enhances Fidelity experience
body: Love the fingerprint touch ID sign in feature. Use the check deposit feature routinely. Great to check balances and daily performance. Great app for these basic functions.

title: Love it
body: Honestly it's one of my most used and most useful apps. It's really well designed and simple. Please don't change it

title: Battery drainer
body: Didn't even use the app  drained my battery in the background from 100-50 in 20 minutes

title: Could use some improvements
body: The app is stable and works well  but is lacking features some of their competitors have. It would be nice to be able to see my accounts or total balance in a chart form with customizable time tables.

title: Charts are missing for mutual funds
body: I used to like this app  but I am no longer able to view charts for my Fidelity mutual funds in the app. I used to see the charts for these funds when I viewed a quote for these funds  but now the charts are gone since I did a recent app update.  I still get charts on stocks and markets  why don't I see charts for mutual funds?

title: Logs you out after each close
body: Worst designed app on my phone. Seems to log me out after every close. Why do they think I have this app? To check the market? There are litterally 100 apps out there that are better for this. Take this app off the App Store. It is basically false advertising.

title: Where's my money?
body: Tried on my IPhone 6 Plus to transfer money from my account into my checking. No way to do it  customer service has no answer and the IT department is clueless. Only way is to go into a computer and process. Their newest update has not fixed it. Just hope you are not in an area that you can only use your phone to transfer money.

title: Sloppy
body: Look at USAA app for some inspiration.  Yours is sloppy and always down for maintenance.

title: Doesn't work
body: It was great until about a month ago. Can't even log in anymore. I can log in just fine from my browser  it has nothing to do with my password. The app simply won't work.

title: Fidelity app is great
body: I really like this app it does what I need it to do. There are always improvements that could be made but I find this app indispensable

title: Fix quick look and I'll be happy
body: See title

title: Very nicely done
body: This is a really great app for me  so easy to use  especially when compared to several other banking apps I've used in the past. Admittedly  I don't engage in frequent trading  but when I do it certainly isn't letting me down  very user-friendly. Good customization of the home screen  accounts are easy to quick check  and the fingerprint login is a big plus for me. An app that had all of the functionality of their website would surely be prohibitively unwieldy  but I think this is a really good handheld offering with more than just the essential functions. The only thing I would like to see added is check image viewing within the app. I still have to get on the computer to see those. Overall  great job.

title: Poor Features
body: The information pertinent to my account is poor. The layout and content is insufficient to make a quick decision about the status of my portfolio. There is irrelevant information displayed. The format is not as useful as some other free apps. The features are not as useful as what is included in their other platforms. They missed the mark when defining what should be displayed and how to display it.

title: Ironically...
body: Ironically  I was in the process of depositing a check when the screen went black and the app froze  and then up came a pop up asking me to rate the Fidelity app. Might want to fix this guys. So I had to quit and re-log-on which is a pain because I use a complex password. I like the app overall and like the free Bloomberg live TV for sure  as I don't pay for cable. I wish there was a way to force the check photo to focus.

title: App issues
body: I have been experiencing app issues for the past week and a half. The app was working fine until about two weeks ago and ever since then  I have had so many issues trying to login to my account and depositing checks. I would not recommend this app as it is very difficult to even contact the app support section.   The app is no longer useable and I want to know why. This is very inconvenient for me to deal with this

title: Major problem
body: I've updated to iOS 9.2 and I have a "push notifications error" in the fidelity app that I cannot dismiss.   All notifications are enabled; I have checked my settings.    So present  the Fidelity app is not usable once I've logged in.    Please fix! ASAP

title: Needs improvement especially widget ????
body: Recent updates leave me disappointed with the app  and are related to the widget. First  the watchlist doesn't stay selected in the widget. Second  and most importantly  I noticed that using the widget is sucking the life out of the battery. This started with the latest update. I checked this by looking at how much Fidelity was using of the Battery in the Settings  both with the Fidelity widget on and off. These need to be fixed asap.  Update 3/5/16: Battery issue fixed(thank goodness!). Unfortunately  the widget still keeps losing the watchlist I select. Am I the only person having this problem? It's REALLY annoying having to keep selecting my watchlist  when I just want to quickly look at it. ????????????????????????????

title: Awesome
body: This app is definitely a must have!!!! I love everything about it it always works properly. I looooooooooooove it!!!

title: long delayed updates
body: Price updates are frequently delayed over 10 minutes  messed up my trading several times. Someone got to get the bottom of this  it is frustrating.

title: Good application
body: Provides good information.  I like the finger print password access. Easy to read.

title: Great app  high level of functionality
body: Anybody who doesn't love this app clearly had not used another brokerage. It has almost full functionality as Fidelity's website and is quick and smooth with rarely any glitches. Good work!  Now if only they'd stop charging $8 per trade...

title: Great App
body: Really good app. Use it daily to track the market and my accounts.

title: Can't log in
body: Have to use safari and go to fidelity.com to log in. The app says it does not recognize the username and password.

title: OK App
body: End of day results are not available until late evening. Mid day updates don't appear to be accurate.

title: Excellent for stock trading  research features could use some work
body: One of the "must have" apps on my iPhone. Fingerprint login makes for super quick login  orders are flying out with very low latency. Good overview of my portfolio and daily/overall performance. Not a very good implementation of stock watch lists though and research functionality in general could use work. For my needs though  this app is more than sufficient  I use other apps to fill in the gaps. I use it nearly every day.

title: Perfect for simple portfolio tracking
body: Just what I wanted to be able to track my portfolio throughout the day! Thanks  Fidelity!

title: Busted
body: App will not allow me to login. It says that my info doesn't meet security requirements and I need to make updates on a desktop. I've updated my User ID and changed my password to "very good" status. Still  the app will not allow me to login.

title: Poor international markets across
body: Doesn't handle international trades. Prompts me to write a review  giving me no option to opt out of writing a review  only letting me choose  "Maybe later."

title: A Fantastic App!
body: Excellent layout  functionality  and easy to use! I'm not sure what all the bad reviews are about? I feel like it must just be all the "anti-Fidelity" folks.

title: Just a basic investment app
body: There's absolutely nowhere on the app to do research on any mutual funds or etf's. If you don't know the symbol don't bother. They don't even promote their own funds let alone any other funds. No selection on categories or any help. I just use Vanguard and forget this weak app. You would think that they would want to guid investors to their own shop of funds. Go figure.

title: What happen to the graphs
body: Why are there no more historical charts?

title: Don't bother
body: Horrible app  crashes all the time and that's if you can even log in with their dumb as hell security bullsh!t. Don't bother with this company or app.

title: One of my "must-have" apps on all my devices.
body: I love how easy it is to access the app now with fingerprint authentication. Depositing checks is easier with auto-imaging. Love the info and insights available. One of my most-used apps.

title: Best Personal Finance / Investing App
body: Banking and investing with Fidelity is made very easy with this mobile app.    We transferred all our banking and investment accounts from a competitor for a couple reasons  but this mobile app was a big part of the decision.    Easy to see everything going on with all our accounts. Bill pay takes seconds to send.  Very functional.

title: When......
body: When will you be adding the Debit Card to ApplePay?

title: Good solid app
body: Lots of features I like on iPhone version: touch login  landscape mode in portfolio view  well-thought trade notifications.  Taking one star for the lack of "Options Summary" equivalent off the main site  fortunately nowadays mobile site does not attempt to hide it  but would be nice to have in app one day...

title: GREAT App for Investment Info
body: World class information. Easy to use platform. Quick execution of trades. Overall  a must have for people serious about investing for the future!

title: Needs major improvement
body: I would forget this app and just use the Fidelity web site

title: Great app
body: I use it everyday to monitor my accounts and occasionally trade.  Solid navigation and relevant information.  I especially like the notes capability.  I prefer the mobile app to the web site.

title: Good app
body: No complaints about the app. Use it daily and works great for my purposes.

title: Excellent App
body: Really outstanding app!

title: Great App
body: Only suggestion is when placing order to sell or buy using limit order the price is not updating live or there is no option to refreshing the page and get current market price.  For sure it is a great app well done Fidelity!!!

title: Great APP
body: Easy to use and most informative!

title: Works as designed
body: I use this app to check my 401(K) accounts.  I especially like the Touch ID feature for login into this app on an iPhone.

title: Well done  easy to use
body: This app gives me all the information I need with convenient access.

title: Been great for me.
body: Excellent.

title: Good app  but no credit card accounts
body: I like the app  but if you have a credit card through Fidelity  you have to use the website. 5 stars if they can add credit card accounts to the app.

title: Good App
body: This app is good  but would like to see a little more historical performance information on current holdings.

title: Love this App
body: Literally use this app everyday.  Real time price triggers and the ability to trade on the go has made life less stressful!  I also have the watch and the ability to check on portfolio at a glance is awesome!  For some reason the volume doesn't work for the Streaming news on my 6s+.... Never usually look at it though.  Other than that I recommend it to anyone with a fidelity account.

title: iPhone App OK  iPad App Useless
body: Sadly you have to write a single review for two different Apps.   The iPhone App has most but not all of the data that you would find on the more useful Fidelity Web pages.   The iPad App is pretty but dumb.   It is great if you want to see Fidelity Ads  but pretty useless if you want an efficient way to see you positions and to investigate your holdings more thoroughly.    If I were rating the iPhone App alone I would give this three stars  but the iPad App brings it down to two (the average of one and three).

title: Best Investment App
body: This is the best app I've used for my investments and accounts. I'm able to access all of my accounts from here. It makes trading easy and it has so many useful features. This is highly recommended.

title: App is garbage
body: Constant errors and force closings. A mentally ill chimpanzee on acid could make a better working app.

title: Come on Fidelity
body: I only wish I could have been able to update the app  it kept trying to download and only sign that would appear "WAITING" I would give it a much higher rating  before the update it was working great; fix the issues Fidelity many including myself might come back.

title: Solid app
body: Easy to use  great design.

title: Great iPhone investment tool
body: I have been using the Tool to check my balance  stocks price and performance. Also the app connect me directly to fidelity advisor when I am logged into my account. Very helpful. Thank you.

title: Disappointed....
body: App is useful  but why do I have to have a brokerage account to be able to see my balance on Apple Watch? Shouldn't be a problem to allow me to see my 401k balance also.

title: You get what you need
body: While it's missing some features from the full site  I find that it's got what I need. I especially like the recent addition of viewing watch lists without a sign in. I appreciate the touch login as well. On my iPhone 5s I haven't experienced the problems others have described.

title: Great when not crashing
body: Great when it works. Crashes a lot. Like all the info I get from it.

title: Does not complete update - fix please
body: Does not complete update - fix please

title: Version 2.11 will not install
body: Version 2.11 will not install. Remove it from the App Store  please.

title: Lots of information missing
body: The full website has way more info than the app  especially if you have a Fidelity credit card.

title: Latest Update
body: Does not show mobile site. Not letting me sign in with my fingerprint on Iphone 6 plus.  Displays actual net benefits site.

title: Latest Version Not Downloadable
body: The App doesn't complete the download and can't delete to start from scratch.  Please fix!

title: Useful and well laid out  with frequent updates
body: I actually use the app more than the site now. Very handy for checking my investments  and the frequent updates have quickly fixed bugs and continue to add new functionality.

title: Data Unavailable more often than not
body: Rarely get info from this site. Always some kind of error.

title: Very Convenient
body: Very convenient. Be sure you have a good fast wireless connection or the log-in screen might not load.

title: Please fire your app developer
body: This is the only app where Touch ID almost never works as expected  causing my account to get blocked and I have to find a laptop to change my password. Such a disappointment that the most basic functionality  like logging into my account  doesn't work most of the time!!

title: App crash
body: Open new trade screen -> put app in background-> resume app -> app crashes

title: Mutual fund list
body: I love this app but the mutual fund list irritates me because the names of the mutual funds are only listed as: "Fidelity Select..." In other words  I can't see the real names of the funds.

title: Use this App all the time!
body: Couldn't be easier to transfer money to my bank card from fidelity...love this App!

title: Great app
body: Very good app overall  and it keeps getting better with their ongoing improvements.  One suggestion though.  When I deposit checks using the phone it asks me to select an account  but I have only one that accepts deposits  so there's only one choice on the "wheel".  In cases like that  it would be better if the app just realized that and skipped that step  automatically selecting the only account available.  Thanks.

title: Fantastic App
body: I love how easy this app makes trading my account. Logging in is a sap using the fingerprint reader. The app is fast and simple to navigate. Keep up the good work Fidelity.

title: Really Great App
body: Really great app does everything you would need to do with a great interface. The only problem that I have is the last update broke the notification Center widget  the watchlist resets after while and you need to select which watchlist to display again.

title: ARGH!!
body: Love this app...but all of a sudden I can't pay bills?!?!  This is the main thing I use it for. ????????

title: Unreliable access
body: It is frequently the case that Touch ID fails and after Entering your valid use user name password your account is blocked. This problem only occurs with Fidelity. Please fix will report back on progress.

title: Doesn't work
body: Since the last update on December 15th it no longer recognizes my username and/or password. I can log in to the full website  but the iPhone app doesn't work!

title: Great update
body: Improvements to check deposit make it so much easier to take the pictures of the check and upload it.

title: Massive Battery Use
body: I have had issues with watchlist in Today Widget for a while but only recently has Fidelity started draining 70%+ of my battery. Today by 4Pm I was at 18% remaining with 80% of the last day coming from Fidelity. Please fix! Otherwise a very useful well designed app

title: Easy to use
body: Thanks for the app!

title: Always improving!
body: The support for Apple Watch balance is awesome! I would love 3D Touch. Keep up the great work!

title: Good but could use an enhancement
body: The credit card portion of the app should be enhanced to include list of charges for the current billing period plus notifications option for charges over a certain dollar amount.

title: Ugh
body: This app has an alerts error that has interrupted logging in for months.  Despite uninstalling and reinstalling and regardless of updates.

title: Today widget not working  drain battery
body: Today widget not working  drain battery since update  Uses >50 % of battery. No content in today widget.

title: Keeps getting better
body: I love the Apple Watch support. I use multiple bank/investment apps  and this is my favorite.

title: Great improvements
body: The app keeps getting better and better. Clear they're listening to customers

title: Great app.  New Balance feature is awesome!
body: Does everything I need it to!

title: Numbers don't add up.
body: Numbers don't add up. Previous price in positions obviously is not close price !! Stock on up day shows a negative gain!!

title: Love this!!!
body: Awesome app I love seeing how much I earn and checking balances in my account etc it's the best

title: New not always better.  Camera still bad
body: I quit using the old app as I had a deposit accepted via iPhone then five days later fidelity says the image isn't good and I need to drive to a branch to deposit the check.  Not wasting an hour.    So now they have a "New" app with a better camera.  Not so. After holding the camera over the front of the check for 15 seconds the app says the image isn't good  take a manual picture.  Same issue on back of check. Overall process takes too long.

title: Excellent
body: Very easy to use  gives a quick glance summary to the portfolio  easy to transact and deposit checks  etc. There are a few more complex transactions  like stock option exercise  that it doesn't do. But those more complex transactions probably don't make much sense for a mobile interface  so fine with hitting the web for them.

title: Doesn't Work
body: Very simply  it doesn't work. I logged in and saw my account information once and haven't been able to again. I can log in to the website and see everything no problem at all; it is not an issue with my username or password. Moreover  there is no (readily evident) way to contact Fidelity from the app outside of calling them. QA required. Zero stars.

title: Mobile check deposit does not work
body: Mobile check deposit does not work

title: Easy to use app !
body: This app is just so nice to use. All of my portfolio management activities I do is done through this app. I have my bank instructions set in the system so that in the case of wanting to transfer money to the brokerage account  it can be done in 2 minutes literally. Trading  looking up positions  quotes  research  navigation  etc  all just flawless. No brokerage firm is perfect  but I can tell Fidelity puts in the effort to do right to its clients.

title: User
body: Super App. Does everything!!!

title: Great app!  One of my favorites!
body: I use this app almost every day. I have placed trades  buy and sell orders as well as reviewed profits and losses.  I've only made one deposit by check but had no problem with that either. Overall I think this is an extremely simple  intuitive and effective app.  I rarely go to the website because I can do almost everything that I need on this app. In addition to the terrific Customer Service Fidelity does a great job all around!

title: Crashes in log in
body: I was very much looking forward to using this app on my  iPhone 6s  but after attempting to log into the app  it crashes.  Maybe it's not configured for ios9?

title: Great app!
body: I love this app. It does just about everything I could ask for. Quick navigation to the key information.

title: A great app
body: This is a great app which we use every day to check our investment performance.

title: Error messages
body: Login error upon touch login on iPhone 6 with latest iOS for a few weeks now and Alerts error after that which has been happening for months now. Fix it please?  Other than that  the app seems a bit over engineered  but ok.

title: Practical  simple to use  fast
body: By far this is the best app amongst the institutions I do business with. I personally like the new UI a bit better Wish list: 1) transactions for the Fidelity AmEx card; 2) logout on terminate (as opposed to terminating and then 10-15 min later getting a logout notification)

title: Touch ID disabled after restart
body: It states 'Touch ID disabled after restart' even though I haven't restarted.

title: App battery drain issue
body: This issue need to be fix! This app uses 70% off my battery when it not even in use or background running is turned off.

title: Check Deposit worse with update
body: The app was working fine (apart from not being able to reattempt a deposit) but now the deposit function takes a lot longer with the new automated camera feature. It can’t seem to be able to get a good photo of the back of checks and you have to wait for it before you can just do it manually. It gets pretty annoying when you have a lot of checks to deposit.

title: Crap customer service
body: They  blocked me just because I told them to close my account.

title: Thanks...
body: Update broke touch ID login. Come on!

title: Works well
body: I haven't tried to do absolutely everything on the app  the for basic things it certainly works really well!

title: Great update  but navigation is confusing.
body: Good app overall  though BillPay is long overdue for a rewrite and the integration with the FIA Amex card is pretty lame--but this probably isn't the app's fault since integration with FIA is lame on fidelity.com as well.

title: Mobile Deposit Not Working
body: I have tried at least 10 times to deposit a check and each time the error says cannot read bottom of check when I can clearly see it.  I've tried along the bottom line  above and below and none of them work.

title: Bad UX  cluttered design  spammy alerts
body: This is a feature-packed app that lets you access most of the functionality of the website of you are patient  industrious  and have a high threshold for UX pain.  But that's not what most of us need. We need quick access to basic functionality: 401k balances  gains to date  transaction history.  Minors annoyances like inconsistent authentication path (choose Touch ID  still get bugged for password)  and spammy alerts (no problem connecting to notifications--I disabled them for this app) make using the app genuinely unpleasant.

title: Disappointing
body: This app used to be pretty good  but then the check deposit option stopped working. It hasn't worked in months. Not sure why it is impossible for fidelity to fix this issue.

title: Login fail
body: I can't log in the app closes when I try to put user ID in. Reinstall and still doesn't work.

title: No function to view CC transactions!
body: Terrible app. There is no function to view credit card transactions  which is probably the most basic and critical credit card app function.

title: Third party keyboard crash
body: crashes with a third party keyboard.  Doesn't even let me log in...

title: Love it!
body: I love the thumbprint sign in functionality and the automatic photo taken with check deposits.

title: keeps crashing
body: The app crashes 9 out of 10 times when I click on the box to enter my login credentials. If I pass the username password page then it crashes on the 2FA page. IOS 9 iphone 6s

title: Cannot handle more than 1 username
body: This application cannot handle more than one user name. It will automatically default to second one once used and will not let you go back to original user. It does not matter whether you try to save the username or not and whether you selected from the drop-down or not. Every time you enter a password it will default to the second username once chosen and say that your information is incorrect.

title: Ugh
body: Please fix this app!!! It's actually not even an app anymore  it looks like a web page trapped in an app!!! So annoying!!!

title: Saving money?
body: My only thought is that they are trying to save money. This is a terrible app  and I say that  being a loyal and satisfied Fidelity customer of many years. Crashes constantly  won't allow me to use bill pay or deposit checks  etc.

title: Amazing
body: This is the most amazing app I have ever used!!!  Way better than Flappy Bird and Clash of Clans combined.   The only drawback is that it continuously asks me to rate it.

title: Good but could use tweaks
body: I like the Touch ID integration. However  it should use iCloud Keychain. I also keep getting errors about not being able to connect to alerts.

title: Works great for me
body: Does everything I need to do on the go.

title: Can't login
body: iPhone 6s. Tapping in the username field crashes the app! Come on Fidelity  surely you can do better.

title: Great app
body: This app has everything I need. Long time Fidelity customer and never had a single issue!

title: Great app!
body: The functionality is really streamlined now.

title: Mobile check deposit works!
body: 99% of the time  I use this on my iPhone 4s to deposit checks. It works great now!

title: And I'm supposed to trust my money to this?
body: I can't really tell because the app doesn't work.  I wanted to test the check deposit  but nada.  It couldn't get an image of my check and it went to a manual photo option. My check is a light color and I had it against a light background  so thought I'd try a dark background. When I hit "cancel" the app froze with a completely black screen.  When I exited the app and went back  the screen was still all black. So I rebooted the phone  and logged out of the app for a clean start. But now I can't select an account for my deposit.

title: It works perfectly fine
body: Anyone complaining about the app is likely not a tech savvy user. The app works perfectly. Ignore all bad reviews.

title: Fix the obvious...
body: For months  the message at login has been "There was a problem connecting to alerts".  When you try to shut off alerts in settings...they aren't available. Turn it off already!

title: Nothing I can't do!
body: Great app. Don't understand why it doesn't have a higher rating. I can do literally everything I want from here  always easy to use  and never crashes. No complaints.

title: Love the Touch ID
body: I really like the app.  This isn’t the only bank that I use  but this app is the nicest.  The well known stagecoach bank doesn’t allow “Touch ID” which is a great feature!  I also read some of the other reviews  and I can’t speak to the issues that these people have had  but I’ve not had a single issue with logging in on either the app or the website.

title: Easy and functional
body: I use this app almost every day and I like it a lot. It has most functionalities of the full PC version and yes it's simple to use.

title: Horrible and unusable at all
body: Can't even login  keeps showing that it does not meet security standards and tells me to login on desktop. what's the reason? What's the standards? How to fix it  why is it appearing? Nothing!! I regretted opening an account there cox this kind of support and tech level represents the company and this is a joke. Whoever built this or account for this app should be fired instantly

title: Mobile Check Deposit NEVER Works
body: Mobile Check Deposit NEVER Works!!! Super frustrating. Need to fix this ASAP

title: Not good enough
body: Can't believe fidelity ask its customer to use this.

title: Doesn't work with iCloud Keychain
body: Was trying to set a strong password for account  kept getting warned that not strong enough or rejected for other reasons (wasn't clear what wrong except some tries too long). Went ahead and accepted an iCloud Keychain and works okay for website  but not enabled to work with fidelity app. Had to go thru resetting password again manually to make one up that works with both app and website.

title: They need to fix the amount field
body: When entering the cost of a stock in dollars and cents the keyboard switches from numeric back to alphanumeric after each number you enter requiring you to have to reselect the numeric keyboard for each digit...C'mon Fidelity fix this

title: Freezes
body: On 5s freezes and closes when depositing checks.

title: Good Brokerage App
body: This app works very well for accessing my Fidelity brokerage account and for conducting transactions.  What's missing is Fidelity's Portfolio Analysis features such as sector and style allocations.  These are only available through the website.

title: Great app
body: Love the Touch ID login. Easy to deposit checks. Very few bugs

title: Amazing App!
body: I can do almost anything from this app. It has a clean interface and is really intuitive. Love that I don't have to go to that browser to make trades or check dividends.

title: Total crap
body: Freezes and then closed when  trying to put my user name in. Everytime even after I re installed

title: Charts iPhone 6s
body: Charts are only partially interactive. You cannot expand as wide as with iPhone 5s. Also no crosshairs.

title: Love this app!
body: I almost gave a 4 instead of a 5 because we cannot do everything from this app  we need to log on to the web to continue. But I love this app  I can research  trade  contact and most of what I need to do on a daily basis. I never have any problems  no freezes or any other clitches of any type  works flawlessly. Great app  great company  great people. Been buying  selling  cashing out  communicating on phone (mainly)  and person to person at the local office since 1998 and they have all been good times. Even with the bad times in the market  they were better than others  that's why I switched all my accounts here  and had my wife start 2 different accounts here. We tell all our friends about Fidelity  and even when you need to withdraw  not one negative reaction  just sound advice and great service! Thank you Fidelity!

title: limited  very limited
body: this app shows basic account balance information only.  (beautiful layout and functioning secure fingerprint login is great)  without account data  history  transaction registry  transfer funds  and realtime connective to accont (which it's not); then this is just an annoying app draining my phone battery.

title: Login bugs
body: Since the last update  touch login has stopped working. It will ask for touch and then go to a password entry. This app is okay for checking my 401k but they could learn a thing or two from the Charles Schwab app which is much more useful.

title: Love it
body: Fidelity has yet to disappoint me  including with (most versions of) this app.

title: Touch ID Needed
body: Need touch to login

title: Love the app - but sucking battery life
body: In recent weeks I've noticed my iPhone battery dramatically decreasing  and the battery utility shows its due to the Fidelity app  primarily background operations. I had to delete the app - now I have normal battery life. Strange!

title: Login fail
body: Tried and failed to log in several times with what I KNOW is my fidelity login and password(as it works on my computer). Useless app.

title: Perfect
body: Thanks for this great App ????

title: Buggy..
body: Full of bugs. Claims to work on Apple Watch but can not even install itself on the watch.

title: Glitchy
body: Numerous glitches. No new features please. Just make it work.

title: Everything I need
body: Easily accepts check deposits and easily allows me to quickly trade.

title: Touch ID
body: I love the app for quick access to my account. However  my Touch ID has stopped working recently. It works fine for other apps. Hop they fix this soon.

title: Does everything I need pretty well
body: There are a ton of transactions possible in this app and they do them pretty darn well. I think Fidelity has a pretty decent app

title: Best banking app
body: This is easily the best banking app I've ever used. Keep it up.

title: Could be Improved
body: At least it should provide a mean to check 'order status' easily. It also can improve more for investors.

title: Difficult to navigate
body: I want to like this app... But it is incredibly hard to find the information I want. It should be easier to see how my portfolio is performing on a daily  monthly and year to date basis. But unfortunately this app is not user friendly at all. I almost wonder if they make it difficult to navigate on purpose.

title: Latest release breaks "paste password" on login page
body: I use a password manager to store long passwords in a secure manner. In the past I was able to copy my fidelity password from the password manager and paste  it into the fidelity app. That ability to paste is now broken. Please fix asap as otherwise I will have to try to remember my password and type it in directly  which will be less secure.

title: Credit card transactions?
body: It seems strange that in order for me to see my Fidelity Investment Rewards credit card transactions I have to open the Mint application. Fidelity...please add this basic feature!!!

title: Comprehensive App
body: I don't do a lot of trading. This app provides a comprehensive view of my account and it's sufficient for what I need.

title: Alert number doesn't go away
body: I use this app mainly to deposit checks and it works fine. However there is now a small white numeral on a red background indicating an update that won't go away. It's very annoying. Update 9/4/15 The number went away and I was just about to write a rave review but when I clicked I write a review on the App Store the darn thing hung up and won't stop. Hmm better hold that review until it is fixed!

title: Good app. Needs chat functionality
body: Good app overall. Needs to integrate chat functionality and also allow for longer timeout period. But overall a good app. Just not quite as good and intuitive as TD Ameritrade's.

title: Fit for Purpose
body: Does what I need to keep an eye on my investments.  I'm not a day trader so can't comment but for my needs  it's great.

title: Add Full View... Please
body: Recent optimization for the iPhone 6Plus is a very welcome update. But please  please  add Full View to the mobile app!!!

title: No complaints
body: App works well  provides easy access to all my accounts  easy to trade  easy to deposit checks  easy to see details.  App is regularly updated and improved. I rarely use the website anymore.

title: Love Fidelity
body: Power to read your accounts  make trades  get real time data. Loyal customer since high school (1984).

title: Really like it
body: Better than all my other banking apps

title: Where do I start?....
body: I guess i will start and finish just with what works. You can see your balances  you can see the market. Nothing else works...

title: Good app
body: Works well  supports TouchID.

title: Can't change scheduled bill pay
body: Don't update to latest version! Doesn't let me make changes to or delete scheduled bill payments. Was working before.

title: So many things wrong
body: There are so many things wrong with this app. First  when you open it  it doesn't even take you to the sign in page so you immediately have to navigate to it yourself. Positions don't update frequently at all. To sign in you have to type out the long password that fidelity requires  no passcode like scottrade offers. When you place a trade  the current price does not update at all. A lot of features are hard to find  the app is not intuitive  and it feels like it wasn't developed by a smart person. Really  just a lot of things wrong here; it feels like a very rough draft  yet isn't.

title: Love Fidelity  love the app
body: I've been a customer for over two years and I love this company. They have excellent customer service and are incredibly knowledgeable. The app is really easy to use and a go to for me.

title: This is one amazing application!
body: The support on this app is amazing. I greatly appreciate if anything ever does go wrong the voice support helps right away and making it right. This application runs flawlessly and is exceptional and accuracy.

title: Needs more functionality
body: Can't view pension balance. Can't view loan balance. Can't change or view contribution amount. Clearly misses.

title: One major problem
body: Cash available needs to be more accurate. I have been trading more frequently and have had my account put on 90 days settled cash suspension for selling shares using money that hasn't settled yet. Cash available to trade means cash available to trade. No warning when I set up the limit order to sell. Still doesn't tell me I have the restriction on the app or on email. Got it in the mail today. FIX IT!

title: Touch ID quit working
body: I like the app for checking daily movements of my retirement accounts but lately the Touch ID for login never works.  I reinstalled the app and no solution.  It's like it won't recognize the function anymore.  Other than that I like it.

title: Columns missing
body: Gains/loss since purchase column is missing. Fix it.

title: Good app
body: I've had no issues with this app  it's presented well and makes it easy to manage accounts.

title: Volume
body: Thanks for organizing the volume numbers together. Much better than scrolling up and down in previous versions.

title: Could use improvements
body: Can't transfer funds electronically via wire transfer as you can on the desktop site

title: Fidelity Ap for iPhone
body: This app is very inconsistent  seldom do I use it without problems. simple things like trying to sell a stock. I highly recommend nobody use it. It will only frustrate you. I'm going to remove it. Fidelity has no easy mobile solution. Very disappointed!

title: Transfers
body: Please add ability to transfer from Fidelity to my bank. Feature available only through home computer. I conduct most of my transactions away from home.

title: Current version is worse than previous.
body: Watch list is broken. What kind of QA testing do they do before releasing new version?

title: Watch lists broken with the new version
body: Columns are now missing even if they are checked. Can't display gain/loss since purchase anymore for example. It still shows as a column to be selected for display. But it's ignored.

title: Columns
body: There is a problem with this new version. It does not show 4 columns in the watch list  and it crashes here & then. The four columns that for unknown reason do not show are G/L  amount and % since purchase and the 90 day volume. I want these columns back.

title: Crap
body: Can't log in...

title: Great app
body: Thanks!

title: Improved
body: But the watch list can't on the order same as trade pro.

title: User
body: G/L SINCE PURCHASEcolumn got disappeared on this version.

title: Where is FIA credit card management???
body: Till you don't add the functionality of tracking cr card transactions  alerts on use  balance payment - no stars for you  lazy business!

title: Was great  but now its pretty useless
body: This was a great mobile app  but recently i have continual login issues(requires 2 attempts) and i no longer have a nice mobile setup to see my account.  After i log in i see what appears to be mobile site like set up u can not expand or minimize the screen.  Used to be so easy to login and check your balance  but it has been ruined.

title: Gets the job done  but less functional than website
body: This app works for most items  but you still need to go to the website for more information and functionality. I would give it 5 stars if I could do absolutely everything through the app that I can do on the website  without having to use the website in tandem with the app. A complete app would be very impressive and even more convenient. There is room for improvement and given the steady additions to the app  I think things are heading in a good direction.

title: Utterly sucktastical
body: The touch ID implementation is a joke. A joke. I hate that my employer uses these people for our 401k.

title: Widget
body: Mother widget is great BUT between the red and green backgrounds and the small text data is very hard to read. The only widget I have this problem with. Please use the built-in dynamic text sizing. Huskerbjr

title: Ver. 2.8 is now "state of the art" for investors!
body: Just checked my stocks today on my App  and was preparing to log on to the Fidelity web site for Analysts opinion using Starmine ratings  when lo and behold  much of the website info is now located on my App! Thank you Guys!...you listened to your clients! 2 years ago you added the dividend info  now this great new App...5 Stars*****

title: Latest version broke my watch list
body: A new column "Equity Summary Score" appeared on my watch list with the latest update. Another column I had there before to show gain/loss since purchase isn't displaying. If I try to edit columns and remove the new one  the app crashes.

title: Alerts do not work
body: I've tried giving this app a chance  but it's awful. My alerts haven't worked for more than a month. The history is a joke. Please fix!

title: More left to do
body: Slow to refresh. Occasional crash. Ugly layout. Slow to respond.

title: Mrs
body: I am so impressed with the fidelity app! I use it everyday.

title: Great but still needs NEWS
body: Finally got fingerprint login  great. But how come there is never any news for any tickers I look up?!  Cmon Fidelity.  If I see news feeds on the full site  i want to be able to see them in the app.

title: Solid app but I want more
body: The app makes trading across multiple accounts fairly easy. I really like that it uses touch ID as a login.  I wish the stock list synced with the list in Apple's stock app sends that app actually has a widget. To be honest I wish all stock apps would sync to the same list. It would also be nice to have some way to see my performance over the year besides just looking at the dollar amount since a lot of people add money which makes for trickier math when trying to figure out the rate of return.

title: Much Better
body: Last update made checking my account much quicker. Would like better news  still use other sites for that.

title: Touch ID needs work
body: Thank you for updating the app for iPhone 6/6+ and adding Touch ID.   BUT - the app requires occasional manual login  with no rhyme or reason. It says it only requires after a restart  but that's not true. Take the stupid requirement away!

title: Deposit
body: Can't deposit my checks because every time I try to take the picture the app crops and blurs the image.

title: Payment
body: The "pay bills" screen never loads. Kind of frustrating.

title: Won't let me log in
body: I restarted my phone and it asks me to manually login vs using touch ID. The problem is that when I try to enter my password it says that typing cannot be undone. I tried erasing the text but it gets stuck in a loop. I cannot access the app at this point.

title: Bad bad bad
body: PLEASE HAVE SOME WAY TO TURN THE NOTIFICATION PROMPT OFF EVERY TIME YOU LOG IN. SO ANNOYING.

title: Pathetic!!!!
body: One of the worst  if not the the worst  trading apps on iTunes. You offer the most basic functions compared to other Brokers and even then you fail to properly configure the app so that it doesn't crash and freeze every time you try to look something up. It's really pathetic that you can't even provide a decent app experience. The charts show basic price charts  whereas on TD you can load up to 5 different indicators to make educated trading decisions. I now have to use TD app to look up the charts cuz you simply don't offer them. I absolutely regret switching to Fidelity as you obviously don't take retail investors like myself very seriously. Pathetic!!!!

title: Check deposit feature bad
body: Tried to use the check deposit feature but every time the app would take the picture  it would be blurry.

title: Great Application
body: Updates are slow in coming but overall satisfactory. Easy and secure that's the main thing.

title: Great App
body: Excited to see Fidelity add support for the iPhone 6 and I love using Touch ID to log in. Great job!

title: My favorite app
body: I can't explain how much I love this. Fidelity is awesome.

title: Convenient  now Hi-Res
body: Very nice to be able to check your balances on the go. This update is HUGE! Now 6 plus looks how it should  not some 3x pixel scaling like it was previously.

title: Recent search behaves very odd
body: Recent quote search behaves very oddly. It will not show the selected quote.

title: Great App
body: Great app. It has improved over time. Good work developers!

title: Finally optimized for iPhone 6/6 Plus
body: it took a while but the App is finally optimized for iPhone 6/6 Plus devices. Thank You Fidelity.

title: Optimized resolution!
body: Finally

title: Terrible
body: Gets worse with each upgrade. Just make it all work again.

title: Getting there but can't cut slack for all commissions that I pay
body: App has improved significantly over years but pace of innovation is not matching efficiency with which Fidelity deducts commissions from my account.  Fidelity is late to game for Mobile-first solutions for retail-working-day traders.  For example  app now has option info but placing a multi-leg option trade could be better done on a slate by a goat than your app. IMPROVE IT!!  Option Pairing - options are treated as individual security with no tie in whatsoever to other legs or underlying long or short stock position. I can know whether leg 1 has increased or decreased x% but practically useless for multi-leg options.  Alerts - alerts work but they could be easily set and refreshed (especially ones which are price-triggered as opposed to EMA or MA)  I can write about few other defects but let's first get these fixed !!  Also  under which rock from  do you guys develop these apps? Curious to know.  Quite a frustrating experience to have to work with Fidelity!!

title: Additional bug!
body: App does not allow for selecting stock from "Positions" screen to do quick trades.  This is very frustrating  I can select in portrait mode  but due to the non-optimized fonts for iPhone 6+  lots of columns are hidden in portrait mode  I use landscape mode.  Also  as others have pointed out  it's very hard to use this app for trading and logging in.  Could take a page out of ETrade and TD Ameritrade Apps....  UPDATE - finally optimized for iPhone 6 and Touch ID integration (included from previous update)  and got rid of the annoying notification glitch.   There are still a few more to quash - cannot select position in landscape mode and still cannot see option positions in portfolio (to see strike price and expiration date  have to click on position to see details - only works in portrait mode...)

title: Love the new Touch ID
body: Always a fan of the app. Now even better with Touch ID. Works great  thanks.

title: Great App! But...
body: I wish I could check my pay stub as well as my stocks.

title: Needs work on deposits
body: More than half the checks I try to deposit are not accepted because of poor scanning by the app. Certain odd shaped checks are never accepted. Very inconvenient to have to do a  physical deposit instead.

title: Love the improvements
body: The Fidelity app is great.  It performs almost like using your PC!   Makes my life on-the-go so much simpler.

title: Not a replacement for the web site
body: It seems a little buggy still  pull down menus not working for account selection etc.  Also  if you are looking for a replacement to the web site functionality you aren't likely to find it in this app.   Some pretty obvious trading functions appear to be missing.

title: Just one thing to make this perfect
body: I love everything about this app. View accounts  trade  transfer funds  make deposits.   However  alerts (Dow or specific stocks up/down) seem to expire very quickly in a number of days. I'd love to see where you could set the expiration time to a period or never. I've missed big swings due to this.

title: Thanks for Touch ID
body: Thanks for adding Touch ID support.  Please stop adding an item to my Notification Center every time the app logs out due to inactivity. I.e. every time I use it.

title: Step in the right direction
body: Good to see Touch ID implemented but login mechanics need improvement. Getting better  though.

title: Very nice
body: Works great for me

title: Touch ID is broken
body: I'm entering my password the same with Touch ID enabled as I was before it was supported. Please fix that.

title: Now has cost basis
body: Has pretty much everything their website has  but nicely compacted into an app. Even though there is a lot of information  it's not hard to navigate through and find what you need quickly

title: Bill pay is  and has been  broken
body: Bill pay has been broken for months.  Are you ever going to fix it!?!?!  Otherwise  the app is great.

title: Needs History
body: I like the app  it allows me to navigate my account very well.  However  they really need to allow you to see the history of a mutual fund or 401k over several years.

title: Convenient and highly usable app
body: I have done all my trades the last 2 years with this app.  Allows me to track  trade  and travel which is very useful for me.

title: Good for basic trades
body: I am employed by Fid Invst and customer service is good  but if you want "great" apps/ platforms instead of "good" apps/ platforms  go with Think or Swim. Just my two cents.

title: Touch ID Needs Improvement
body: The addition of Touch ID is a step in the right direction but it still needs work.  First there's a bug where it thinks the phone has been restarted when it's not been.  Honestly I'm not sure why a manual entry would be needed after a restart any way.  No other app I have with Touch ID requires that - it's not like someone stole my fingerprint.  Also  you should be prompted to touch without tapping Login first to be more user friendly.

title: Bad upgrade

title: Apple Watch but no optimization?
body: Start reading these reviews  and listening to your customers.  TouchID is a no brainer  but not added yet? It's been around for years now and is now opened up to developers and you aren't taking advantage of the new capabilities?   But the Apple Watch hasn't even been released and that's a new feature to the app. Ridiculous.  I will update this review for every version. The development team for this app should be embarrassed for adding frivolous features like nearby stocks and Apple Watch compatibility when much needed optimization and efficiency features like TouchID are a few lines of code away.   OPTIMIZE THE APP FOR THE BIGGER SCREENS!

title: Just repeating what everyone else is saying

No advanced charting (TD Ameritrade is still king of mobile trading)  No conditional orders (OTO/OTOCO/Contingent)  Really not sure why the Apple Watch was prioritized over basic necessities such as screen resolution optimization and easier account login . title: Fix the errors
body: This app has one of the most annoying errors in that if select a quote it cycles through two or three of your most recent quotes. The only way to stop this from happening is if you back all the way out to the menu and then search a quote. It'll affect any screen you are on  so for example if you have looked at a couple quotes in a row then try and log in it will be churning quotes in the background interrupting your log in. Easy to repeat the error and it's been around for at least six months. Cmon... While you are at it please mention to someone we want Apple Pay support... The watch is practically out at this point.

Giving 2 stars because everything else is pretty good.

title: Nagging issues still
body: Version 2.5.19. I was logged in to Fidelity while using the app.  A disturbing quirk in the Home => Markets display where current value  day change  and percent day change reflect the closing values for the last session. I have a screen shot with the date/time stamp at the bottom that clearly shows that the display was refreshed at 9:43am. The chart correctly shows about 13 minutes of activity  but the values displayed to the right are closing values for the last session. Refreshing the display updates the chart but not the values. I navigated to this screen several times and sometimes got the current market numbers and sometimes values for the last session - although the chart always reflected the current day. Very odd  somewhat disconcerting.  Basic stuff  not working correctly  makes me a bit wary.  Reported to Fidelity. They kindly took the information.

title: Needs a lot more work

Most people trade using mobile devices now  so please get to work on your app.  An investment app that doesn't provide real time quote is not a good app.  Also  chart needs to have more technical indicator and ability to view weekly chart too.

title: Odd rules for mobile deposit
body: I rarely have paper checks to deposit but doing so from a mobile app is an expected feature.   Spent an hour on the phone with support and it turns out there are some criteria I don't meet for mobile deposits to work.   I was told - An account needs to be open for 30 days to be eligible for mobile deposit.  Also the account  must have had $2500 at some point to be able to use mobile deposits.   Makes no sense to me to have to drive to a fidelity office or mail a check to fund a new cash account.   Supposedly the rules are under review  but be aware you may not be able to do mobile deposits.

title: Decent app  needs 1 major improvement
body: I have this app as well as the TD Ameritrade app. What I like better about the TD app is the font size. It sounds picky but it would be nice if there was an option to choose small (or for me I would prefer extra-small) fonts so I could see more information at a glance. I feel I do a lot more scrolling with the Fidelity app than with the TD app. I do like the order execution notifications with this app better than the TD  as it gives details of each filled or cancelled order. Otherwise it has good charting  quotes  multiple account views  etc.

title: Keeps making me reset my passwords
body: Crashes with latest update    Doesn't allow access to Safari Keychain or Touch ID  so my new complex passwords aren't easily retrievable via this app. Having to use a tricky password  I can't easily use this app anymore. Please implement Touch ID support!

title: Really enjoy fidelity
body: After seeing some other negative reviews of this app  I thought that I should weigh in. I have been a long time user of Fidelity for both my brokerage and checking accounts and have used the app for several years now - just to give you some perspective.  The app is great. I have not experienced any blurring of text as has been mentioned in another review (I have a iPhone 6 plus). Additionally  I'm not sure what that other reviewer was referring to regarding the minimum for check deposits. My wife and I make check deposits all the time for small amounts like $10 or $20 and have never had any issues   That out of the way  the app does everything that you would want it to with relative ease. Check your balances  make a trade  do some research. It's all quite accessible.   Fidelity is also very on the ball in terms of updating their app. Just this year they've updated it at least 3 or 4 times making improvements to the app each time  Download it. Use it. You won't be dissaoointed.

title: CRASH
body: The latest update crashes every time I try to open the App. Very annoying. Please fix it ASAP.

title: Works well  but add Total Contributions
body: I like the app  but right under the total value in the Summary section there should be a Total Contributions line. I understand this addition may not be the best thing for the company  but other reputable investment companies provide this summary. Why does Fidelity make us do the math?  Thanks.

title: Update needed
body: Would really like if the app was updated to a more user friendly format and visually improved the font used is small. Over app does what I needs pretty basic. Oh Ya and the check deposit feature requires a min $2k deposit lump sum before the feature can be added to the account.

title: Fatal  Crash
body: I have an iPhone 5s and the latest updated operating system. I just updated Fidelity's app. It now does not open at all. Every time I tap to open it zooms up and 1 second later disappears. I rebooted and still the same problem. Now what? I can't now get into my account!!!!! Horrible!!!!! Do something quick!! Okay you Fixed that last version thank you. But how the heck does that happen? Almost every review said that it crashed! The bad part is I can't go back a version and we are stuck until it's fixed.

Always get a wrong password error then my username is forgotten.   almost all other major brokers support touch id. Speed is everything and this app is anything but quick to use.

title: Fidelity App= terrible!
body: App locks up constantly  can't trade in your margin account  can't select lots that you wanna sell  is constantly trying to update the app and can't a lot of times!    Cumbersome to use as well!!

title: Nice app
body: Best I've seen for this fxn. Are fidelties competitors writing all those bad reviews???  All I can say is try it yourself.

title: Login is SLOW
body: Please add fingerprint login functionality for the iPhone. Please.

title: APPLE PAY *please*
body: I need my fidelity card to work with Apple Pay please. You guys are a major organization why would you have no plans to join apple pay?

title: One feature is very very annoying!
body: Even there is no alert  why the number 0 is red? Really hate it!

title: Getting better
body: Overall a fairly decent mobile banking application. Please add the feature to allow fingerprint identification for logins.

title: Just 1 more thing...
body: If you included TouchID this would be a 5 star app!

title: YTD Performance
body: YTD performance for each stock  mutual fund and ETF in the portfolio is desperately needed.

title: Please update for Touch ID support and iPhone 6 display
body: Please update for Touch ID support and iPhone 6 display

title: New view is horrible
body: Ummm...did you guys forget this is an app for phones? You have to scroll around a huge webpage just to read it. Makes me not even care to check on it anymore. Please change it back  its atrocious. Thank you.

title: Ok  but needs  dramatic improvements
body: Constant logging off is a pain.  Unlimited on-time with touch ID upon return would be great.  Why in the world can I not do extended hours trading through this app?  Would be nice to see lot-by-lot trade history automatically pop up when selling.  Also  would be great to be able to see constantly updated trade books (bud/ask hierarchy) when trading.  Getting better  but I truly wonder when Fidelity will aim to be THE BEST app available in the industry  instead of small incremental steps!

title: Horrible useless app
body: Awful UI. Useless info. Brutal

title: Very choppy and sluggish
body: Update to improve the interface performance and response  when doing research or looking up a quote scrolling up and down is a complete hassle  add Touch ID functionality for login would be nice  not entirely necessary.

title: Problems with touch coordinates
body: The newer version has an issue with opening correct brokerage position in account when pushed. It opens another position. It looks like a bug in tracking touch coordinates. Say  I push on my AAPL position and it opens GRPN which is several lines below. Please fix asap as this is really annoying.

title: Devs hate Windows Phone users
body: Thought I would leave comments here about the pathetic WP app fidelity has out in the Windows Store. No check deposit nor can you transfer money between accounts. The devs of this app hate windows phone users and have not updated it in well over 1 year. Shame on you for forgetting us!!!  Just go check out the feedback and you'll see.

title: Please Update for iPhone 6/6 Plus
body: Love the app however it looks weird on the iPhone 6+ please add support

title: Needs 1Password plugin
body: Great app that gets better all the time. Now that 1Password can unlock individual apps  thanks to iOS 8 updates  it would be great to see Fidelity add that capability!

title: Auto-Logout is killing me.
body: Hey can you guys take out the auto-logout for people who have Touch ID? That would be great. Thanks.

title: Problem with Bill Pay
body: I use this app for Bill Pay but it doesn't work very well. It's very difficult to find the person/company I'm trying to pay from the long list of payees because the list is not sorted alphabetically. It's sorted  I believe  by the date I entered the payee into BillPay. So  reading the list is like a trip down memory lane (oh  I remember that credit card from 10 years ago!). But that's not particularly useful in finding the payee I want to pay today. This is a curious problem and one that seems easily fixed but has been a continuing problem with this otherwise good app from the beginning.

title: So Convenient!
body: I don't normally write app reviews but this one works perfectly! It did exactly what I needed it to do  and it was quick and easy. Thank you Fidelity!

title: Support Touch ID and it would be great
body: Very difficult to use with a long secure password currently. Please support TouchID like eTrade and others do.

title: Keeps getting better!
body: Great app that is only getting better.  App functionality is comparable  if not better  than their web portal.

title: It's pretty good.
body: Would give 5 stars if fidelity would implement the "Touch ID" into the app for passwords. Other than that good for checking stocks and little things while on the road.

title: Great app
body: Good app although has been very buggy with the last couple of updates! Would like to see Touch ID added to the login thanks!

title: Crashing

title: Not working

title: Great

title: Broken in iOS 8 iPhone 6 Plus
body: With iOS 8 and iPhone 6 plus  this app is useless. Going to Accounts locks up after login. Very frustrated that I cannot access my banking from my phone any longer.   Please get a new version out quickly that addresses this. Thanks Fidelity!

title: iP 6+ iOS 8.0.2 App Frozen
body: Fidelity response to my inquiry today:  Our developers are aware of this issue and have submitted an update to the App Store to correct this issue. We are expecting the new app to be available the week of September 29. We do apologize for the inconvenience.  Fidelity Brokerage Services LLC  Member NYSE  SIPC  App allows login then goes into "Loading" mode "spin" and all account data never appears and spin continues. The App must then be closed. A delete and reinstall App does not fix. A reboot of phone does not fix either. iOS 7 on iPad continues to function flawlessly.

title: Great
