title: Please fix security flaw!
body: Why does my log-in ID auto-populate after I've logged out (with no way to clear)? Seriously Fidelity...shame in you for not putting security #1.

title: Netbenefits
body: Love the fact fidelity is on here now and I do have am account I can view but it would go to 5 stars if netbenefits were supported...... Great start though look forward to more..

title: Really good Start!
body: Thanks Fidelity! I am really glad to have this available directly on the iPhone.  - Would like to see more functionality in graphing more technical indicators etc. - It is a little annoying to have to log in again even if you get out of the App for one second. Could there not be a timeout feature letting you stay logged in for X minutes if you close and re-open the app? i have other apps (SplashID in particular) that have that feature.  Overall great job!

title: 401k NOT
body: Doesn't support 401k no use to me.

title: Good start.....needs a lot of improvement
body: Nice look and feel but what good is it if I can't view history pay bills transfer money....etc and can only see the balance on my 401k?  This still requires me to go to the regular website.

title: Qrqrqrqr
body: Says "not supported"??!  App not needed:( Hope there is an update for that!

title: Read before downloading
body: If you have a 401k through fidelity this app does not support it. Not worth it then.

title: Missed the mark
body: Netbenefits is a major portion of Fidelity  yet it is not supported in this app. What's up with that Fidelity?? Get it together!

title: Awesome app!
body: Way to go Fidelity! I agree netbenefits is a huge portion of your customer base and an update would be great. Otherwise nice work.

title: v.1.01
body: I would rate this app an easy four or five but I can't login! It said my login info is not supported what's up with that? I've been a Fidelity costumer for two years. I hope the next update fixes this.

title: Netbenefits 401k works for me
body: I can view two different netbenefits accounts but cannot do much else with them. Also lists my personal trading acct so this is good!  Not sure why the other reviewers couldn't see thiers but give it a try before you decide.

title: We have been Fidelity customer's...
body: ...for fifteen years. I was wondering when they were going to release an app for the Iphone. It's not perfect but it gives us a good overall picture of our accounts. Haven't tried the quote feature yet during market hours but it's probably delayed quoting. Charting is pretty good but the app doesn't include all the technical charting indicators available on the website. Overall it's a good app-not great-but just enough for us to get a picture....

title: No NetBenefits
body: Can't view my Fidelity 401k so I have no use for this app. Immediately deleted. Will re-rate when it's upgraded.

title: Security concern
body: There is no way to turn off the autofill on the account or social security name.  That means the phone is storing my social security number and associating it with a brokerage account.  Seems like a very bad idea if the phone is lost or stolen.  Other than that it seems like a useful way to interact with Fidelity.

title: Finally
body: Great app. Keep'em coming.

title: A must have...
body: Sweet!!!

title: Mostly an ad
body: This App works but does little if you are not a Fidelity account holder.

title: Great
body: My first review ever and I have owned a iphone since the first month they came out. But I must say I really like this app so far. Very clear and easy to understand. I haven't done a trade yet but most likely will only do this on my mac as I don't trade that much in my retirement account

title: Great App
body: Great app nice to be able to view account and trade via the phone. Thanks Fidelity

title: Shocked at limited Features
body: I'm very surprised that a large investment company like Fidelity would come out with an iTunes app that has such limited features.  I can't see the history of transactions??  Other investment/banks have apps with history but not Fidelity??  Did they rush this app to market because everyone else is ahead of them and they are playing catch up??  I'm looking forward to revamp of this app by Fidelity.

title: Bad support for multiple accounts
body: I went ot the accoutns tab and selected the account i wanted to trade. Then i went ot the trade tab and initiated a trade. Then another. Both trades defalted to the other accounts even though I selected the proper account in the accounts screen. What a crock! Now I have $5000 in trades on the wrong account!!

title: Retirement Account.
body: This app was long overdue. Like the functionality thus far but I am quite disappointed that I can not access my retirement account (NETBENEFITS). I'm even able to access it on fidelity mobile so why not the app. Hoping I'll see this update very soon.

title: Like being on the website directly
body: I think this is an excellent app.  I can access all of my accounts see my balances trade if I wish and see research info.  I can do everything I would ever do on the website directly.  Great way to keep up with my accounts while on the go.

title: Notable first effort but lacking key features
body: The features included seem to work well. However two essential features are missing Money Transfer and Bill Pay.  Hopefully these two features will be included in the next update.

title: Worth the wait
body: This is an excellent app for Fidelity. I get a great visual of the market and can also log in and check on my accounts along with my watchlists.   People are complaining about things that aren't in this first version but think it's great. I access my checking IRA and other brokerage investment accounts daily. Fast easy and I get all the info I want. I'm sure it'll have updates down the road too.

title: Finally but
body: I've gotten all three iPhones as they have come out and that's how long I've waited for an app from Fidelity! Now an app has finally been released BUT it's missing some big features. No history or ability to transfer money between accounts just to name a few. So even though there is an app I still have to use the browser to get the full benefit!

title: Useless
body: Congradulations!!!! This is now the most useless app on my phone... Net Benefits???? WTF????

title: Great version 1
body: This is a great first pass. Lots of nice features and much easier to use than the browser app. Can't wait for future releases!

title: Crap app along with crap mobile website BS
body: Fidelity blows even more with this one...they force a crappy mobile website on iPhone users and then they don't even support netbenefits on the app...horrible.

title: NetBenefits not supported...
body: Are you kidding me? Why isn't NetBenefits supported? Seems rediculous that they wouldn't include that!!

title: Billpay Fullview Acct transfers
body: Would really like to see all the above in the next release.

title: No 401k Access
body: How lame is that? No 401k access?  Weird. I'll be back when I can actually use this to access my Fidelity account. Then u get 5 stars.

title: 401k support
body: Please add support for 401k!  Would give 4 or 5 stars if I could view my netbenefits.

title: Student
body: This app really needs to integrate workplace savings/netbenefits as suggested by many others. App is useless to those that do not have retail accts.

title: Nice start but needs more
body: While this is a good beginning for a version 1.x app basic account management features such as history and netbefits account support are needed in addition to more mid-level features such as untra account transfers and billpay.

title: Great job!!! Thanks Fidelity
body: Love it!! Clean interface nice watchlist and account views. I'd love see more research.

title: Nice work
body: I love the navigation for the positions and watch list. Very clever way to present a lot of information.

title: Great!
body: Works great!

title: Net benefits log in is not supported
body: The app is useless if it won't allow me to log into my fidelity account.

title: Great start!
body: Very nice. Clean design optimized for the small screen. For a version 1 release it has nice features with few problems. Looking forward to additional functionality in the future...history account performance and portfolio analysis.

title: Useless without netbenefit support
body: This app does not support Netbenefit.  Maybe because Netbenefit users are captive customers? Why invest in them?  They won't leave as long as they are with their current employers.

title: Finally
body: Works great hopefully Fidelity will continue to add to this

title: Best trading app out there!
body: Kudos to Fidelity for this highly functional well designed app. Keep up the good work!

title: Great Start!
body: Can't wait for future enhancements and updates.  The number 1 investment company on the planet just got even better.

title: Good for ONLY exactly what it says in description
body: Portfolio trading etc. Unfortunately I mostly use the mySmartCash account not trading but all I can see is the balance - no transaction history no bill pay. This is the same as the mobile website.  Not very helpful if you want to check and see if bill payments or checks cleared see eBills or set up new payments.

title: Finally I can trade on my iphone
body: I was looking forward for an iphone app from Fidelity for a long time. Thank you Fidelity. News feature is good. Charting is good. Option pricing also looked good. Didn't find link to Trade from the Quote Page.   Does Fidelity have Level 2 quotes for active traders? I am used to the ones from iStockManager from TDAM.   Any way overall glad to have an iphone app from Fidelity.

title: User
body: Where is the bill pay option?  Please add it!  I cannot find it for the life of me.  Please add a bill pay option!

title: A+
body: Can only get better over time....great product...now let's watch others copy them

title: Great stock app
body: Great graphs and nice supporting account info.

title: CAN"T EVEN LOGIN TO FIDELITY ACCOUNT!!!!
body: I was hoping that an App like this was in the works since I have my 401K through Fidelity and was hoping to have an easy way to check it out. Needless to say I was so glad when I saw it came out. However this has been a huge headache!!! I can't log in to my NetBenefits account because it "is not supported" which is the main reason why I got this App. Why would Fidelity make an App that their customers can't login to???? HUGE LET DOWN!!!! Hopefully with an update this can all change.

title: Almost perfect
body: Reasons for 4/5 stars:  a. Can't automatically remember your login info (so you have to type your password each time you load the app...i know it's for my own good) b. It's not remembering the settings I've made (i.e. customizing my home screen layout) c. Forces you to view the non-customizable home page they've set up each time you load the app.  Other than these issues thus far the app looks and acts great! Trading is intuitive and seamless. Quotes are quick and expansive. Graphs are great! Clean and slick interface. Just imagine what this will be like in another update. SO much better than using the fidelity webpage on my phone's browser.

title: Nowhere near as robust as E*TRADE app and the charts don't work
body: None of the charts work on my iPhone 3G with OS 3.0  From what i can see this app doesn't replace the amount functionality of the Fidelity Anywhere mobi has. However is does alliw me to see the balance on my Fidelity Investment Rewards account.   I'll raise my rating if you...  1) get the charts to work 2) allow me to see the detail of my FIA rewards account.   Thanks

title: Good even for the novice
body: I am your simple average joe who has a Fidelity Roth IRA to supplement my 401k (with another company) and knows little to nothing about what any of the numbers mean. Half this app I don't understand but it does allow me to track my Roth IRA as well as save my 401k accounts to my "watch" list so I can check in daily and see if they went up or down...that much I understand!

title: IT'S ABOUT TIME FIDELITY!!!
body: I have been waiting for fidelity to release an APP for their customers!  Excellent job with version 1 & we are all looking forward to future updates with added functionality!!!  Thanks!!!

title: Trader
body: FANTASTIC! Charts quotes news watchlist and trading all at my fingertips. Great job Fidelity! Very sleek and easy to use.

title: Good app but no history?
body: Seems like history would be an integral part of an app such as this. Aside from that omission the app works well!

title: About time.
body: Just what I have been waiting for to access my accounts.

title: This app is spectacular
body: This app does a fantastic job brings together all the financial data I need on one screen. Great job fidelity! Thanks for all the free ETF trades too!

title: A great start
body: A great app that will be even better with a few more updates. The content is very well organized trades are easy and there is a lot of news. I would like to have the history page and to be able to move money in the future but so far so good.

title: Took too long
body: I hope we won't have to wait as long for enhancements & fixes.  Not too bad so far.

title: Designed with the trader in mind.
body: Thanks Fidelity

title: Great app
body: Awesome. Finally something to do in my morning meeting. Fw.

title: Finally!
body: Well worth the wait. Very intuitive app. Look forward for future upgrades. Would love to be able to access MyBillpay.

title: B+
body: I've been waiting for this application to become available. Functional and easy to use. Allows you to trade on the go and keep track of your accounts. Hopefully in future updates it will allow you to view history in each account and transfer money within accounts.

title: Not as good as it use to be
body: I use to love this app. Now hardly anything will process. I check barcodes in store and they show they will work. Once I checkout and try to redeem my offers then most items show invalid. It's really frustrating to lost out on close to $5 every time I grocery shop.  I think I will delete this app and stick with the "other" guys that work every time.

title: App is fine what it is trying to achieve is not
body: Nothing I submit is accepted. Ibotta is much more user friendly

title: Best rebate app
body: This is the best rebate app everI've had this for 2 years now and have made almost $1000 in rebates

title: Fab app
body: This app makes my life easier and happier!!!!! Love it thanks Saving ⭐️ ????

title: Savings
body: I like the app and the program.  Just wish there were more offers and like all coupons  not many healthy offerings.

title: Need some improvements
body: Although I do use this app and will continue to use it I will say it needs some major upgrading and improvements. It often doesn't give you credit for some items that you know you qualify for. If you have several items on the same receipt you shouldn't have submit a different receipt for each item. It takes way to long to get credit for the items and it takes way to long to receive customer service feed back after contacting them. I would hope you will take this in to consideration to make improvements. Ibotta and checkout 51 are way more up to date.

title: So disappointed!
body: I have been extremely disappointed in SavingStar over the past few months. When trying to redeem the one or many offers they are not crediting my receipts correctly. Secondly their scanner is the worst from any rebate app. They have great offers and I would like to continue using it but I may stop I am so frustrated by it.

title: Horrid app support - slow to respond
body: I still have a receipt "pending from over 30 days ago! No one has contacted me and I've reached out three times. I can't seem to get credit for the cash I earned. So frustrating! I suggest staying away from this app and trying other great effective ones such as Ibotta and Checkout51

title: Easy to use
body: I like that I can put my rewards card in and click the coupons and they come up automatically when my card is scanned and a lot of the coupons are for products I would buy without a coupon so it's a big winner for my family.

title: Avoid this app
body: Company rejects every submission not worth the effort

title: Awesome app!!!
body: Got 10 bucks back today! Super easy! Just remember your rewards card for certain stores!!

title: Saving Star
body: Very hard to scan items. Not very user friendly.

title: Awesome rebate app
body: For couponers this is a great app. You don't need a 20 buck minimum to get the money into your PayPal. The offers they have are useful and for some of them they allow you to meet the minimum amount for the rebate over several purchases

title: Too much work
body: The coupons should just load so if you get something its on there .... Too much effort trying to juggle them all

title: Mo money Mo money
body: Come on what's better than getting paid to shop. A free app that pays you I love it. It's so simple and easy to use.

title: Save money
body: I like the app but it runs slow. It's worth the trouble to save money.

title: Good
body: Free money is free money. Overall a good app.

title: Works ok most of the time.
body: I have a love-hate with this app. Loading issues hound it which makes it frustrating. Many times the rebates aren't issued and I need to contact them. Many technical issues. But when it works it's great! Just wish it was more consistent.

title: This app needs major improvement
body: Wish this app would easily recognize when you've purchased the required items for rebates and credit your account. At least twice I have been stiffed on a $5 rebate and a $3 rebate. Other similar apps are much easier to use. Not impressed with this app. May stop using all together- not worth the time.

title: Not catching many products
body: One of my favorite apps. The app has provided consistent function & payments even throughout updates (which cannot be said for most shopping apps). The only difficulties I've experienced is tracking credit for products purchased from a few of the retailers where my card is linked. It can take a few weeks to receive credit & that's difficult to track if the offer is no longer showing on the list of offers but that's the retailers reporting the purchase not SavingStar.

title: Great app
body: One of the best trusty apps that you can get rebate back on items you use all the time. They pay you money right away after you reach $5.

title: Missing rebates
body: Love the app when I works but takes so long to get notification I often wonder if all the rebates come in.  Tracked a few and two were never credited to my account.   They assured me I must not have activated them.  I had.  Overall it's OK

title: Great App!
body: I'm happy with this app. No complaints here

title: Great!
body: Great app

title: Love the concept
body: But get really frustrated by having to scan submit and a few days later do it again because the app isn't recognizing that there are 2 or 3 of the same item being scanned for the buy 2 or spend $$$ get a rebate items! It is handy to have your loyalty card that way you just buy the items and get your rebate! No time to scan and submit more than once!

title: Valuable saving tool
body: I love saving star and use it all the time. The updates are helpful because you can sort the activated list. But sometimes it takes a while before it opens.

title: Easy to use valuable
body: Very convenient way to save some money here and there. I like the straightforwardness of the program a lot and the app is user friendly

title: Easy breezy

title: Love it

title: Worst app amongst rebates apps

The stores that offer automatic savings which is when you don't upload your receipt for credit and the store sends it to Saving Star automatically you'll notice that you are missing credit.

title: Top-Notch App!

title: Best savings app

title: What happened?
body: Has anyone else found that the camera feature isn't working? I have a black screen when I want to check if a product qualifies AND when I have a receipt to photograph. Also not getting the cash back for purchases at Price Chopper and BJ's! What's going on??!!

title: Love Saving Star
body: I love any app that is going to save me money. I like to upload pictures of my receipt to the app to save. It is a great app. Thank you for helping me to save money!

title: What Happened to the good stores?
body: I use to love this App!  It provided me with cash for Car rentals Hotels and even shopping at stores I would make purchases from on a regular basis.  Now they are all gone...what happened?  I can't book a hotel get a car rental or shop with a normal department store.  A lot has changed over the past couple of months and not for the better :(. I just need to cash out and move over to their competitor.

title: Love saving money!!!

title: GREAT APP TO SAVE!

title: Stops working
body: They have great offers but my app has stopped working several times.

title: Worst app ever
body: Don't bother downloading! You never get the rebate money you apply for getting excuse after excuse! And the customer service team takes forever to answer issues if they bother to answer at all!

title: Great app
body: Love it. Very easy compared to other apps because it is linked directly to the store card.

title: None
body: Frequently denies submissions for vague reasons.  The prolonged response makes it often impossible to re-submit receipts before the offer has expired. Great when the offer redemptions are accepted.

title: Not great
body: I've had this now for 6 months along with 2 other apps. I just hit $13 because I don't spend enough or buy the brands they promote. There are almost never fresh options and often to get any return I have to spend around $25 on one brand. I'm a single person so that gets tough if I want to eat a variety of foods. In that same 6 months one app has $7 and the other has $108. There is a huge difference for me and I will stick with the $108 app that promotes things like lettuce and carrots instead of potato chips and cookie dough.

title: Saving Star/Best App
body: I love Saving Star.  I earn money on items I always purchase.

title: Just getting the hang of it...
body: I like this app very much so far but I am just getting started. I've successfully redeemed rebates from Walmart with no trouble but I have not figured out how to make Rebates from Wegmans work for me yet. I recently emailed customer service for assistance but have yet to hear back so...I will give additional feedback when I can get rebates to work at more than one store... But so far so good. I'm learning!!!

title: Qualified products aren't qualified!
body: I have tried to upload several receipts with items that are clearly qualifying once I scan the barcode I'm told they are not qualifying. Frustrating to say the least! The only transactions that seem to work are the stores with loyalty cards. If you have to upload a receipt forget it!

title: Just not worth it
body: Not Worth the time invested. Too few rebates most requiring multiple purchases. The requirement to get a separate card to scan and forget to scan at Albertson's was the biggest pain. I'm done with it.

title: Love...
body: ...it! Never had a single problem with it. Very reliable and such a great deal.

title: Saving $
body: Like this app!  Easy to use.  I was able to combine offer by using a print coupon with offer.  I also like the feature of adding stores of where I shop.

title: Hard to keep track of
body: Lately it seems purchases aren't being credited and it is becoming harder to keep track of what is and should be credited. Offers not as good as prior year.

title: It is OK
body: Its okay

title: It's ok...some of the time
body: This app is cool to use but I've had a few instances where I've purchased items that clearly matched up with the rebates and the bar codes were never approved by the app...seems like a defect that should be looked into. Also I've had times were I've never received credit for certain produce purchases. So if anyone uses this app don't have high expectations for it.

title: Review
body: Good way to save money. Can be quite frustrating with redeeming offers despite purchasing the correct product & waiting to receive a response from support.

title: Better savings for our family of 6
body: I am new to this scene of saving but I must say this is awesome and I love it!!!! I've saved it's of money sometimes it takes longer big to pay but Thanks for the savings!

title: WONDERFUL!!!
body: This app is amazing because I get electronic rebates on products I purchased. The item can be on sale and I use a coupon and still get a rebate on top of that. I am from the old school where 30 years ago I would have to fill out a rebate form then cut out the UPC from the product. There was the cost of stamps and envelopes then wait 6 weeks for a check which had to be taken to the bank. This app is amazing. All I have to do is choose the product I want a rebate on then use my customer loyalty card to make the purchase and in a few days the rebate is in my account!!!! It can't get any easier than this! I have never had a problem with receipts posting so I have never had to use customer service. I only wish I knew about this app sooner. A++++++++

title: Awesome Ap!
body: I love this Ap! Just received my first payout of $5 and it made my day! I highly recommend this Ap to everyone!

title: Love it!
body: Great savings app

title: Great App!!!
body: I love using this app it is so easy! It gives me cash back from my loyalty or bonus cards and if a store doesnt have that I can submit receipts! I also like the email reminders which are very helpful!

title: Great app
body: I love that there are things I actually buy.

title: Awesome!! Satisfied completely!!
body: This app rocks! Easy to use and fabulous way to save some extra cash!!

title: ????????I love this app!
body: ????????It's easy to use and actually has things on it that you buy! It's very practical and u don't have to purchase a ton of stuff to save money! ☺️

title: Great savings
body: In this program awhile. Was great at first but now they have too many must buys for a greater amount. It's hard when you only have 2 people in the household.

title: I am very pleased!!!!
body: I have been using this app for a short period of time and in the very beginning and while I was becoming accustomed to the app things were a little shaky and I wasn't sure how long I was going to continue to use it but I stayed and I'm glad I did. I just cashed out with my first payment and I received the money the same day in my PayPal account even though the message stated it would be a couple of days. I have found that customer service has improved and if you give them some time I have also found that they will respond to your question(s) or concerns. I think that many of their offers are really good ones and I really like that you only need a minimum of $5.00 to request a payout. I'm very pleased with this app and I highly recommend it to anyone who is interested in saving money!!!

title: Not as good as Ibotta
body: SavingStar could use some pointers from Ibotta. Ibotta is easier to scan upload receipts and has a lot more items to save on.

title: Automatic savings store feature NO GOOD!
body: So i love the savings star coupon offers but I Shop mostly at an automatic savings store which has gone thru several changes in ownership... Albertson's. We had a store card then we didnt so we got u promise tags and they are not recording my dang purchases! Now...our Albertson's bought out safeway and will be getting the safeway cards :/ I would just like to upload my receipts that way i get my credit and am not dependent on computers to CATCH MY PURCHASES WHEN IT FEELS LIKE IT! IM LOSING MY CREDITS OVER THIS FAILED SYSTEM WHICH COULD EASILY BE RECTIFIED BY UPLOADING MY RECEIPTS PROOF OF PURCHASE! The contact us resolution works too slow! Savings star your not keeping up with all these changes and it is really affecting my savings! PLEASE ALLOW A RECEIPT TO BE UPLOADED WHEN THIS FAILURE OCCURS BECAUSE IT OCCURS REGULARILY FOR ME AT LEAST.

title: Love this app
body: One of my favorite apps right now. Thanks for being Awesome !

title: Frustrated
body: I really like Saving Star. It has the potential to be a great app. However I've had nothing but trouble trying to use it. I have had to contact customer service every time! All my other apps have no problem scanning items but this app just won't. Customer service has been no help whatsoever. They credit my rebate but then I still have to contact them and wait every time I use it. Very frustrating!
Awesome app

Used this app for 6 plus months.  Mixed results.  Has worked well when I have one to three small rebates.  Twice now I have verified my activated offers by scanning barcodes at stores.  When I submit my receipts I have got emails that none of the products I have bought qualify for this.  Twice now I have not been credited 5 $ on bounty plus a few more 1 $ rebates.  It's frustrating to see this when Ibota and Checkout 51 have been flawless.  I get lame emails saying my receipt was not legible but I can print it out from Saving Star's link and it is clean as a whistle.

title: Best Rebate App!!!
body: I love savings star!  They have a ton of great savings on items I buy on a regular basis.  If you don't use it you are missing out!

title: Needs better customer service
body: They've made several mistakes on my account and customer service hasn't responded. I resubmitted a receipt with a note attached pointing out it was processed incorrectly and they wouldn't accept it because it was previously processed! Love the savings but they need to work out the bugs and respond better to users.

title: Love it

title: Gets it right most of the time

title: Scanner doesn't work

title: Worth it but with some work.
body: This app is really worth it and for the most part it works well but there are times that you scan a receipt with the correct item in it and you don't get credit for it.

title: App Just Doesn't Work Right
body: I've been having trouble getting the app to scan products when I get home. The process can take me as long as 15 minutes.   Then this week almost every time I checked a product at the store I got the message "does not qualify " when the products were clearly pictured in the rebate! (Good thing I checked before I bought them!)  Customer service is a joke. I emailed about the above problem wanting to buy these products when they were on sale. Five days later and still no response.   I am completely frustrated with this.

title: Scanner doesn't work
body: I like the offers they have but I can never get the scanner on my app to scan the product.  Therefore I've never been able to redeem anything!  Good luck with this app unfortunately it's pretty useless!

title: Great easy way to save money!
body: This has been a great way to save money on purchase I already make! I am happy that I am able to cash out my savings after $5 many other apps you have to wait to $25+ in order to do so! Very easy to manage and use!

title: Real money maker
body: Easy to use always new products and get money

title: Nothing comes FREE!
body: Are u fricken serious?  NOW... I'm being told I need to use the bar code for CVS thru your app?!?  to redeem my purchases after the fact... What next?  That is total BS!!  First I'm told I didn't 'activate' items BEFORE purchase now that they were activated there is no way to redeem my items!!  This is going in a review... As for these REBATE apps nothing comes 'free' in life... There is an ulterior motive that is benefiting ALL these 'rebate' sites to lure people into believing all they are doing is producing proof of purchase for specific items to get paid for 'nothing'... One needs to think outside the box to think what the ulterior motive actually is but I know from personal experience the 'Land of the Free' doesn't exist.  FREE money definitely always comes with a price.

title: Love this app
body: Pays you to shop and you can cash out as early as $5!!! They actually have lots of products that I buy on the regular and earning money for buying them is amazing and super easy to do!

title: Love this App????????????

title: Great App!

title: Easy click and save

title: New app - Same great savings!
body: Savingstar is very easy to use. What an excellent way to get real money back on groceries! Love it!

title: Free money
body: I have earned over $60 in the last 9 months. Easy to use just attach your bonus or loyalty card and shop normally. Just remember to accept the offers before you go to the store. Using the app to shop on line works too but can take 30 days or more to get money credited to your account. Love this app.... I wrote this a couple of years ago I am now over $200 in earnings. I do not purchase things I don't normally buy and most of the time I have a paper coupon to go with it. Great app

body: Love this app

title: Okay app
body: It's hard to get to the amount on some of these but if you can then you'll like it.

title: ALL TIME FAVORITE!
body: Absolutely amaaaaazing app! I've literally been paid hundreds by SavingStar by both in-store and online shopping. This is tied with IBotta for being my fav rebate apps. I LOVE that their are so many familiar items to purchase and most of all I love the wyb offers and weekly freebies. It's hard to beat FREE! Many items can be purchased for free if paired with a manufacture coupon. And many great items such as Dove reset to buy again each month. Customer Service has been amazing whenever I had an issue. They always honor my requests no questions asked. One time I accidentally used a new CVS card which I forgot to link to buy the $5 wyb $15 Doritios and they gave me the credit anyways. Another time I was only a few cents short for another spend deal and they gave me full credit for that as well. Thank you SavingStar and Great Job!!!  P.S. The only request I have is to make online shopping available through your app AND increase the cashback availabilities and percentage as well. Oftentimes you do not have the store I am looking for whereas other sites do. You are also not usually the highest offers available and in my opinion you should be because you ROCK the hardest and dominate the coupon/rebate world so it seems like you could afford slightly higher offerings to keep your customers loyal.

title: Great App
body: This is the best app and is great for saving money it actually has great stuff that you actually use compared to others

title: Really frustrating slow support
body: Ok. It's nice to get money back and support is always polite. However in the last 2 months every single "one or many" purchase has been added incorrectly requiring me to contact support which now takes an extremely long time to address the issue. Additionally linked card store purchases are simply being missed so credit is not being given. Other times a receipt will sit in the queue for weeks while others are processed requiring another note to support. Again they are always polite but it might take weeks to get your rebate processed. If you have lots of patience and enjoy contacting support then I guess the app is ok. If you would like to get your rebate easily and in a reasonable amount of time you might be frustrated as am I.

title: Used to be great now not so much!
body: This used to be great! I've saved a lot of money since July 2014 when I signed up with it. The customer service was always prompt and resolved any issues I had. Now it takes FOREVER to hear from them (at least a week or longer). And the stores that are SUPPOSED to be automatic saving stores either take forever to show up or only partially credit me for my purchases. I am STILL waiting to hear from customer service (it's now been a week) because I'd bought two things from a store and only got credit for one. Very annoying and frustrating!

title: Slow response times scanner from Stone Age
body: If you buy more than one of an item(ex: 2 cans of beans) the scanner won't accept the 2nd item.  I've had several receipts that were not completely accepted even though I followed the rules TO THE LETTER. When you contact support be prepared for a looooooong wait. Example: my request submitted today received an automated email saying the next response will be in 5-10 DAYS! Honestly go with Checkout 51 or Ibotta before you use this. Those two turn things around in hours. I'd give SavingStar ZERO STARS if I could.

I don't see why 1 store is instant and another takes up to 2 weeks it's crazy and makes no sense. Along with long wait times they are constantly wrong about your items they credit u for. So many times I have to wait up to a month for full credit because they are wrong. They make u email then wait and wait and wait. Heck you should get credit just for that. Ibotta is way better faster and 100 times more accurate then this app. If u use be warned!!!

Lastly I tend to forget to activate the offer. Since this app was not useful to me I check once a week when new deals are up on Friday and don't check again. Sometimes I would find items that I always buy and it's available for rebate but I'm not eligible since it was not activated. Please change these issue. It makes things less complicated and less difficult to use. But if you're getting money back for something you're already buying. A little bit goes a long way. title: Excellent
body: I have been using this app for over a year. Tie it to a Saving Star American Express and get 10 percent for buying grocery items at store. Many times the camera on your phone may not work as efficiently. I had an old iOS 4 phone and recently upgraded and things are much easier !  Customer service is there but can you imagine checking and deciphering somebody else's cash register receipts. I have had some issues before and all were resolved. It is tied to cvs also. I also buy on line going through saving star and have saved so very much. This is at Walmart Best Buy Home Depot and hundreds of others. It is just not groceries. So check it out carefully. I did not use it before because I did not have enough practice. Be patient. You do get the monies. I put in my PayPal account and it helped me with my taxes as I am on a fixed income. Thank you and stay the course!!!

After the first time this happened I contacted customer service and didn't hear back for almost a month and their response was "sorry try again." Well my original offers had long since expired so I tried again and again with with other offers and no luck at all. I'm done with this app!! Stick with Ibotta Check Out 51 and others with better reviews.

title: Best app!
body: Love the app! Easy to scan bar codes and money usually gets deposited quickly.

title: Awesome!!!
body: Saving star is just amazing it's such an easy way to save money. I love using the app it's simple and to the point which makes it great for all types of customers.I rarely have an issue with rebates but whenever I did customer service was great. They always reply back to the query and always do there best to resolve any issues. I love using the app and the website and would highly recommend it. I give it a 5 star rating.

title: Can't really argue with free money. :)
body: The app does have its kinks and glitches but my experience so far with customer service has been fine; missing credit was added to my account soon after I contacted CS. Only took like 2-3 days to transfer to my bank. Again how can you really argue with someone giving you money? :) have a good day all. xxx

title: Inconsistently working

title: Saving star one of the best!

Very pleased and recommend it.

title: Bestest

title: Scanner horrible

I can spend 5 minutes on each item and sometimes just give up and throw the receipt away instead of dealing with the hassle... If you like headaches and wasted time then this app is for u!

title: Great!

title: Not happy

title: Nice way to save money
body: I do enjoy this app I just wish the free items were more regular.   I also wish the items wouldn't be "out" as I have clicked on items only to be told no longer available.  But for the most part it is easy to use.

title: Love it!

title: I love it

title: Ok

title: Latest update

title: Worth the trouble
body: Have been using saving star for almost a year. Have had a very good experience.  Customer service has been very responsive to concerns that I had with not receiving credit for purchases.  Would give it five stars if you could just scan the barcode on the receipt and the information is transferred verses having to take 5-7 pictures for 1 item that was purchased which happen to be at the top of the receipt.

title: Very helpful app
body: Great help like the saving

title: It takes time to save money
body: I've been using Savings Star for about a year and it's been great! Yes the latest update has slowed things down but the rebates on everyday products is great. I've had issues but customer service tries there best and I understand it takes time to get back to hundreds of people. At the end of the day my complaints are corrected and my money is credited. What more can a person want? Thanks Savings Star! Especially Joe W for always answering my emails.

title: Free money
body: Works great.

title: Seeing green:)
body: I love getting deals "couponing" without having to take stacks of paper coupons to the store. I have never had a problem getting reimbursed and I love how they only have a $5 cash out when many other apps similar to savingstar have a $20 cash out. Thanks!

title: Review
body: I shop at Menards a lot. Really wish it was on here.

title: Horrible
body: Not a good app at all. No real savings.

title: Very good rebate app
body: In recent days I like savings star app for its great range of rebates on we'll known items. Definitely it is saving some of my money on shopping. Thanks. One suggestion is try to increase the items and introduce category to check and apply rebate easily.

title: Others are better
body: Nice idea but others (Ibotta) are doing it better.  Can't search savings don't work all the time.  Frustrating.

title: Easy way to save even more $$
body: Offers useful products and I love that it is in conjunction with paper coupons too. Been using this app for years!

title: Never works
body: Receipts never uploaded correctly. Tired of trying ????????

title: Love it
body: Money posts quickly. Easy to add items to my list.

title: What happened?
body: In the previous version submitting receipts for Non-card stores (Walmart Target etc) was easy and the scanner worked well. HOWEVER since I upgraded the scanning process is not only cumbersome but unpredictable and inaccurate. Stick with stores that you link your card to and it's fine. Go to Walmart Target or anyone else list under "Submit Receipt" and you will be very frustrated with the scanner.

title: Ok App
body: It takes a long time for credits sometimes 4-7 days. You really have to keep an eye on the credits because they are constantly missed. I've emailed their customer service many times and they take 5-7 days. So to get a $1 credit it can take almost 2 -3 weeks for it to be credited if it's missed. I haven't been able to view My Account tab in the app for weeks. Customer service says to view it online...obviously not how an app should be used. I love the fact that the payout is $5 and it goes into PayPal quickly. I noticed credits appear faster with linked store cards.

title: Doesn't work
body: Stick with Ibotta this app is not reliable. Of 3 receipts submitted two of them I never received the rebates for. I emailed customer support and never received a response. Not worth it.

title: Overall an okay app.
body: I don't use this app as frequently as I use other money saving apps because the offers are fewer and only certain stores are accepted. I really wish you would add the commissary to your list of stores. I would probably use the app more if you didn't have the store restrictions. It would also be beneficial if you had more ways to cash out. Overall it's an okay app.

title: Not pleased
body: I've been an avid user of savingstar for a few years now because it's so easy. Load your store card number with coupons shop and earn. In the beginning the app took forever to do anything. Then for probably the last year everything seemed much more streamlined. This newest update forever has sent the app back atleast 4 years. Slow to load each part of the app no organization on the first screen of coupons. I liked having my activated offers separate. I can never see my earnings. My only gripe before this update was how long receipts took from stores like target. Now it's everything such a shame.

title: Not bad but losing other coupon opportunities
body: I've been using the app for about 6 weeks. I like the savings. I find the products relevant to what I purchase and like the that there is the opportunity to save on fresh produce. I wish my grocery store was not one that required you to scan their loyalty card. Now I have to choose between using the app or using the electronic coupons I can attach to the store's app. You can't combine the two.

title: Easy to use
body: Great app doesn't always have every product variation (bulk items usually) but I've had great success!

title: Fantastic app!!!
body: I love this app! Highly recommend it.

title: Awful! Changed terms!
body: Don't waste your time for pennies! When I signed up Winn-Dixie was an automatic savings store (meaning that I put in my store rewards # and it would "automatically be credited to your SavingStar account within 2-22 days depending on the store." So I clicked on several offers and in the beginning I got a few cents/dollars but then a MONTH went by and nothing happened. I emailed customer service and they said "Thank you for using SavingStar! As of December 14th 2015 Winn-Dixie BI-LO and Harvey's have become part of SavingStar's receipt scanning stores. To redeem offers at one of these stores please submit your receipt via the mobile app or on SavingStar.com." I wasn't notified of this! And I sure don't have those receipts now! I added it up and it's about $10 in "lost savings." They are keeping the money from promoting products! DON'T USE!

title: Love this app
body: I've had this app for about a year. Never had any problem with it. Like that fact that I can link my reward cards and don't have to remember to scan my receipt. Even though when I scan the receipt I get paid faster than with a linked reward card. Reward card tend to take a lil longer.

title: Eh
body: I honestly really like the idea of saving star but the app is horrible. It works one week then the next you can't even see your earnings. I've tried emailing them and no response.

title: Horrible

I've been getting the offer for days I don't normally shop. I also have had trouble finding some of the products in my little rural area. Otherwise it has been great for the products I have purchased and the money gets to my bank in a timely matter when I cash out.

Telling me someone would get back to me in like 5-10 days. It has been long over 10 days for each item and no one ever got back to me.

title: Great App.

Also this is still an unorganized mess. Shouldn't have to keep scrolling to find new offers should appear at the top. Also should be able to organize by expiration date.  This app needs an overhaul! Loved it the way it was before the update.

title: Current update is worse than previous

I always get my money quickly and I've never had a problem that they couldn't help me with. However this new update is hard to deal with and is the reason I'm giving 3 stars. The app takes FOREVER to load and it lists the items in a random order. Sometimes offers that I need to activate are below offers I've already activated and it makes it easy to miss. I wish they went back to 2 separate pages 1 for new offers and 1 for activated offers. I hope they fix this.

title: Love the savings.

body: well I don't know what everyone else is talking about with this new update because it's awesome! it works super great and is so quick and easy. makes grocery shopping fun.

title: Frustrating time consuming process
body: I've used Savings Star for about a year and the experience hasn't been good. It's actually become so much more time consuming that I have come close to giving up using it all together!  The scanning technology is horrible. I often spend 10 minutes or more trying to get barcodes to register (my average submission is 3 items). I've had to contact customer service on multiple occasions to get proper payments for submissions. In some instances I've abandoned the submission process or not bothered with disputing rejected claims because the hassle is not worth the 25 or 50 cents.  I consistently wait anywhere from 1 to 3 weeks for my submissions to process. Crazy. In contrast Ibotta processes and credits rebates in 1 day or less often in less than 5 minutes!!!  Ibotta's ap process timeliness and customer service are 100 times better than SS.

title: Couponer

I know the colors are different for new offers but we still have to search them out.  Wish Savingstar would go back to the previous way as it was so much better.  This is not an improvement at all.

title: Not working for me

Otherwise it's just a scam to get people to buy products but never allow the user to get reimbursed. I'll be deleting app if I don't get credit for what I've spent.

title: Used to be better

Also now when I click on my list of activated offers it doesn't give me the information about the ending date for the offer or give me the option to check to see if an item qualifies. I don't know that I will continue to use the app because I'm not sure its worth the trouble.

title: SavingStar
body: So far so good.  The savings adds up fairly quickly.  My only complaint is that it could take up to 3 weeks to have your savings post to your account.  It would also be helpful if the app showed the pending receipts that have been submitted through a rewards card.

title: Awesome!

title: Doesn't work
body: I haven't tried earlier versions but I can say that I've tried using loyalty cards at the store which would not scan at the register (the card even had a savingstar logo on it) and for another store I can't get the app to link my loyalty card (won't do anything when I press "link" button). Other cards have linked but honestly with the requirement of having to buy $15 or $12 worth of product to get a rebate (even a decent one) it's not worth it. I don't need or want $15 worth of pie filling or creamer. With many of these items if I am going to venture to try something new and change my buying habits (which is presumed to be the goal of these apps) I don't want to buy enough to feed an army without knowing if I'm even going to like it. I'll stick with Ibotta.

title: Great Savings App!
body: This is a great app for saving money on groceries.  I like how there are many offers that are the same month after month but that they also post some unique offers from time to time.  The freebie items are great and I love that the offers can be combined with coupons and store sales.  Some coupon apps have limited quantities but I've never been denied my credit because they have run out of rebates (like Checkout 51!).  I just wish they could process receipts faster...Ibotta always notifies me before exiting the app whereas SavingStar takes up to a week.
