If you use Walmart MAYBE it will work easier as the one time I did it was easier for 1 item but I shop at Redners and even though it took my rewards card it NEVER recognizes it to accept the refunds!  I found a place to email so I tried to get help they didn't respond!  GO TO IBOTA!

title: My favorite App!!
body: I love this app for savings the easy way!!!

title: Great idea if one can use coupons more than once it would be great!!!
body: Best way for savings. I only wish they would give multiple chances to use a coupon for the life period of the coupon.

title: Deleting it!
body: I haven't used this app much because you can't stack manufactured coupons with the offers unless it is a "buy $20 get $5" offer. I always use coupons so it's taken a while to rack up a little money.  All my other receipts were one to two items submitted at a time. Worked fine.  I was going to delete the app because I don't use it much but wanted to reach my cash out limit first.  I submitted a receipt with 6 rebates equalling $6.25.  I did not use manufacture coupons because I wanted the rebates to cash out.  Took 12 days to process my receipt then I didn't get 2 of my rebates equaling $3.50 ..and what do you know I'm 25 cents short to cash out.  Sent a message to customer support...no response. I'm not waiting for that other 25 cents it's getting deleted now.   Save your time and frustration.  Get ibotta and mobisave.  Best two out right now and NO problems with customer support!!  Update:  customer support got back to me and gave me my money back so I kept it.  However several months down the road and they are back at it again.  If I submit one item per receipt at a time there are no issues.  If I have more than one they ALWAYS leave off at least one offer.  This time it was for both beech nut baby food.  1) "spend $15 get $4" 2) "buy 5 natural or organics get $1" I spent $15 PLUS got an additional 5 jars to be on the safe side.  They gave me the $1 but didn't give me the $4 for spending $15.  I've had it.  Saving star is the only rebate app that I have to contact customer support to get the money back that was promised.  Honestly don't waste your time.  They need to hire better staff to look at the receipts and give back what is promised without the hassle of contacting them every time!  Update #2: Once again rebates were not given to me and with no explanation.  What is sad is that I sent them an email when I submitted the receipt telling them "because I have had numerous problems getting my rebates in the past I'm letting you know what is due to me.  You can check the receipts I submitted for verification." After sending the email scanning all barcodes and submitting my receipt I got 2 rebates out of 6.  I sent them another email saying they were a joke and once again I am missing rebates.  The ONLY reason why I have kept the app is because I do save money when items have multiple rebates (same item on ibotta saving star checkout 51 etc). And because although I have to email them numerous times I eventually get my rebates.  If I do not get them even 1 time the app is gone and I will find a way to report it. ????

title: Needs help
body: This app needs help. If you put in 6 rebates you might get 3 even though I clarified before I bought the item that it was the right one. Every time I put in for rebates I might get half. Ibotta is much more reliable. Not recommended.

title: Great app for saving money
body: I have used this app for over a year and I love it. Never had any issues redeeming offers or cashing out to PayPal. Highly recommend this for an extra savings on a variety of products!

title: Takes forever and rarely works
body: I don't understand why anyone uses this app especially if they've tried Ibotta. You have to wait days to find out if your receipt is approved and once you hear back half the time it's not. You have the option to resubmit but that receipt is long gone. Ibotta gives approval within minutes and their barcode scanner actually works. The ss scanner usually doesn't work and when it does it often says it's not a qualifying item even it clearly is (this has happened repeatedly with larabars).  Anyway try this and Ibotta. You'll stick with Ibotta.

title: LOVE IT!!!
body: I love SavingStar. They always have promotions on products that use. I've been using their app for over 2 years and never had any problems with the app or promotions. Sometimes it takes long to update the amout but I havent had any problems with them not adding the right amount.

title: Great app
body: Love this app. Never has a problem and has great customer support!!

title: Still waiting over a month for reward!
body: Update...still waiting for reward I redeemed a month ago. Got another auto email response.  App processing is slower than ever. Now when you submit for a reward they say 2-3 days but I've been waiting over a week. Sent in a request to support and got a canned response that they would answer in 2-4 WEEKS!

title: Utter crap
body: App is crap! The scanner doesn't work! Wasted a good 20 minutes trying to scan something in. I rather use checkout 51 or ibotta.

title: Nope.
body: I used to LOVE SavingStar but the new version is awful. It won't load. Period. At all. It hasn't worked since it updated and I find this incredibly frustrating.

title: Reasonable
body: I like that the offers are switched out about once a month with a weekly produce item and a few others throughout the month - no rush to redeem yet you know new offers are coming.  I like that some stores work with the keychain discount cards so you avoid the hassle of photographing your receipt ...but if you forget to scan the keychain you're out of luck because they won't let you add it after the fact.  I've had mixed results with redemption.  Good luck with produce and single item redemptions but real issues with the one that require a cumulative purchase.  If you are vigilant though customer service will credit you eventually if you can prove you bought enough.  Overall it's worth the time but it's not a huge money saver like some of its competitors but it's also not a flash in the pan.  I've had this program for years - before I even owned a smart phone.

title: Frustrating
body: The app is only giving me partial credit for some of my purchases and completely skipped over others. The only reason I made these purchases was because of the rebate. How frustrating!!!!

title: Not as good as before
body: This app used to be great. It takes forever for card stores to post credits the app takes forever to load (esp when I am in the store and need it to vfy that a product will qualify) a lot of times the UPC comes up saying does not qualify when the product clearly does and when you need customer service it takes weeks for anyone to get back to you (even though they can send an auto generated email saying "hey we did not forget about you"). I will say though when they do however finally get back to you the customer service is excellent. It just takes WAY too long.

title: Mom
body: I love SavingStar! Thanks for the opportunity to save more on groceries! :)

title: Great App
body: Wonderful way to save money!  This app makes it easy to save money on regular purchases!

title: Savingstar
body: I enjoy using this app helps save money. I do have an issue with the most current update it's almost impossible to scan the items! I don't know if the barcode scanner changed or what but now it takes forever for me to scan my items! Very annoying! I use other apps where I have to scan my items and have no problem.

title: Money saver
body: I love this app!!!!

title: It's useful not the best
body: Very slow on redemptions but generally has items that match other rebate apps or store coupons so you can get twice as much back.

title: Love it!!!
body: Love love love this app. Easy to use. Just link your rewards cards and it automatically credits your account some stores can take up to 22 days for the credit to your account.

title: Favorite App
body: Truly one of the best apps!

title: A So/So Ap
body: We use this ap mostly at Reasors in Oklahoma we don't buy many packaged products so we probably use an average of one deal a week. That ap interface is great it's the deals that are so/so. It's really nice that it's linked directly to the rewards card though so we don't have to scan receipts.

title: Great
body: Very easy to use especially with the connected cards.

title: Does not work
body: I down loaded the app but it will not work. It says "finding available offers " and just spends around. It is stuck on getting store cards. I have even tried deleting it and down loading it again. I have deleted it twice. I give up.

title: Misty
body: I love this app with the $5 back for buying products it's very quick to get to $10 cash out!!

title: Great way to save!
body: I have been using this app for years now and it is a great way to save money. However it's much more difficult now that The Kroger card doesn't work to automatically savings and you have to submit each receipt.  I like using it because the offers are linked to the card.

title: EASY to save!!
body: Love this app....no need to clip coupons get to the store with them and try and remember to hand them to cashier.  Simple & easy......a little cash back for a rainy day!!

title: Happy
body: I love it! It may take sometime but hey it's FREE money peeps. I recommended it... you buy these items so why not make some mula from it? Thanks for making this available to everyone.

title: A great and simple app
body: I hooked up my Food Lion card and have a return of just over 200 dollars over the course of the last 1 1/2 years.  Simple way of saving money on things I buy regularly. This app is a no brainer. My girlfriend loves it because I use the savings to buy her her favorite new books!

title: Love this app!!
body: I've gotten back about $15 from this app so far. Very easy to use

title: Love love love this app
body: This app is absolutely one of the best apps I'm would saying tied with ibotta ....the only minor differences is it takes longer to show up on your account but you get to cash out at only 5.00 a plus

title: Heartease
body: Love it . Have received cash back on items I regularly buy. They have 100% back on some items at least once a month! Only have to have $5 to get a cash out!

title: Never works for me
body: Some people have had luck with this app unfortunately I have not! It is constantly denying the receipts I submit claiming "The offers on the receipt you submitted did not qualify for savings you have not met the purchase requirements"  which is BS. When it says you have to buy two items for the offer and I purchased two items and the items are visible on the receipt I viewed on their website something is off! Don't waste your time with this one ibotta is way better. Never had a problem with them and you can scan the receipt instead of wasting your time taking a pointless picture that will be denied anyway! Deleting app!

title: Not that great!
body: I find this app difficult and time consuming to use. It takes too long to load and to recieve your money.

title: App not working
body: The multiple purchases rarely work and I have to email customer service every time. H app scans then which proves you bought them but then they say you didn't meet the requirement of two purchase. Customer service always reviews and the receipt show they are there so then you get a credit.

title: Happy$$$
body: I have been using this app for about a month and so far have been able to save on some of my most used products.  I especially like the offers that pay more for buying several of certain brands.  I highly recommend this app.

title: Bad App
body: This app has too many issues. The whole link to card doesn't work or takes  forever. Should just have option to take photo of your receipt. Plus 5 to 10 days for a response if there is an issue ( we'll probably because everyone is having a problem) Save your time and download a better money saving app.

title: Constant problems
body: They always seem to have problems with my receipts . I'll submit a receipt with items for rebates but it seems like i am always getting an email saying they can't accept it. They say the item wasn't on the receipt. When it clearly is. I have to email them back and resubmit the receipt. Just a hassle. Ibotta is so much easier.

title: Freezes a lot
body: There are some great offers on the app but more often than not I end up with the spinning star when I'm in the store and I can't verify my activated offers. It's very frustrating.

title: Great app!
body: Great app! Easy to use fast payout!

title: Needs improvement
body: Love the app...the only negative is that u have to stay on top of what coupons you've clipped. They sometimes don't reimburse you the money so you have to make sure to contact them so they can put the money back into your account. I can say that in 6 months of using the app they have done this twice. Other than that app is great.

title: Horrible app!
body: I have done everything I possibly can and this app cheats me out of rebates every time! The receipts I submit (when I'm able to submit them because most of the time the app won't even let me scan barcodes to verify purchases) cannot get more clear than they are and yet I still get emails telling me it couldn't process the receipt! I have tried submitting receipts ever 20 times and not once have they been approved. Total waste of time! I suggest ibotta checkout 51 and find & save...they work perfectly fine!

title: Not worth the trouble
body: This updated version of their app does not allow me to scan multiple upcs  when uploading receipts with my iPhone. I never had this problem prior to the update. Customer service is too slow in responding.

title: Former favorite
body: I used to love my SavingStar app. Now it will not open. I have to submit receipts at SavingStar.com and they usually come back with a problem. It takes way too long to get a response from customer service and some rebates have never been credited. The organization of the offers is also now very confusing. Please bring this app back to it's old glory.

title: Not loving the update.
body: I love this app but do not love the most recent update. It has really slowed things down takes forever to load or to activate items. I feel like the new update is counterproductive. If I could uninstall it I would. I have great difficulty scanning items. It takes a long time to recognize what I'm trying to scan. Just disappointing.

title: Best rebate app!
body: I love this app. So easy to use. Get money back on stuff that I already buy for my family!

title: Quirky but generally effective
body: The latest version of this app works reasonably well even on store wi-fi networks with limited handwidth.  I've noticed a quirk with the bar code scanner when I try to see if one product qualifies for an offer; either the bar code will scan within a few seconds or it won't scan at all.  I've also seen inconsistencies when scanning for example a code that scans and at first reports the item does not qualify then scanning it a second time results in a positive response.   I would also value the ability to sort offers by their expiration.   Perhaps a "scan as you go" utility to track your own progress toward the "one or many" promotions would be useful.  This way we can avoid purchasing too many items in our attempts to make the redemption.  Sometimes I'd like to remove items from the shopping list also.  Aside from that it works reasonably well.

title: Good but needs a little work...
body: One of my favorite apps!! Right there with ibotta!! I really love that you can cash out at $5. Instead of $20 or $30 in that area it beats ibotta. Also every now and then they will put up a 100% reimbursement item. The last one was either Morton salt or York peppermint patty  (Love those I never thought I would get excited about salt or a York bar but when it's free it makes me happy) I hope this app is here to stay. Definitely worth downloading you will love it!

title: Amazing savings
body: A click of a button makes saving so easy my favorite app out of the three I use. So easy and fast

title: Love this App
body: This is my favorite App. I have made more $$ with this App than Ibotta (next in line for a $$ maker). Only draw back is it does take a few weeks for your rebates to hit if your grocery card is loaded into the App. I can live with that.

title: I love this app
body: I have made over 21 dollars on this app in just 6 months

title: Yet again another problem!
body: Savings Star used to be my favorite coupon app.!!!! No longer because of the lengthy processing time for rebates and customer service inquiries go unanswered. I have found that the other savings apps. IBOTTA Checkout 51 Mobi Save Ebates are much easier to use and VERY quick with their payout. Same day credit! Love it!  I have been very unhappy with this app. since it has upgraded but unfortunately not upgraded its customer service.  Almost each week if I submit a receipt something is wrong or not credited correctly.  The most saddening complaint is the amount of time it takes for payout. A long time passes in order to receive your $ in account and almost always when you scan a product that clearly should qualify based on the description of it ......it doesn't. So many better coupon apps. that are quick clear and very easier to use. Not This One! I have been a loyal user for over 2 years and I am seriously rethinking this app.

title: Bar code scanner needs work
body: Good luck getting anything to scan. Scanner is sporadic at best. Can't get it to scan 90% of the time. Please fix!!!

title: Good but needs improvement
body: I like that they updated the app so you can just see what you've activated but I wish we could sort by expiration date and sort by new offers. Also many times new offers appear but they don't say "new".

title: Great way to save
body: Awesome app!!!

title: iPhone app
body: This app has become increasingly slow to load. I give up after 5 minutes and use the website. The offers are no longer in expiration date order and I often do not ever get my rebates except for ones that I scan in a receipt. It's sad that this app gets worse with each update. Ibotta is much better; you get your rebate in a few hours.

title: Worst rebate app ever
body: The scanner won't scan any of my products! So I can't even claim offers. I've only used the new version twice and have had to contact support both times! What's the point? It's a big time waster. I will probably cash out and dump this app.

title: Can't shop without it
body: This is such a great app. I've earned a lot of rewards with this app. They always have great items to earn money back from! One of my best apps!

title: Best rebate app EVER!!
body: Fun app easy to understand appropriate rebates for all people and all levels of incomes.

title: Delays
body: Customer service takes a long time if ever to get back to people. Still waiting almost 3 weeks to inquire why a upc doesnt match for a obvious matched rebate. And i am not getting credit for items using my cvs card. A little frustrating that i cant get answers. Now the new app doesn't want to scan bar codes. Guess it's simple time to stop using this app.

title: Great app!!
body: Great app!  Always have products that I use. Have saved lots of money with savingstar!  Only thing is that I miss having the automatic saving from my Bi-Lo card.

title: Great App
body: One of my favorite apps. Lots of great savings to be found. Works great and highly recommend it.

title: Scanner is awful takes forever to load
body: This last update ruined this app. It takes forever to start up and won't scan the bar codes reliably at all. It used to be fine.

title: LOVE IT
body: Who doesn't like free money!?!?  The new layout is nice so you don't have to switch screens to see what you have activated.  I see what I can save up for the year & use some towards my husbands Christmas gifts so he doesn't know what I charge.

title: New update takes forever to load
body: I love this app it's my favorite much better than ibotta (they like to lock you out and steal your money) I have gotten almost $40 off this app and never once a problem until they updated it and now it's slow and I have a problem getting it to load new offers hope they fix this soon because this was a 5 star app my most favorite app but now it's just so aggravating waiting and waiting for it to load I just end up giving up because I wait like 10 mins just for it to open and then there is a delay after you select the offer it's become more time consuming than its worth

title: Easy money!!!
body: Love this app. No cutting coupons. Easiest money I've ever made!!!

title: TOO FRUSTRATING!!
body: Too many glitches. Good offers but not worth the frustration. Times out shuts down in the middle of redemption and slow to start up. Not worth the hour to save $1.50.

title: The best
body: The rebates are great! Easy to use.

title: Love it
body: I love the rebates they have. I have saved a lot of money with this app.

title: Awesome App
body: It's free money! What's better?!

title: Love this app!
body: Love the products offered and the rebate amounts - no complaints!

title: Easy!
body: This is truly the easiest app to make money back on grocery purchases!

title: By far the worst rebate app
body: This is by far the most problematic rebate app I have used.  I have a receipt that clearly shows I bought 2 of an item and they said that i don't qualify for a rebate because their app only said I bought one.  I contacted their customer service 4 times about this and finally got a response that they are correct. Basically I think they make it hard to claim rebates so you give up.  If I ever get this sorted out and get $5 I am not going to use this app anymore.  It is not worth the hassle. With the new update it is also really hard to scan upcs.  You have to get lucky to get any upc to scan.   Ibotta is a much better app.

title: Amazing App!
body: I love love love this app! The only thing is that I wish we can somehow submit a receipt from a store that's supposed to automatically report to Savings Star. Sometimes the item I bought does not get credit to my account. Other than that it's amazing!!

title: Love it but....
body: I absolutely love SS and have been using it for over a year. The last update tho has greatly slowed things down.

title: Need more rebates
body: I really love this app but it needs more rebates. It's easy to use and the payout is fast which I loved!!! I also wish the process for redeeming was a little faster like Ibotta. Overall it's a real good app for couponers.

title: Good app quick money making
body: I like this app. The rebates are quick to be approved or reflected. Some stores are taking a bit of time sending the information to the app but it comes. Easy to cash out!

title: Loved! ❤️????????????
body: One of the few good apps. Customer service is fantastic and app has a sign in so you won't lose your credit - should you need Apple Inc. repairs. Good rebates and I love the healthy food offers.

title: Like and Dislike
body: Love the rebates. Do not like how slow it loads ever since the new update.

title: Latest Update needs improvements
body: Great money saving app but they need to fix a few things

title: Useful
body: I occasionally have a few problems with this app but I'm pleased with the savings received.

title: Started out great but
body: This app was great for about two weeks. Then I was not credited my rebates. After several emails and several weeks I'm still missing several rebates. My favorite email so far after the ten day waiting period was  an automated email that stated "we have not forgotten about you." That was a month ago and the rebate is long expired. I read other reviews where they were told the store logo was missing or the date was missing even though it was clearly there. That seems to be my issue as well so I even send a screen shot of the app showing all this information from my receipt in their app. Still no answers or rebates. Their customer service is a joke. I've only gotten one reply back crediting me $.50 for my troubles when I'm actually missing $19 in rebates. Once I hit $5 I'll be cashing out and deleting the app.

title: Great app for easy savings!
body: It works!  Was easy to use and easy to get cash-back as advertised for items purchased.    I would have given it 5 stars except for it didn't recognize the produce code from the receipt on a broccoli item.  Without a barcode I wasn't able to get reimbursed for that item.  Not a big deal as all the other items with bar codes worked perfectly.  May try a produce item again just to see if I have better luck next time.   I've already used it successfully at two different grocery stores.  Will use this app again and would recommended.

title: What's the use if no barcodes will scan?
body: I couldn't get any of my barcodes to scan. What's the use? Deleted

title: Great app
body: I love this app. I save money even when I forget my coupons!

title: It's not working
body: After I log in it sits on "Finding available offers" and never goes to the offers.

title: Excellent app! Saved $300 in less than 1 yr
body: Don't go grocery shopping without using this app. I've had very little issues with not getting reimbursements. The Healthy options of the week encourage you to buy more fruits and veggies which is nice. If you like saving money you need this app!

title: Play Money!!!
body: SavingStar is one of a few apps I use to save money on purchases... I let my account grow until we go on vacation a little extra play money never hurt anyone especially when you can accrue that money on items you're already going to purchase!

title: Mrs.
body: It might be very nice but after I downloaded it it would not let me sign up.  As soon as I entered two letters for a password it shut down every time.  After five attempts I gave up.  Very disappointing.

title: Update Horrible!
body: I really do like this app but since it has been updated I am unable to take photo of the UPC codes and receipts. It's only this app that I am unable to take photos for rebates. I have emailed with my situation and the different rebates that I needed to submit. Week later still no response? If someone can help me please let me know. Thanks

title: App rate
body: Would be a good coupon app if they response to my question.  I did prove I purchased these items along with the date it was purchased.  Waiting for credit.

title: Terrible updates
body: Was a great app but every update makes it harder and harder to use quickly and efficiently. Now it's like jumping through hoops and laborious just to see what your rebates are. Still a good rebate selection just hard to organize and follow now that it's not designed to list items by expiration dates.

title: Waste of time
body: Total rip off. Bought all items as indicated. Scanned a perfect receipt. Didn't get the credit. This happened on several items. I double checked to make sure I had the right items (example: 3 progresso soups)  I had it right and they rejected it. Their app also has glitches and uploading receipts is cumbersome. I recommend ibotta checkout51 and receipt hog

title: Love it! Great offers!
body: I love this app! The offers are awesome and those I use!

title: Disappointed
body: Started off as a wonderful rebate site but now almost every time I submit a receipt at least one rebate I claimed was not given to me.

title: Great App
body: The rebates are awesome. You do get within a week. Love the healthy offer every week. Used my added rebates last year on Christmas dinner shopping  last year.

title: New Version is Horrible
body: The new version of this app is horrible. It takes forever to load. Instead of coming to the log on screen when you open it you have to tap several times before you can log in toget to the correct screen. Not worth the hassle for the limited coupon deals. If they were that great they should have everything the Sunday paper has.

title: Inaccurate and slow
body: Update: the newest version will not load at all on my iPhone and hasn't for the last week.  Impossible to use = I'm giving up on this app.  I like getting grocery discounts as much as anyone with Ibotta and coupons.com effectively on speed dial around here.  Savings Star seemed like a fun addition.  It is sort of and I do like the weekly healthy offers and the occasional free thing.  But it's so slow (a week to get credit sometimes) and worse so inaccurate!  Easily 1/4 of the receipts I submit are mis-credited with items missing completely or credit for only one of three items (with their "save $5 for $20 total" types of deals).  Customer service is largely unresponsive and again as slow as erosion.  I am giving it until the end of 2015 to improve and then I'll delete if it not.

title: Great additional savings
body: I love this app. It's a great way to save even more on my grocery bill.

title: Great app
body: Great app. Easy to use

title: Saving Star is the BEST!!!!
body: Saving Star is the BEST!!!!

title: Update frustrating
body: For the most part I like the app and have been pretty successful at saving some money.  Recently every receipt I've submitted states my account is not valid and I've submitted a couple emails to get no response.  Also in the past I've purchased items that are valid and the UPC won't read as a valid item.  I've had the app for around 4 months and had to contact customer service 5 times.  I'd say those odds are not great!  When you contact customer service or should I say lack of customer service you get nothing.  I had to go to social media to get a mediocre response that then referred me to contact the same crappy service if I had more questions.  The new update is slow and the lack of service and no upfront notice about policy's makes me give SavingStar a poor rating.

title: Savy Shopper
body: I saved money using this app.  I try not to buy anything I don't need.

title: Just Ok
body: Needs work many products don't qualify for offers scanning is SLOW takes toolong to get rebates credited. There are a nice variety of deals and love the freebies but needs to be more user friendly like Ibotta.

title: App is slow but reliable
body: Unlike some of the other grocery saving apps I never worry whether I'll actually get credit here and that's what I love about savingstar. The healthy offers are great and who can pass up a 100% freebie? My only complaint is the app itself is very slow to open And it's not the most user friendly interface.

title: Love this app!
body: I love this app. It is easy to use and has lots of good grocery items to choose from. I have gotten quite a bit of money back using it.

title: SavingStar has awesome rebate rewards!!!
body: I feel the rebates they offer make them a 5 star app. The new app update is why I give the app 4 stars.  Before update it was much easier to scan barcodes to match products.  But overall my favorite rebate app!!

title: Needs adjustments
body: I preferred the old version. This version is not in "about to expire" order and i truly hate that. Also if a store is "scan card" only than that needs to change. If a card does not get scanned or the scan turns into an error issue but is not noticed until well after the trans is done there should be an option  to enter the info like the non scan card stores. Cust. Service needs to hurry their butts up bc 5-10 reply on a question is beyond ridiculous. This version seems to take longer to load and the earned option always fights with me to load so i have issues seeing where my earnings are at. I do love that we do not need $20 minimum to cash out and the offers are always what I use and so many others use which is fantastic. Those are the only upsides to this app. I would give 4 stars but the pros do not outweigh the cons.

title: Saving star
body: Love this App. The savings are great because it is a variety of products for everyone.. It's also easy to get your rebate.. I have never had a problem and all I can say is keep up the good job !!!

title: Won't run
body: Been using a few years. Suddenly the app does not work. Will not update either. Also would not delete on phone. Deleted bus iTunes. Now it will not load onto phone. Not useful as mobile device while actually shopping. Considering cashing out and quitting.

title: Too good to be true.
body: The plus for saving star is the types of offers and products available. However their receipt verifying measures need to be updated or fixed. Of the six receipts I have submitted in five weeks HALF have come back not having given me credit for an offer and the receipts are clearly legible and the products are correct. Then customer service takes more than a few days which they warn but is still annoying. Comparatively I've been an Ibotta user for 20 months and have only had two issues that were promptly resolved. The savings are almost not worth the headache with this app.

title: Hmmm
body: Most of my receipts from a certain store "cannot be processed". Once or twice is understandable but three to four times per week?!?! It's crazy! I mostly shop at Publix but this app don't seem to like Publix receipts. Needs fixing.

title: Wonderful but need to fix
body: The app is great. It's wonderful. But ever since the recent update they did to it it seems like it takes a bit longer for everything to load. Wish they would fix it????

title: Cash back
body: Best app for get cash back for groceries and household stuff

title: Works fine
body: This app works fine when I remember to use it. Nothing bad to say about it!

title: New app version comes with an infinite amount of frustration
body: So I've been using SS for awhile now. They just updated the barcode scanner and I rarely can Make it work.  I will literally try for 10 min to scan one barcode. Lately I am having more luck but that doesn't mean much.  Still when you can't scan a barcode 40% of the time it is frustrating. Also and here is a big tip: make the phone light Come on when taking a photo. Mobisave and others do this and the picture it takes is CLEAR!! Also I emailed cust service about above problem 2/13/16 and received a 2nd automated response today saying they will get back to me and haven't forgotten about me.  I've contacted them three times and one of the three I got a personalized answer within 2 days. The other two? Not so much. 10+ days of no answers. Although I will say from a customer service point of view it is nice to get an email that says "we know u r waiting and haven't forgotten" type thing.   There are great benefits to this app and they have great cash back offers with lots of variety. I like using stores that I can link a card to BC then I don't have to snap a pic.  That's the biggest plus. I also like you can get your money in increments of $10. Not have to wait till you hit $20 like many.  So overall a 5/10.  The technology has got to be updated especially when smaller companies that do rebates have got the technology to take a clear crisp photo of the receipt.  Go to the old version of scanning the barcode!! That was much better!!!! Easy!  Ibotta has it to where you just barely point it in the direction of the barcode scanner and it works so fast!  But there are more plus' than minus' so I will keep using.

title: DO NOT UPDATE: IT'S AWFUL!!!!!!!
body: App updated automatically... Believe me I would not have intentionally done this to myself. The newest version it is just plain awful!   Reasons:  1) Rebates are not organized by expiration which makes no sense. 2) Layout is confusing and far from user friendly. 3) The colors are terrible on my eyes... Everything just blurs into.. One big ugh. 4) My Kmart card is no longer linked. Cannot figure how to link it back.   Can I please have my old version back? Please.

title: Could be better
body: This app would be so much easier to use if you could search for an offer instead of having to scroll scroll scroll.  Also it would be nice to see the  offers that you have not yet claimed without having to scroll through also.   Also I need to hold onto my receipts to make sure I get the rebates and often have to email for missing rebates which then takes days to get resolved.

title: Awesome free money
body: Rebates on things I already buy! Love it

title: Love this app!
body: This is by far my favorite coupon app ever!  It is so easy to use and I love that I don't have to take a picture of the receipt.

title: Must have app

title: Love it!

title: Disappearing money!!!..

I do however get very frustrated that I need to email them often as the "buy 2" rebates never work. Customer service says that you didn't scan all items when you really did -- so there obviously is a problem with their rebate system. On the bright side customer service credits your account. All in all great app.

title: good app

They took a long time to answer an email I had sent and by the time they responded and told me to resubmit the receipt and barcode I had thrown it away. Lesson learned! Keep all receipts!!!

title: Customer experience

Seems to have continued to be an ongoing problem.  Great news the staff is truly "working hard to resolve each and every issue".  (They aren't just saying it.)

title: Takes way too long and it gets overlooked

They are at least 3 weeks behind and offers are gone by the time they reimburse them so it's hard to keep track of what is needed to receive a rebate and there isn't time to redeem them more than once if you buy the item weekly etc. don't hold your breath...

title: Could be great but...

title: Decent app

title: It's ok
body: I like the app but there are a few problems. I've had issues with not receiving credit for submitted receipts and it takes a long time for them to process them. Lately the app won't open at all!!!

title: Great App

I like to wait until I have 40 or 50 dollars in mine and treat the family to a little bit of fun.

I cannot get any rebates at this store because the app can't seem to understand that there is no loyalty card. I'm deleting this app as soon as I get to $10.

title: Savings Star

title: Frustrating to use
body: I don't normally write reviews but this app used to be easy but now it's getting more and more difficult to use. First it takes forever for "star guy" to load. If you link your card it takes weeks to get your rebate credited and you better hope that you keep track of what you bought because it may or may not show up with a rebate. If you submit yours manually I have found lately that the new update makes the scanner so hard to use. Sometimes I can't even get the item to scan and I give up. I also wish with the front list of offers there was a way to filter by category and or expiration date of offer.

title: Worst app for rebates on the market

Kellogg's family rewards recently went to a receipt upload process that is cumbersome and takes ages but it works. SavingStar is the three weeks I have used it crashes errors out during multiple steps of the process and their support is unresponsive. I have taken it upon myself to delete and reinstall turn my phone on and off but to no avail. Kellogg's is bad....but my goodness SavingStar doesn't work and is now gone from my phone.

I don't like the new app and I have become very disappointed with Savings Star.

title: Saving star review
body: While I enjoy using Savimgstar. It has become more difficult since most of my stores have gone from scanning card to sending receipt. A few times they have said receipt not readable. I find this creates a time problem and sometimes duplicate purchases because they are not posted in a timely manner. However staff is very helpful but it takes too long. I had to resend a receipt by e mail 2x and now they posted some of the items and left off 3. I even tried with this receipt making sure only my activated items were on it so that they would see exactly my purchases and nothing else. I even put a mark so they can again see more clearly. I sincerely hope it gets better for scanning photos

Then when you contact CS it takes WEEKS to get a response. I'm deleting this app. There are much better rebate apps out there that credit instantly. Ibotta is a good one. Don't waste your time.

title: Nice but
body: Nice but slow on processing.

title: Good but could be ( a lot) better!
body: I've been using Saving Star for a while but the same problems exists & have not been addressed. Often there are products that offered but aren't recognized by the app. For instance  there was an offer for Charmin mega roll toilet paper. When I purchased it from Target the UPC code wasn't recognized. I took pictures of the item & the  barcode & submitted them.  It took over 2 weeks for support to respond. When they finally did they issued me a "courtesy credit" while saying I didn't purchase the item in question. When I questioned that response they never responded. Over a week ago I purchased an item that also didn't scan.  The only difference between that item and another that did scan was that the item I chose had a bonus amount of 35% more (at the same price). I took pictures of both & submitted them and I'm still awaiting a response. I recently submitted a receipt of an item that I purchased before I 'd activated the offer .  It was denied less than 24hrs later. I suggested (more than a few times) that have a way to submit & address the items that I've described with just as quick a response. Once you activate an item you cannot deactivate it.  This matters because most of this items have max number of redemptions. I accidentally activated an item once but couldn't undo it.  It was something I had no intention of buying. A couple of times I've tried to activate item that have reached their max.  There is no way of knowing what the max is or whether or not those activations are actually redeemed. Saving Star has some work to do.

title: Money back on stuff I buy
body: Heck yeah! There is some work involved but nothing in life is free.

title: Slow Customer service
body: The rebates are great but if you have a problem beware. I am still waiting for a response from 3 weeks ago on an item I purchased 4 weeks ago. You have to stay on top of it or you lose your rebate! I keep a log of requests so I don't forget any!

title: Keeps on crashing

title: Great coupons

title: Latest update stinks

title: Great way to save
body: Just started using this app.  So far have $11 out of two shopping trips.  Fast and relatively convenient way to save money.

title: Love SavingStar...HATE the update!
body: Like others have said I too very much enjoy this app. It's saved me lots of money and has been an all around positive experience for me dealing with customer service on occasion. That being said I despise this update! Honestly it was perfectly fine the way it was before and now it's become much more clumsy to navigate around the app. The display is all wonky looking under the account button. Oh and it won't let me cash out. It says that I put in the wrong password which I know is incorrect.  Also I tried to submit a receipt and it kept crashing over and over.  VERY frustrating when there are time restrictions on when you can submit for these offers. One suggestion for the next update add a search bar so we don't have to scroll through all the offers. That can be tedious and time consuming especially while in the store. Love SavingStar but this update was a step in the wrong direction. Please return the app to how it was before!

title: New update is slow
body: I don't like the update. It takes a long time now for the app to open. Activating your offers is also inconvenient. You have to scroll thru all the offers to see if there are any new. Loved the old interface. Took 2 minutes to check everyday.

title: Not so happy

title: Best app overall
body: I use 6 different savings apps and overall SavingStar is the best!  They offer the largest number of rebates for products I actually use and response time is fairly quick.  The few times I have had problems with receiving credit for a purchase customer service has responded and corrected the issue within a couple of weeks.  My only suggestion would be to add more stores (Aldi Fred's etc) since their rebates do not include them at this time.

title: Hate the new update!
body: Loved using this in the past! It's was so easy and so convenient but this new update is horrible!!!! It takes so long for the App to open and when you click within the App it takes a while to refresh! What used to take me about 2 minutes to use now takes about 10!! Feeling frustrated!

title: Poor customer service

title: Awful

title: So far so good

title: I LOVE Savings Star

title: Bring back Friday Freebies
body: Can't stand the latest update.  Change it back immediately.  I can't get to the details of an offer from the shopping list. I have to go back to offers to see if a product qualifies.  Activated offers remain in the offers list meaning the list gets bulky and hard to read.  There's no way to display the shopping list with product pictures. The update stinks.  Why did you change things?

I buy Beech-Nut all the time and it was on my activated list and still nothing. What a waste of time.

title: Just plain simple

title: Support is non existent and they pay less and less
body: This was my first savings app. Excited to do it until I actually used it. I have shopping cards attached they say those take up to 22 days it's been more than 30 and no rebates. The uploads of receipts for produce have not been paid. And many of the spend so much get so much have never even credited to my account. I've email customer service 12 times and no answer as of yet. I would not recommend this to anyone. There are much better apps that load the rebates immediately and are great. I won't use this anymore if I don't get what I'm owed.

I purchased some Glade candles for the any Glade product rebate and it wouldn't take any of them. It has done this with a few other products as well. Waste of time.

title: New update isn't the greatest
body: Savings Star is awesome. I recommend it to anyone who wants to save money on groceries. There are a lot of good deals on items I regularly buy. But I don't like this latest update for silly reasons. When you view your activated offers list it is no longer organized by expiration date. It makes it just that much harder to plan shopping trips. And now the activated offers still appear in the available offers list so when I'm looking for new offers to activate I have to scroll through all the ones I've already activated. Like I said silly things but it's just less convenient. If those 2 things changed back to how they used to be I'd give 5 stars.

title: Upgrade issues

title: Like

title: Love It but....

title: Customer service very slow

One of the huge drawbacks is very slow customer service. It often takes more than two weeks to get an answer if I have a problem. Also Publix receipts are very slow to credit. Finally online stores take a month to credit

title: I love saving star but don't like update
body: I love saving star. It's easy to use. But this new update is a pain. I couldn't get it to load while I was shopping. I worked fine before I don't why they had to change it. Plus I don't like the look of it either. Blah. It looks like it downgraded. I use an iPhone. So it should look better. Please fix.

title: User friendly
body: I actually love this app as it is user friendly and the limit is $5 to cash in. If I have a problem I email their support and it gets resolved right away. Money comes in within 2 days. I am a 1 person 1 dog household so there isn't much selection for me but overall have gotten back over $20 in a year.  Please note you have to read the emails they send you or look in app frequently bc of so many users not enough rebates for all.

title: A++++
body: The app is amazing. Works great for saving extra money. Easy to use.

title: iPone app needs bug fix
body: I am not liking the iPhone app. Every time I try to select an item the app closes. In order to receive my savings I have to use my computer and scan my receipt. Other than the long process of the items and sending receipt I have been satisfied with app

title: Hopeful though
body: I purchased specified items in the required quantities on Jan 18 and 21 which amounted to $8+ in earned rebates.  However I was only credited with $1.52 on Feb 2.  No explanation was provided for the small amount I received so I e-mailed SavingStar on Feb 2 inquiring the reason for the discrepancy.  I received an immediate response from them that I would hear back in 5-10 days.    So far I am not personally sold on this app; as I read the reviews some have great success while others of us are left wondering where we went wrong.  I'm hoping for a reasonable explanation for the discrepancy between what I earned and what they credited me with.  While I won't throw in the towel yet this is a rocky start at best.

title: Don't download this app
body: You never get most of the rewards you send in receipt for and when you contact them they either don't answer or they  try and make an excuse for why it wasn't accepts. Even though it's the exact product. Not worth the time or effort

title: Definitely needs improvement
body: Scanning almost never works. I had 9 pizza boxes I had to scan and most of the time it took 6-7 tries each to scan. Also the camera for taking the receipt pictures is blurry. It takes a long time to process receipts. Duplicate offers (which cannot be redeemed.) This needs an update ASAP.

title: Disappointing Savings App
body: SavingStar was one of the first savings apps.  Initially it worked pretty well.  Unfortunately the speed and accuracy of this app has declined.  It takes a week to process submitted receipts and then it is rarely correct.  It takes another week (or longer) to receive a response from SavingStar Support to any inquiry.  The purpose of a savings app is to save money but the user wastes a lot of time trying to use it!!!

title: Great... When it works
body: I love this app I have 4 other apps like it and this one saves me the most hands down HOWEVER as of late it crashes as I'm trying to submit my receipts. I cannot describe the amount of frustration this causes. I have to rescan allllllllll my items and take pictures of my long receipt just for it to crash before it's submitted. I tried last night for over a half hour to submit the same set of groceries over and over. If this glitch was fixed it would be an amazing app!

title: Love!!
body: Love having another way to save money at the grocery store!!!! Easy & quick!!

title: Good App
body: Downloaded app to keep track of cash. Works excellent. Does exactly what I needed it to. Just downloaded full version because I use app almost daily.

title: Doesn't work
body: I contacted customer service still no luck . It won't allow me to add my stores or check offers .  Update on review I'm done this app is trash and only takes up space .   They do not let you redeem purchases .

title: Great App
body: The savings are so simple. It's like a savings account. Love this.

title: SavingStar is the slowest
body: I just signed up to this and ibotta and I get my rebates from ibotta within 48 hrs. I signed up 3 weeks ago and am still waiting for rebated from SavingStar!! They don't even let you know which you are still waiting on since it takes them so long to get you a refund. I will wait another week to see if they deliver the other rebates I entered but blaming on the stores to verify receipts is not legit with me since ibotta has no problem verifying theirs!

title: Disappointed

title: Love it!

The Friday Freebies are usually great (from produce to candy bars to beverages)- an awesome bonus which help to compensate for that. I just wish I'd get notif to remind me abt not to forget it! I'm also unsure of the stack-ability (using printed coupons in conjunction). Manufacturer's coups oft allow for doubling these rebates do not so I'd choose the former if only one choice.  Bottom line- one can't really complain much about a free app offering grocery discounts!

title: Ok app but customer service need improved

title: One of the best!

title: Great APP but needs better variety of coupons
body: Love the saving star app. I save tons of money when doubling with my store cards and manufacture coupons.  However two down sides are coupon selection is very limited and once you select coupon theres no way to deselect unless I'm doing something wrong.  Other than that I highly recommend Saving Star app to all folks interested in saving big bucks while shopping. There's a lot of potential in this app.

title: Fail
body: This app is such a hassle. It takes 10 times longer than other app to get receipts processed. They consistently miss items. Then you have to contact customer service. Takes forever to hear back from them. Literally every time I submit a receipt they miss something.

title: Great way to save money
body: Love this app. It helps me save money on the things we have to buy every day.

title: It really works
body: Nice feature of storing your reward card numbers and automatically doing the discounts for you. I've saved money. They don't do freebie Friday's anymore that stinks :( The selection of products is decent less bundled rebates though in the future hopefully. Overall I get money back and if there is a problem they have fixed it after emailing.

title: Free money!
body: How can you not give an app who gives you free money for buying things you were already going to buy a bad rating?

title: Awesome app
body: I'm using this app to help me build up my daughter's college fund and it's awesome! The only suggestion I have is to make the processing process not have long wait but other than that it's awesome!

title: Worse rebate system!
body: The image capture of the receipts is very poor! It makes your receipt look incoherent! It takes FOREVER to get approved!!! I gave up on this app months ago. I am giving it another try due to the rebate they have will add up to the required cash out of $5. I'm anticipating it not working but have a shred of hope that whoever works on this app has made improvements!!! Other apps are so simple to use...Saving Star makes it difficult!!! Which makes me use it infrequently to never! Ibotta and Mobisave are user friendly and quick... If you are looking to save as many pennies as possible come join me in the trenches with Saving Star!

title: Nothing but issues
body: I've tried several times to use the app and I get error after error. Wouldn't let me login with Facebook finally let me create an account. But now won't add stores or store cards. I give up. Will use other apps.

title: Scannet didn't work and customer service came theough
body: If the scanner our receipt is required for all purchases except CVS its scanner on app should work but it doesn't. How frustrating for a new user! And I have an iPhone 5s not too old and not too new. How am I encouraged to use this app? I made my first purchase and I am already emailing customer service on Facebook and via email. What a terrible waste of time.  (update) I was told to allow app into privacy. In setting go to privacy and camera. scanner came on. I am giving it 3 stars until I see my refund.

title: Awful app
body: Out of 5 receipts submitted 0 were approved. I'm quite certain I submitted the receipts correctly. My friend had the same issue. I will not use this app again.

title: Awesome
body: This is a great way to get extra savings. I've been using it and love it

title: Easy rebates
body: Easy to use and quick money back. A little bit a hassle but if you want the money it's worth it.

title: Loving it
body: Yes it's true that offers are limited not as many as ibotta but most offers are high value. And if you are buying those offers you get high cash backs. I'm enjoying it. Saved a lot. Just hoping it will stay this way if not improve better. Thank you.

title: Too Slow to Verify Purchases
body: This app is getting worse instead of better. Way too slow in verifying purchases and crediting your account especially when you manually upload your receipts. The slowest coupon app to verify and give credit. Customer service is extremely slow in responding to issues or giving a status. More stores are now requiring you to manually upload your receipt so their manual process being so slow becomes more and more of an issue. I'm a long time user but other newer apps blow them away as far as processing and giving credit. They need to step up their game instead of sliding backwards.

title: Enjoy app.
body: As everyone else the complaint is scanning long receipts and how long it takes to verify the receipt. I have also bought the right items and didn't get the rebate.

title: Used to love savingstar
body: I used to love this app it helped me save so much money... Let's you redeem at $5 which is nice and low... But lately it's almost always repetitive offers. When they do have something I want to buy I purchase things in the picture that verify as participating products when I'm in the store and get denied. Tired of communicating with customer service so unjust let it go. Also lately take 10-20 days to process my receipts. Unfortunately all the store near me other than cvs are receipt stores. Which means I'm waiting decades to get any info whether I will be approved or not. By then we have ate the products or discarded the receipts and can't dispute anything if needed. I love anything that helps me save on my grocery bill... Just wish they had more variety... Maybe baby stuff would be nice and wish they reviewed and had a faster turn around 10-20 days is just ridiculous if they're that busy and can't do what they promise it's time to hire more staff... I'm beginning to think using this app isn't worth my time and headaches when ibotta mobisave and checkout give you almost instant results or working 24 - 48 hours the latest.

title: Love it
body: One of my favorite money saving apps

title: Not impressed so far...
body: They take much longer than other apps to approve receipts...however they are quick to deny a receipt.

title: Awesome resource!
body: I love this app!! I only wish it had more items that qualify for rebates.

title: Like Ebates
body: I absolutely love Ebates. But I use Saving Star as well because it has some things Ebates doesn't & sometimes gives you a better percentage of cash back! Super easy to use!

title: Pretty good app
body: For the most part Savings Star works well. I seem to have problems getting "paid" for the items where you have to spend a certain amount on a product (Spend 20$ get 5$ back etc) The app says my receipts are processed but I do not get the credit for them. Individual items have all worked perfectly. Now I only purchase the single items rather than try for spending a certain amount

title: Savingstar :)
body: I got this app months ago at first I really didn't think I was going to use it! But slowly I did use it and have gotten back like $60 bucks so far!!! Love it so far I did have a couple issues with getting some rebates back. I purchased the items in a one or many rebate and when I scanned the item after several days of not getting a rebate back it said not eligible :( but the rebate didn't say it was specific on the items just buy the brand stated. When I emailed about the issue I got a timely response back and I sent a pic of my receipt and product and explained that the rebate doesn't state it was only on certain items so they gave me the rebate within 24 hours! Very happy with this app and its customer services reps!! Will give 5 stars when they change up the rebate offers a little sooner. I'm sure they stay the same because of the one or many rebates! Spend $20 get &5. It allows you time to make those purchases!

title: Free $$$$$
body: Easy free money!!!!

title: Savingstar
body: I love it!! It's so easy always new offers to keep me interested. I'm hooked.

title: Awesome
body: I discovered this app on hannafords.com where I found this app and I love it! It's really hard to budget my money with groceries and bills so I thought I'd try this out and so far so good.

title: Awesome
body: Awesome app!! It does exactly what it says it will! Definitely recommend for saving money!

title: Love this app
body: I absolutely love this app. Offers great savings on not just groceries but online retailers as well. I would like to see more online retailers added but otherwise a great app.

title: Veery slow customer service
body: This app works fine - it's the service that's off. I submitted a receipt - it took them almost 2 weeks to verify it but they made an error adding up the purchases and I did not get the rebate. I emailed them - a response could take up to two weeks was the auto-reply. Since the offer would be long expired by then I had to make an unnecessary additional purchase to make sure I got the rebate. Major fail!

title: Savings bore
body: Every time I have submitted a receipt it has rejected it and says it is either missing data or it is unreadable. This is ridiculous because I am very meticulous about my rebates and pictures...I will be deleting the app and sticking with my other rebate apps!!!

title: Could be better
body: Love this app when it works correctly.  My complaint seems to be the same as everyone else's the receipt upload isn't giving credit where credit is due. I get error messages that says the receipt is unreadable when the receipt is very clear & readable. Then when you contact customer service it takes 7-10 days for a reply but I actually didn't get a reply from my messages until I sent an additional email asking for an update. Seriously there are easier ways to get proof then the one in place now. I mean most receipts these days come with barcodes. Why can't we just do that? Isn't that how the loyalty cards work? Which btw is a good thing that mostly works the way it should.

title: Too long to get paid
body: I liked the app when I was able to use my rewards card.   Now that I have to take a picture of my receipts it crashes during me taking the picture and then it takes 7-10 days before my receipts are even processed

title: DOES NOT WORK ON iPhone
body: Unable to scan bar codes and take photos of receipts!!!!  App no good!! Uninstalling immediately!!!

title: Frugal Frannie
body: Saving Star is so incredibly easy to use and they offer great options to save money! Cash in my pocket is nice. Thanks!!

title: Sntptl1975
body: Very good app

title: Great savings app!
body: I never write reviews but this app is wonderful for paying yourself back for things you already buy.

title: Not good for me
body: This app never works. I have submitted multiple receipts and it NEVER gives you your money back it's always an excuse. I deleted it

title: Love ❤️❤️❤️
body: Love it!!!

title: Great deals
body: I have saved 80.00 with just my normal shopping at the grocery store. Thanks to saving star. Very easy to use. Especially with the new app.

title: Virtually Impossible to get Rebates
body: Took forever to review receipt then told me I didn't activate savings the day of it prior pretty sure I did took a week to review my receipts when I think the prompt said 48 hours or so. Then said my purchase didn't qualify but scanning my items worked. There are better more user friendly rebate apps than this. Deleting from my collection. Not worth the hassle or frustration for $0.50-3 rebates.

title: Not giving refunds on items
body: Updated review. I purchase the items that are CLEARLY described in the app. Submit receipts and I am told they are ineligible. And a 5-10 day response time for requests is too slow. I am going to cash out what I do have and delete this app because it's actually causing me to lose money because I am buying things because of the deal and not getting refunds.   Since I started using this app I have been getting only partial refunds. The correct items were purchased and verified and clearly noted on the receipt yet they are not applied. I have contacted the customer service and I get a response that my purchase did not meet the requirements. If it's save $1 off 2 boxes of Chex cereal and I bought 2 boxes of Chex cereal how did I not meet the requirement? Same thing with two Betty Crocker items? I bought the items IN THE PHOTO on the app. I may stop using this app since there are plenty of others like Snap Ibotta Checkout51.

title: Ok
body: Like Ibotta better

title: Love Savings Star
body: I love the new upload receipt feature!  Now I can shop at more stores in my area and earn some $ back!

title: Pretty good
body: I've been using this app for well over a year now and it's a nice way of getting money back on things I buy anyway (more like a refund than a coupon). The selections aren't always to my taste but that's to be expected. The only way I can think that it would be better is the ability to auto sync with my Walgreens Balance Rewards card instead of having to manually submit the receipts.

title: Quick payouts
body: After getting a sign in error I tried repeatedly for approximately 15 times before the error corrected itself and I could sign back in.

title: Good overall
body: Sometimes I don't get credit for purchases. Don't know if it is the apps fault or the store. Otherwise I have saved a good amount with this.

title: Great App
body: This has been a great app. I have been very pleased with the savings. I have also been very happy with their customer service. They have always returned my requests promptly.

title: Great app
body: A user-friendly app with a big payoff!

title: Easy way to save
body: Deducted one star because occasionally the receipt screen will crash when trying to view the status of a submission. Other than that the app is a quick and easy way to save on groceries.

title: Good app
body: I like it because it's simple and it's nice to save a few cents here and there.

title: Great!
body: Easy way to get cashback & save on everyday purchases.

title: Great!
body: Super easy. Great deals on things you actually buy. Funds quickly transferred into PayPal account.

title: Ok but not as good as Ibotta app
body: Almost always misses items I turn in to get dollars for then it takes 2-3 days for someone to get back with me then the customer service rep may only correct 1 item when 3 or 4 didn't get credited then I have to message Savingstar again and wait... Still presently wait on this issue. If the app would work like it is supposed to & customer service would read full message & fix each problem at once the app would be great.

title: GREAT APP
body: I love earning money back on things we buy! Also it makes me want to try other things I see on the offer list. Excellent!!

title: Good so but slow to process receipts
body: This is a good app  I don't buy 90% of the items on the rebate but when I do I submit my receipt and it takes about 3-5 days for it to get processed . I've had this app for a few years and it has gotten better but needs some kinks worked out . Worth it to download if you buy the items that are featured  I always take advantage of the produce and the freebies :) ..

title: Awesome app
body: Great app. Great customer service.

title: Great App!
body: Awesome app. Works all the time with no issues. Saves me a lot of money. What more can you say lol :)

title: Awesome.. Been using for 2 yrs
body: I thought I'd take the time to commend this app! I truly love saving star!

title: Great savings app!
body: Love this app! Easy to use. I love that you are only required to reach $5 before transferring money to PayPal. The only thing I don't like is that you can't use it for stuff bought at the commissary.

title: Love it!!
body: I really love this app. It's easy to use and has great rebates. Sometimes it's a little slow but not too bad!

I really enjoy Saving Star. I like how it matches most of the high value coupons that are out at the time. I also really like the rebate for spending a certain amount a product you get money back. The only thing I would change would probably be getting rebates a little quicker.

title: Good app
body: I enjoy the app. Easy to use! Got the cash quick and love that you can deposit the money into PayPal! I can't believe people aren't joining this app. It's easy money on products you buy anyways!

title: Great rebate app!
body: I really love this app! It has saved me lots of money and is relatively easy to use. The rebates will sometime correlate with coupon inserts providing even greater savings- often free items!! LOVE that!!  My only wish is that it was set up to submit the receipts myself. That way I know it is done and there are no issues and I don't forget to track it. Overall a great app!

title: It's for real!
body: I have earned about 86 dollars so far!! I love that I can hair activate it right into my store card! I don't have to remember to scan any receipts. They never bombard me with emails this is my favorite money earning app by far.  I only wish you could still redeem for Amazon gift cards (likely they do too)  Meanwhile you will not regret this app! It's a keeper!!

title: AWESOME!!!!
body: Every penny counts.

title: So far so good
body: No issues

title: Great app
body: A great app that keeps getting better.

title: My Favorite Savings App!
body: Great offers quick turn around time and pays out at just $5!

title: Dissatisfied
body: I just downloaded this app and it is already giving me a headache; I can't even add stores therefore I can not add the savings coupons. I suppose I should have taken the advice of so many other disappointed users!! I see deletion in the near future like very soon. I'm going to try one more time to add stores and if it doesn't work I will delete!!

title: Great App!
body: Love this app! I've been using it for over a year and haved saved enough to make using it worthwhile

title: Not working!!!!
body: I forgot my saving star password to make a withdrawal to my paypal account so I tried to reset it. I just keep getting an error that says webpage not available. Ugh!!!! So annoying. I can't get my money out.

title: See the name!
body: SavingStar is wretched. 100% wretched.  First they are slow in posting your money and it takes them 2 weeks to even respond to your emails.  You purchase an item that is listed only to scan it to submit the receipt only to be told it's not eligible.  Yet it is the EXACT same item.  This has happened multiple times.  Save yourself the headache and download Ibotta instead.  They are great! You get credited your money in minutes the longest it took was an hour probably because I had a lot of items.  Checkout 51 is decent too.  As soon as I get enough to cash out I am done with this sham called SavingStar!!!!

title: Has become totally unusable
body: I used to love this. Now it won't let me anything to my list. It says I need to add stores which I have already and won't let me add them from the app. I won't be using this anymore and that is a shame.

title: Pretty good app
body: Definitely like the freebies. Would hope they just put more generic rebates that cover all stores and not just targeted stores

title: Easy way to save money
body: If you are not a coupon person then this app is for you. All you have to do is shop as you normally would and then check to see if anything that you bought is offered up for savings. Then you just scan your groceries and take a snap shot of your receipt and Saving Star does the rest.

title: Love this APP
body: Absolutely love this app! Free money for items you already purchase.

title: Savings right?
body: My receipts are always rejected I have to do the 2-3 times. That's no savings

title: Shop
body: It is nice to shop for what you need and then submit  a receipt and get paid for it!

title: Great
body: Love this

title: A great way to get money back
body: I've been using this app for over a year and it's a great app. Payout starts at only $5! There's been several improvements made this year- it's very user friendly. I love the fact that when I click on an offer it automatically saves it to a list and removes it from the offer page. It's easier for me to see what I intended to buy and shows me how much I need to buy to finish a "one or many" rebate. I have recommended this app to several friends!

title: Great rating
body: This helps with grocery costs

title: Excellent!

Other than that it is great!

title: Poor troubleshooting
body: Won't allow me to sign in on the app. Spent too much time trying to get my account started probably not worth it

title: Love love love it! Savings are great! Thank you Saving Star
body: Love the app recommend it to  family and friends. Never has issues with receiving my rebates or uploading receipts! I look forward to the rebates you guys have I see them as little saving missions.

title: Can't use
body: Just downloaded this app and it won't add a receipt or let me add any stores.

title: Not so great
body: I really used to like this app but the offers now are for products I don't use or have never heard of.  Also if I pick an ecoupon on my Giant Eagle app I can't pick an offer on Savingstar for the same product.  That limits the usefulness of this app.

title: I have been using this app for a long time
body: I have been using this app for a long time I love it and it's easy to use. A no brainer if u buy things at a store..
