title: Best app ever
body: I love this rebate app.i really love how I get cvs rebates automatically

title: Can't sign in
body: Every time I try to sign in I get a pop up stating there was a problem with the sign in.  Reset my password and it did the same thing.  I have yet to be able to claim any rebates.

title: So easy to use!
body: I love this app! The rebates come quickly and I love that you can get cash in your bank account. Some of the other ones only allow gift cards. Great job!

title: Saving star
body: I love the idea of the app and my favorite part is the healthy deal of the week but I gave it three stars because they mainly have deals for junk food and stuff I never buy. Other than that when I can get a rebate I'm happy!

title: Used to be my favorite!
body: Can never seem to get the correct rebate amounts. Most of the time it says there's an error and won't accept my items even though it scans as a qualifying object. Very disappointed lately!

title: Great Savings!!
body: I love digital coupons and how this links to my reward cards with my stores I shop. It's easy to receive your savings.

title: Wonderful app
body: Easy to use app and you don't have to wait as long to get your pay out or have to wait until a check comes in the mail.

title: Great app
body: I love this app. I have gotten over $100 with this app. I love when it works with my normal loyalty cards. The receipts for those with no loyalty cards are a little more work but not bad.  There are a variety of products and I am happy when its products I normally buy anyway. Sometimes I get an extra one for the deal and stockpile it.  This is my favorite saving app.  I have tried others and this always my favorite one.

title: Great app
body: I love this site and the app.  Terrific way to save money often on items you are buying anyway.  Some deals are over multiple shopping trips which is helpful.  Give it a try!

title: Great app!
body: Love this app! Easy to see offers and track your savings.

title: Down Hill Fast!
body: I've been using this app for what seems like forever. Recently it has become the worst app ever! Every receipt is submit gets rejected. I have resubmit and send an email to support. the item or items are on the receipt I scanned them into the App for verification. Or if I purchase multiple items for the spend $20 get $5 back I only get credit for 1 item. Every receipt literally every single one for the last two months now gets rejected and takes around two weeks to "verify" I don't know what's going on my sister and co-worker are also having issues. All I can say is delete! Bye bye!

title: Want more coupons
body: I have only been using savingstar for about a month but already saved $25 from it. My only issue with it is I wish it gave more coupon options.

title: Amazing!!!!
body: Love the offers all something I buy on the list.

title: Love saving money but this app is awful!
body: I've used this app several times and it's not very good.  The last time I tried to use it I kept getting a black screen in the barcode area.   I check my camera and it was fine. It's really frustrating....

title: Love it!
body: By far this is the best money making app I have ever tried! I wish I would have come across it sooner.

title: Love this
body: I love using this. Just wish it worked at more stores

title: Don't care for this anymore.
body: I have made several purchases using the attached store card and has never received credit. In the beginning it was working well but now I won't waste my time with this anymore. Waiting to hear a response final complaint and then am done. DO NOT GET THIS APP

title: Great app
body: I love this app. My only wish is that it would account for submitted rebates quicker. Sometimes it takes over a week.

title: Increasingly Disappointed
body: SavingStar has great options for rebates... If you can get them to pay you.   I have two receipts pending from 11 days ago. Ibotta and mobisave have both accepted these receipts and the money is already in my checking account. Still waiting for SavingStar to even accept the receipts let alone pay out.   I'm very disappointed and even wish I could return the items that I specifically bought knowing I'd get a return. I've contacted customer service twice and have yet to be acknowledged. $12 may not be much to everyone but I work hard to scrimp and save we need that money back.  I'll be deleting this app soon if I don't get a resolution. I'm extremely dissatisfied and wish that I could count on an actual pay out with this app. Don't count on the money from this app!!

title: Easy money!
body: Great app so easy to use love that I can link store cards!!

title: Requires Location Services to Always Run
body: There is no option to only use location services while the app is in use.   This app also isn't optimized for the iPhone 6s or iPhone  6s screen sizes.  In closing this app is a joke. Until the app is fully optimized for the newest iPhone screen sizes AND offers the option to only run location services while the app is in use this app doesn't deserve more than 1 star.

title: Great
body: Save so much money with this app!

title: Good app
body: Already have money saved up!!

title: Love it
body: I think it's great; I mostly use it with my store loyalty card. It's an easy way to save.

title: Great app! Really saves you money!
body: If you're using more than one money-saving app make sure you add the item on this app first otherwise you may not be able to add the item later.

title: Upset------- No responds back
body: I've been reaching out to Saving Star for more than two weeks now for two different problems and still haven't gotten a responds. I've have been doing a deal and haven't gotten credit for it and I did cash out and haven't gotten paid. Can anyone help I even gave them my pal pay account # and new email on their app and still NO RESPONDS HELP!!!!!

title: Easy to use and quick to earn
body: This rebate app is one of the easiest to use. I shop at Publix and LOVE that I can redeem by scanning my UPromise card at checkout- no receipts necessary! There are so many offers both single items and brand groups for which you can earn larger amounts by purchasing multiples. I've been using this app for a long time and only experienced minimal crashing/problems. Customer service is fantastic and will fix any issues which hinder you from obtaining rebates.

title: So easy to make money but.....
body: So my hubby says if I could get paid to shop it would be the best job for me because I shop every day so I found a way!!! So easy with great deals a things we buy all the time anyway!! I would like to add to my previous statement. I requested a pay out October 17th 2015 it is now November 21st 2015 and I got nothing. Every time I send a note to customer service they send me a form to put all my Paypal info in again but that's it. So I would say it's easy till you get to this part than it gets hard and customer service is bad!! Not being able to talk to a person really gets me and is kinda shadeee if you ask me!!

title: Great app
body: I was skeptical at first but i made $15 in 3 months. They could fix some stuff but still its a great app to make money on the things you usually buy. * update: i went from 5 to 3 because i usually shop in a store not listed. When i emailed customer service they said to let the manager of the store know about this rebate app. I mean really?!

title: Okay app
body: I like the concept of the app. They let you buy items within a time period so your not buying so much at one time. But their customer service has a lot to be desired!!!

title: One of My Fave Savings Apps
body: I'm a big fan of SavingStar.  If you shop at any of the SavingStar card linked stores like CVS you don't have to bother submitting a receipt.  The rebate money just shows up in your account a few days after you shop.  You do have to make sure you select the offers you want as soon as they come up.  The better offers like those for cosmetics go very quickly.  As soon as an email comes through from SavingStar telling you there's new offers go to the app and select them!  Then you know for sure you will get the rebates once you have time to shop.  I find it's often easier to make money with this app than Ibotta.

title: Saving star
body: Slow to process receipts. Often tells me products do not qualify though brands sizes quantities match their offer.

title: Great App!!
body: I wish I would have found this app sooner. It's great and easy to use. I would recommend this app to everyone!

title: Barely functional
body: The stores with cards cannot detect the card through the app.  Stores that stopped requiring cards still required cards on the app rendering the app useless if you started shopping somewhere when you didn't have a card. It takes months to get your savings back. Ibotta is so much better!  And Checkout51

title: Love it!
body: Love it!

title: Money Back is good but App is the worst!
body: While it's nice to get (a very small amount of) money back this app will never load anything during busy times. So stores like Hyvee where you MUST use your attached card through the app only will not load so you lose any money you hoped to get back because you can not submit a receipt after to those stores. So aggravating it's barely worth your time. Most of these rebates can be found as coupons elsewhere.

title: Horrible app
body: Worst couponing app ever! They do everything they can not to pay you! Use Ibotta or Mobisave instead.

title: Great app
body: Easy to use and get money back on stuff you already buy who could you complain about that :)

title: Very limited
body: I have used other rebate apps with no problems but I have had issues with uploading receipts using this app. It is hard to see where the receipt 'pieces' end with long receipts because of the app's words and jagged edges in the way. My first two receipts were rejected because 'information was missing' (not). Info was there but all the edges were not lined up perfectly. Will likely delete because so far it isn't worth my time. Additionally it takes much too long to be paid.  Many of the coupons (rebates) are listed as "One or many" which is incorrect. For those items they require that one spend anywhere from $12 - $30 worth of a product to get rebates. Thus MANY items must be purchased. The items rarely change as well.   One of the biggest disadvantages is that one can only buy items at a very few stores. For example one major grocery chain in my region is not one I can get rebates for. There is a weekly "healthy option" rebate where they rebate 20% of the cost of fruit or vegetables.. So spend $1 on bananas for example and get .20 rebate.

title: This app is the worst on the web
body: This app is by far the worst coupon app out there. They are often wrong when offering you credits back they take well over a week to even get you your money back and often wrong they scanning system they have is often wrong on the items they can be used on and lastly when you write the company for disputes or for help it again is well over a week response time and then a ton of issues and questions insue. It's ridiculous and not worth the little amount they give you back. Check out  Ibotta. It's much quicker more accurate and the offers are much much better. You'll love that app and hate this one when compared.

title: Great savings app
body: I love using this app! It is very easy to use but you must check to make sure you have activated all of the offers!

title: Doesn't work well with new iPhone update
body: Ever since I did the new upgrade on my iphone5 the app doesn't work. When I go to scan an item the camera part is completely dark and won't work. I tried deleting it and reinstalling it but then it took a week for me to be able to sign back in. It kept saying error. I emailed the company twice and still haven't received w response. It's been over two weeks now :( I had several rebates to scan and now it's going to be too late to get credit. I've used this app for over a year and I used to love it :(

title: Frustrating
body: Love the App. Wish more coupons would be available. Been experiencing issues with app crashing and loading. Definitely will not work out of WIFI. Please fix.

title: Not opening up
body: Lately I've been having issues where the app just doesn't open

title: Hasn't worked all day
body: I haven't been able to sign in all day. The app has been loading for like 18 hours. Sunday is a big day for couponing and this is annoying

title: It's ok.
body: Whenever I want to use in offer it tells me the offer is out. Also when new offers come out the app won't load so that I can actually have a chance at claiming the new offers. I'm kind of disappointed in it.

title: Awesome money saving app!
body: Easy to use have saved a lot of money! Would highly recommend!

title: Very disappointed
body: Was excited to try this app. Had it all set up and had chosen the items for my first shopping trip. After I got home and tried to login and scan my itemsall the app did was spin. It would not open again on either my iPhone or my iPad.… I restarted both my phone and iPad and restarted the app. Nothing changed. The app was unusable. If they can fix this problem then I will be more than happy to give this app a better review.

title: Great app to make money on items I already buy
body: I love this app. It's pretty simple to use and let's you earn money in products you usually buy. I'm having a hard time to log in with my iPhone for the past to days. But this is the first time I have that problem

title: Loving it
body: I love this app

title: Crashes
body: It doesn't accept receipts that were fine in other apps. It froze on me & won't let me login.

title: Love Using Saving Star
body: I love using the Saving Star app. It helped me save money to help buy Christmas this year. I get money back on items I use all the time. Thank You Saving Star!

title: crappy app can't even register
body: downloaded it can't even register. completely useless.

title: Great app but frequent crashes
body: Love this app and the $$ I save but it seems that whenever I have a good amount of products and want to use it.

title: Saving star
body: Love this app! I use it every day and the amazon rewards are excellent! I would recommend this app for everyone!

title: Wonderful!
body: Easy to save and feel like I'm making money at the same time. I recommend it.

title: Much improvement since first review!
body: Very pleased with the current version.  Thanks!

title: Save$$
body: I'm new to using apps to save money.  I've tried several and while this isn't my top favorite it works pretty well.  The trick is to follow the instructions for submitting receipts...I did mine wrong at first.  Walmart receipts process fast...Meijer not so fast.  The one improvement I would like to see is more items available for rebates.

title: Clunky! Extremely slow turn around...
body: The offers are ok although they conflict with my Kroger shoppers card. But it takes WAY TOO long for turn around on receipts & new items. Also wish the items verified in the store didn't have to be scanned again for redemption. Ibotta still the best in my book!

title: Nice friendly/slow
body: Pretty good app slow about adding funds. Customer service is very friendly but again slow about handling inquiries regarding accounts.

title: Shopper
body: Awesome savings app. Customer service is great too

title: Very slow to credit
body: In comparison to other rebate apps this one it at the bottom. They are slow to credit your account and slow to respond to inquiries. There are the buy 'one or many' offers that are great but if it takes them beyond the offer expiration to give you credit then what is the point? I need to see how far I am with my credits quicker so I can fulfill the offers.

title: Garbage
body: Don't waste your time

title: Mom
body: Saved a lot!  Works well most of the time. Very good customer service.

title: Doesn't have full features
body: This app is OK. It lacks what the full site has (i.e. cash mall). The grocery rebates they offer is very limited.

title: One of the best apps for savings!
body: I've saved a total of $46.64 over the last few years and not consistently on a regular basis. Very easy to use by selecting coupons and adding your store cards. I love the easy transfer to PayPal! Their customer service is great as well.

title: Awesome
body: Who wouldn't like earning money for items you use.  Only thing I would change is less collections and more items.

title: Super easy to save with this app - but why can't users search for deals?!
body: I have been using the app for awhile and I enjoy the savings but the lack of a search feature is definitely a draw back. Scrolling the entire list of deals you've saved is not convenient while shopping or planning your shopping trip. I used to have 5 stars on this review but after using other coupon apps and store apps with digital coupons I really would like to see a search feature added. This app now feels cumbersome at times.

title: Needs fixing
body: Does not work. Always has an error message when trying to activate a rebate. Deleting app.

title: Eh
body: Not a lot of turnover in the different offers so I don't use it as often as some other money saving apps. Also many of the offers require you to buy a large quantity of items. I don't need $20 worth of ding dongs or whatever.

title: Awesome money saving app!
body: Love this app! They have great rebates on products you actually buy. Turnaround is relatively quick.

title: Great App
body: I love this app. Who said you can't get anything for free. I love free Friday and the percentage off if fruits and veggies. Great customer service.

title: Love it!!
body: Great app just need to have more cards linked!

title: great !
body: We love using Saving Star I didn't realize it had an app & now it more simple to add  my rebates & keep track of my goals to reach for any rebate. It always has things we purchase and a new fun fruit or vegetable rebate. Thank you!!

title: App doesn't work.
body: I have tried to load a receipt for 3 days now and every time I push take photo it just continues to load and goes no where.

title: Excelente
body: Me encanta esta aplicación muy facil de usar y ahorras mucho cada dos semanas ahorro entre 20 dolares ????
Its ok i never get the stuff i want before its taken

title: Sign in problems
body: I have used this so for years. Never had a problem until I got my new phone and had to down load the app again. I cannot get signed in to my account on my new phone. I have reset my password at least twice and nothing I do will let me in. I'm very frustrated as I have money in my account and I would like to take advantage of some of the current offers.

title: Love
body: I love this app! It makes it so easy to check my account and add new savings! Thank you!

title: Could be Better
body: There are too many "One or many items" and not enough single items. Rejection of receipts should state the reason because when I check the rejected receipt everything is okay that you list as being a reason for rejection under Q&A. Why does it take so long to process a receipt?  Checkout 51 and ibotta can respond within minutes or an hour at the most. The cash in process is fine. Address these items and SavingStar will be in 4-5 star category!

title: Great Money Saver but Always Crashes
body: This app saves me money which I love I have used Savingstar for as long as I can remember but the submit receipt section of the app needs some SERIOUS work. It regularly crashes on me mid-entry while I am taking the photos of my receipt. Sometimes even multiple times where I give up on entering a receipt or postpone it for another try later. This is such an annoyance and time waster! It's annoying enough to have to scan everything that you've purchased and take pictures but when it crashes and you are doing it multiple times hoping for success it's barely worth doing. Please please fix the receipt entry crashes! It only seems to happen on my iPhone not Ipad and especially for longer receipts. Because I save everything I can for my family I still painfully use the app but I miss the old days where you just used your shopper card for the savings!

title: Easy enough said!!
body: I have tried so many of these savings apps. and this is by far my favorite. It's easy to save and easy to cash out.  I only wish there were a way to be able to use it at places without savings cards like Walmart and Target.  But I know that too will come :)

title: Love this app
body: So easy to get extra cash in your pocket????

title: Worst digital coupon app
body: No technical glitches but very flawed process. Makes you scan product UPC codes before uploading receipt. UPC codes for qualifying products often not recognized. Then when you do upload receipt they still come back and deny rebate. About 75% of my redemptions require an email to customer support.

title: Really like this app
body: Very easy to get extra cash

title: Great app
body: I have been using this app for about 2 years.  It's great and I will continue to use it

title: Grrrrt!
body: Does not always credit all my rebates to the account. Most frustrating of the three rebate apps that I use.

title: Good app
body: I haven't had any issues with this app yet. I don't find a lot of stuff I use on here all the time. But it's nice to save money on the things when they are here.

title: A great app!
body: I've been using this app for several years and it is a vital tool in saving on our grocery bill. I highly recommend this app.

title: Product pulled before expiration date
body: Tried to claim rebate on Oct. 21.  Notice popped up which stated that the offer was no longer valid even though the stated expiration date wasn't until Oct. 31.  Not fair.  I felt cheated.  Wouldn't have purchased the product if I'd known this would be the outcome.

title: Very convenient app!
body: Pick your offers and use your registered store cards and you get money!

title: Good rebate app
body: This is pretty easy to use and has products that I actually want to buy. My only complaint is sometimes I have to contact customer service because my submissions are rejected. I eventually get the credit.

title: Easy and useful
body: Love the variety of products available for rebates. I like when I can match these coupons with store specials to double the savings.

title: Disappointed
body: You should be able to submit receipts from Publix. It requires you to sign up for a card. So the receipts you have before signing up are worthless. What a PITA

title: Take too long for support
body: Takes entirely too long for support and I'm constantly having to go back and forth worth them on their mistakes on giving me credit for receipts. It's almost not worth it. Plus I'm not happy they stop doing freebie Friday's.

title: Love it!!
body: A must app for Couponers!!

title: Super saving star
body: Love the app! Very easy to use and easy to redeem savings through app. Wish there were more stores though-even if you have to take a photo of the receipt.

title: Great way to get some money back!
body: Activate offers register your store cards or photograph receipt depending only the store and the savings are put into an account for you which you can cash out any time you choose. You'll be amazed how fast the money adds up!

title: Awesome app!!
body: Love this app! Very easy to use

title: Great supplement to couponing
body: I really like this app. I coupon and I love that by using this app I am able to get my purchased items almost free many times. Redeeming your saving is wonderful too! They just added a movie option so I now wait u til my saving is large enough and I take my family to the movies????????

title: Great way to save
body: Love this app. I save money and it takes very little effort!

title: I love it
body: It's nice to get rebates on items that you regularly purchase. It does add up and I enjoy using my cash back to use at Starbucks!

title: Good app if you like to SAVE MONEY
body: I have been using this program for a few years now.  The savings put in my account have been substantial. Sometimes it's a scavenger hunt at the store to find the correct items but the SS team are good at resolving any problems. Go to FaceBook and comment and you will get a quicker response. I normally get the money in my account within 3 days and like to transfer it to my PayPal account. Have fun saving money!

title: Review
body: I have been extremely pleased with saving star overall. It has become my favorite rebate app. I would only suggest that when you email for support the response time should be much faster. In addition many items that should qualify for the offer do not. I have learned to scan in the app prior to purchase to avoid this.  Thanks for the great savings!

title: Great rebate app!
body: Very easy to use and always has useful items.

title: Almost seamless to use
body: Almost a 5 in my book & this is my 2nd review on app. Had hiccup at beginning of use & not so great of a customer rep however did get resolved. Since that issue I am most pleased w/offers & pays & have had no issues other than my own phone sometimes not loading-Great app to use & easy for extra $ back off your grocery bill!

title: Every penny counts!
body: Get this app!!!????
Love this app!! It saves me so much money and is so easy to use!!

title: Easy to use money saver
body: Great ease of usability and variety of products!

title: Love this app!
body: Really easy to use. Love the freebies!

title: Good app to save
body: Good app to save on groceries. Has items better suited to my household than Checkout 51. But rebates are slow crediting your account not fast like Ibotta. Like that you can cash out at $5 not $10 like Ibotta or $20 like Checkout 51.

title: LOVE it
body: Love this great money saving app esp as can combine with coupons and other money saving apps!

title: Memaw
body: I love this app has a few issues but cust. Ser. has been helpful. Sometimes slow to load but I like the app and the ease of using

title: ❤️ Savings Star ⭐️
body: Would give 4.5 if it were an option not quite a 5-star app yet.  I've used this app now for several years periodically and just recently started again.  It's improved so much  over time and is finally an app I would want to use on a more regular basis. A few problems here and there with getting it to accept some barcodes for particular items but in general this app just keeps getting better & better!!  Far more rebates available than there were years ago.

title: Could be great if they can get act together
body: I've been using Savingstar for a while now and behind Ibotta they easily have the largest number of rebates that are relevant to me.  However the user experience leaves a lot to be desired.  I can't think of the last time I submitted a receipt that went through on its own let alone in a timely manner.  Constantly having to contact customer service because receipt was rejected or an item was missed.  No easy mechanism to resubmit receipts they deem unreadable (even though same receipts were fine in other apps) and response times have slowed significantly.  Almost getting to point of being more trouble than it's worth.

title: It works!
body: Already was able to cash out $15.  Is simple is tied into my usual grocery stores and has useable items.

title: This app needs a lot of work!
body: This app needs help. When you submit a r chips it takes a week for most stores to give you credit. Other apps give you credit within 24 hours. I am constantly emailing them because they miss items that I have purchased. Their response time when you email the app for help takes too long - usually over a week if you even get a reply. This could be a great app if they fixed the issues that people complain about.

title: Savingstar
body: Great app!

title: Easy way to Save some $$$$
body: A little bit here & there adds up more quickly than you realize and it takes little effort.

title: Great app.
body: Very user friendly app and helps to save money

title: Love this app
body: This app is awesome :)

title: I like this app
body: This app saves me money so that's always good. I only wish that more items were offered but perhaps as the company has been around longer that will change.

title: Over all a great program
body: Wish there's a customer service line that you can call in and speak to a real person.  Emails sometimes take more than a week to respond

title: Love this app!!!
body: I love the ease of automatic submissions from CVS! Even submitting receipts is extremely easy! A great way to get suggestions on new products I would not otherwise try - and some even become new favorites!!!

title: Ok
body: I use this app alot but it is the slowest unorganized one on the market. It sometimes takes up to 20 days to verify a $1.00 transaction. Ibotta and Mobi are almost immediate. I have had to contact cs on over 1/2 of my submissions. But money is money right even if it takes 3 weeks.

title: Love it.
body: Get money for things I'm going to buy anyway.

title: Slow
body: Would rate it higher but not getting responses when I write. Also don't get all rebates when turned in. I once was going to add item that just got put up sold out already. It does have good items when you can get and receive them.

title: Could use a lot of improvements
body: I like that it's usually fast and has lots of offers but 9 times out of 10 I have to re submit my receipt. Also it would be better if there were some 'any brand' offers and to recognize qr codes and barcodes on receipts.

title: Wish I new about this sooner
body: The SavingStar app is a great way to save money on some of the things that I purchase. It does not have rebates for all of my purchases but it  enables me to try different products that I would not consider otherwise. I did have a problem getting the hang of it at first. But once I did the research and email SavingStar for help it is a piece of cake! It did take several days to resolve the problems I had by the way I created the problems by not reading the instructions properly they were more than helpful in fixing it for me. I shop at Publix and CVS a bit and do not have to do any kind of submitting. It is done automatically! All I do is cash out when I reach the minimum or let the dollars keep building! And I can still use it for most any other store I want by submitting the receipt. SavingStar is a wonderful tool to help me save money!

title: Love it
body: Love this app. Along with coupons and other rebate apps it's a great way to save money. The best part is there's no minimum required to cash out.

title: Love the app
body: I like the app it's very easy to use. Not a lot to choose from tho. Takes so long to get cash back.

title: Easiest Rebate App out there
body: I currently use 4 different rebate Apps and this one is the simplest. Besides the ease of linking all your loyalty cards the Buy One or Many rebates give you time to reach a spend limit without buying items that you don't need right away.

title: Great App
body: I love this app once they answered my email and worked out the problem I no longer have to deal with issues I love this app definitely changed my opinion ????

title: Very good app!
body: I hope they will add Commissary soon. It would be fantastic. Thanks!

title: Crashes all the time
body: Crashes during multiple snaps. Repeatedly.  I stop redeeming offers because it's a headache.

title: Love this app BUT...
body: I love this app but here recently I have been having a lot of problems whenever I go to submit it tells me I have already claimed that rebate.  in the last month I have had to contact the support on at least 10 different items to get my rebates  and the support is supposed to let you know within 10 days it has been taking a lot longer than that for them to contact me at all. If they could get the app fixed and everything work like it should then I would be hundred percent satisfied.

title: Love this app
body: I have been using SavingStar(SS) for more than 3 years. It is tied to my store's loyalty cards. Rarely do I need to submit a receipt. I can match up SS's ecoupons to my paper coupons boosting my savings. I like that I can scan the item I want when I am in the store to verify it qualifies for SS reimbursement. When I do encounter a problem they are easy to contact and quick to respond. I have recommended this site to couponing friends. Even my mom uses it!

title: Could be more efficient
body: It's not very convenient and useful when about ten offers you click on say "This offer is sold out and cannot be activated." Well can you shade them darker or no longer have the plus sign or remove them?!

title: Great Rebate App
body: Offers rebates for items I use regularly and offer them again regularly so I can get another rebate.  Many Other apps offer rebates for items I never use.

title: Didn't work
body: I hoped this would be like Ibotta but it didn't work. First time I used it I received an email stating my new receipt was denied because it had already been processed. Nothing processed on my account hadn't yet used that receipt on other rebate apps nothing earned.

title: So Far So Good
body: So far the app is good! I love it.

title: Disappointed
body: Every time I see a rebate that looks good I click on it and get this message: "this offer is sold out and cannot be activated" - don't waste your time on this stupid app!

title: Ok but can be frustrating
body: I used saving star online for about a year before downloading the app. I already used several other savings apps and have found them to be quick and easy. Saving Star is extremely picky about receipt submission - even if all relevant info is clearly legible they will reject the submission. Also I have had to email them about rejecting offers that I certainly had met the requirements for. After a week or so credit was received. So they are slower to credit the rebates and aren't as user friendly compared to some other apps but I still find it worth using.

title: Stocking up pantry with SavingStar!
body: Thanks to SavingStar my pantry is full. Great variety of cash rebates are offered. They also give away "freebies" quite often.

title: What Squibbydo said
body: Yeah their marketing seems like this is a great money-saver.  But the couple or three times I’ve tried it I get some BS message that “the image is too blurry” (funny I can read it without my glasses) or the date is missing or some such.  And as Squibbydo added I’ve usually pitched the receipt (hey the Eworld is supposed to make us have to keep up with less paper right?  You’re telling I need a file into which I can file these receipts to fight for a 50-cent rebate?  Forget it!  My time is worth more than the rebate!).  A piece of junk app that will soon be missing from my phone — oops!  There it went!

title: Best Money Saving App!!
body: I recently started using couponswhen I found this app I was amazed. I couldn't believe all the money you get back.  Let me say I am a fin believer and dedicated user of this app I have earned approx $50-60 if not more in about2-3 months. It's a little of a hassle getting some of the cards but well worth. A definite must have app.

Need more savings on better product. I have grand children and children. Half this stuff they don't use. My other apps are way better. Takes to long to load. And not enough great offers. Needs more stores. Takes to long to respond when you have a question. I'm still Waiting to get my money. When Ibotta takes less then 2 hours. Make more money else where

title: Love it!!!
body: I love this app! It's so easy to get cash back! The best app ever!

title: Love
body: Love this app

title: Not available
body: There is not many on here and the few I buy when I click them they always say no longer available.

title: Very satisfied
body: I'm very satisfied with this app. Fast reply when I have any questions or concerns.

title: Let down
body: I was so excited about this app until I used it. The product is exactly what the offer is for and yet it says "the product doesn't qualify for any offers right now"  Totally disappointed!

title: Needs more products
body: It's a good concept and who doesn't love free money but there aren't a lot of products to choose from. Also I usually shop at Hannaford so I have to ask the cashier to scan this barcode every time I shop and then don't get credited for a week or more! I'm waiting to get to $20 to cash out and then I'll be deleting the app.

title: Saving star
body: Can't ever get to add somethings to my list fast enough before its all taken

title: Great coupon app
body: Nice selection of products to choose from--food I actually planned to buy anyway. Have only used it a few months & have gotten back about $40 which is not too bad--every little bit helps!

title: Awesome
body: It's free money people! What's there to complain about.? Nothing No complaints just kudos.

title: Great app
body: Love it. I have it linked to my savings card for the store I shop  so easy to use.

title: Technical Issues
body: This app is not working. I attempted to register several times. I entered my info and then asked to confirm email address. Clicked "yes" and then nothing happens. Horrible app.

title: Alright I guess
body: I don't buy just because I have a coupon and I don't buy $20 of an item to save $5. At 50 cents an item it's going to take a long time. Why not all stores?  Only Giant Eagle in my area and I can't afford to shop there except for sales

title: Not what it claims to be
body: This app claims to be a rebate app but every time I submit a receipt (and I follow all of the directions) I'm given a bull reason why it was rejected. It keeps telling me I didn't meet the requirements or something but when you look at the photos I submitted of my receipt I clearly have. It also takes several days to process a receipt (Ibotta can take up to 48hrs but most are processed within an hour). I contacted customer service about my issues with rejected receipts and got a response that someone would respond in 5-10 business days. Really? If you ask me this app isn't worth the space on my phone.

title: Good app
body: Easy to use. Great savings

title: Good concept
body: I started using this last year with the intent to use any earnings for Christmas shopping.  It seems that over time the amount of rebate options has gone down.  I have a lot of one or manys I'm working on but sometimes those take a long time.

title: Nice app
body: The app has good products.  Nice app to save some extra cash.

title: Lots of fun
body: I really enjoy saving the extra money. There seems like there's a pretty good sampling for a variety of items. Love the fresh food item each week. The only negative is I have to keep track of what I bought because it seems to take a while to receive credit and I don't want to lose money.

title: Okay
body: This used to be a great app but now most of the offers are for items I do not need.

title: Not a fan
body: The number and variety of available offers has really improved lately. When everything works the way it should it's a nice app. However it is really lacking in customer service. I've sent several emails about different issues. The only response I've ever received is the generic "we received your message" reply. Definitely has potential just no drive behind it.

title: Best and easiest money saving app!!!
body: So easy to use!! Love savings star!!

title: Some problems with getting rebates
body: I've had to contact customer service several times for not receiving earned rebates automatically. All the issues were resolved satisfactorily but it does take some time for a response. Rebates were easier when they were loaded onto my shoppers card and the receipt was processed automatically. Now it takes several attempts at pictures of receipts because the app crashes on the last section picture. There are some good rebates though!

title: Great App
body: No issues money is in my account super fast. I just link my store cards and let Savings Star do the rest!! Not sure why everyone else is having such problems!!

title: Meh
body: Not sure the time investment is worth the payout. Had it for 2 years and have not saved nearly enough to make it worth it. Loyalty cards seem to "disappear" just when I should get paid on purchases.

title: LOVE it!
body: Who doesn't like free groceries?! I love the freebies and the weekly produce deals and have gotten back several hundred dollars in rebates effortlessly by using linked store cards. We love SavingStar!

title: Very slow and buggy
body: Not ready to totally write the app of yet but Ibotta is so much better and faster.  Rebates here are slow and then I do not always get credit for all of them.  I have sent one email to customer service which so far has gone unanswered.  I was able to cash out once even that took over 24 hours to appear in paypal.  Last weekend I tried to add two offers and kept getting an error message.  Of course AFTER I purchased the items the error message went away. I don’t buy things I normally wouldn’t so nice to get a little back for “vacation money”.

title: Yeah good luck scanning that receipt
body: This app would be a good idea if ... It would actually accept a receipt. You have to scan the UPC's you purchased then photograph your receipt which if it doesn't fit into one photo you must take multiple photos. The problem ... I have submitted the same receipt multiple times even went as far as to highlight the items I purchased that qualifies for savings/refunds. Checked to make sure all information was legible and store and date was showing clearing ---> reflected every time now the offers have expired. Aggravating app not worth the whole .75 I would have received for three items.

title: Love this app!
body: Awesome app!

title: Bothersome
body: Difficult to use especially when trying to get cashback on a produce purchase where there is no bar code. Easy to use when your store automatically submits your purchases. If you need help it can take ten days to get a response and by then the deadline to submit your rebate has passed. Far easier to just use paper coupons. Why do apps like this even exist when they are so complicated and bothersome to use?

title: Good $ saver
body: This is a great app for saving extra money on groceries you already buy. It always has things from my list on it and is really simple to use. All you have to do is activate your rebates then go shopping. That's it!   I use a lot of grocery savings apps and this is my 2nd favorite. It would be #1 if the rebates were redeemed quicker. I hate having to wait several weeks for money to show up in my account. By then I've forgotten what I bought and it's hard to keep track of!   Overall there's a lot of $ saving opportunities and it's simple to use so it's a great app. I've recommended it to many!

title: Works good until your first cash out
body: This app worked great until I cashed out my first time. After that they wouldn't credit my account with the money I earned wouldn't respond to multiple emails and hey don't have a customer service phone number. When they finally responded to my email they said they lied giving the wrong date and I had to tell them to check the email thread which showed the date for the fifth email I sent for the same problem. HORRIBLE!

title: Remove unavailable savings
body: Please remove items from the list that are unavailable. If the item has already been maxed out don't offer it as an option for me. I hate selecting something only to find "sorry it's unavailable". Now the app keeps crashing when submitting my receipt. Have scanned three times!!!!! Junk.

title: Faulty app
body: It's an ok app but there are better. They display rebates but when you try to add it shows it's unavailable. So remove it then? Also they deny rebates all the time and you have to go through a pretty annoying email process to prove you purchased the correct item. Not worth it.

title: It's great!
body: You add your store cards activate coupons and save. Never had a problem.

title: Disappointing!!!!
body: This app has GREAT rebates BUT apparently doesn't "catch" my purchases at Kroger nor can I scan my receipts. Scanners WILL NOT WORK!! Customer service won't email you back and there's no "help or faq on this issue.

title: Disappointed
body: I used the app and thought it was ok then when I tried to cash out has all kinds of problems. An not cash out my savings.I think this app is a scam . I have tried to contact them to help and when they finally get back with you the answer is no help. Other coupon apps are easy to use and cash out.

title: Not worth your time
body: I thought this app would be everything I was looking for in a savings app but every receipt I submit has items that get rejected. No other app does this to me. Some coupons also just won't load. I've yet to get an answer as to why customer service is almost non-existent. Stacking coupons with the offers isn't allowed either so the savings are not as great as one would think. It had such potential but it's a waste of time.

title: Done!
body: This is the worst app ever!!!!  Customer service is s joke.  It takes 1-2 weeks for a reply.   Those who say they get a reply in 24 hours probably work for them because their first response says it will take at least 5 days!!! They consistently deny valid purchases.   Save your time and use an app that works like Ibotta or something else!!!

title: No response from customer support
body: My receipt keeps getting rejected when it clearly shows I purchased the correct item.  Customer service responds to none of the emails I send.  I just get random emails saying they are too busy to respond.

title: Seems to be a waste of time
body: Every time I try to add an offer to my account it tells me that I have no room. I have contacted support and was told that it means the offer was already redeemed for the maximum amount of people that could except the offer. They also stated that when the maximum amount of offers are redeemed they aren't supposed to show up on the screen/ app. Problem still is 't fixed and I can never get any of the offerings.

title: Savings star
body: I don't like coupons buying sure like this app!

title: Love it!
body: I LOVE this app!! I've cashed out several times already. Works exactly like it says it does! I just wish they'd include more of the items I buy most often. Love the "any brand" rebates!!

title: Lame app....
body: Receipts take too long to post not enough choices receipts take too long to post some of the coupons "sell out". I will be deleting this app.

title: I like it but...
body: I have LOTS of trouble getting the app to scan my products or load efficiently. I don't have this problem with any other apps. Otherwise I love the offers wish they updated sooner ????

title: Needs a tweak
body: This app would be great if a) you could search coupons for a specific item.

title: Where Are the Stores?
body: I just downloaded the app. It tells me that I must add stores first....but then it displays zero stores that I might add and when I click the "Add Stores" button nothing happens. So this app is completely unusable. It is a waste of download space.

title: Good rebate app
body: I love that there are so many different brands that this rebate app has to offer! I also really like that you can have your balance transferred straight to your checking account. It would be nice if the redemptions processed sooner than they do now but this is one of my favorite rebate apps for sure.

title: HORRIBLE!!!!!!!!
body: I have never once received any cash back. I tried many many times and every time I get an email saying they can't read receipts or items don't qualify even tho I scanned them to see if they qualify. It's always some excuse. Very frustrating Don't buy or download it it is the biggest rip off. Very disappointed

title: Lts1007
body: I wish you could scan all receipts. Sitting and waiting for results from Publix or Winn Dixie really stinks! It takes forever. If you didn't receive credit for an item it takes even longer to have support from customer service.

title: Great savings app!
body: I like this app because I can use it instead of coupons and I have $1 so far. I rather a simpler method instead of scan barcode and photo receipt.

title: Horrible
body: CS takes forever to respond to emails which are usually in reference to trouble receiving credit for your redemptions. I agree it is much worse then Checkout51 Ibotta or even snap I've never experienced difficulty like this with scanning products and obtaining proper credit-I recently attempted to fulfill the glad deal using the trashbags from Dollar General i purchased various scents of the same trashbag Same quantity and only 1 scent was accepted even after they CLEARLY had chance to review my receipt they still only gave me credit for the one that scanned I submitted the receipt after scanning the 1 box 8x -rejected; over the past week I have resubmitted receipt along with photos of the barcodes and explanation And yet I still haven't received credit OR any response from my emails

title: Started out fine...
body: The app itself works fine. No problems there. It seemed cool: just show your receipts and get money back. Simple right? The problem is that after my first cash out every time I submit a receipt I am given some bs reason they won't accept it. They say the date is missing. No it's right there if you'd bother to look. Store logo missing. What do you think the big circle at the top with the store name is then? They take weeks to write you and tell you this so usually I've already tossed the receipt and can't resubmit. I started underlining and highlighting parts of the receipt with stars and arrows to point things out. Oh the receipt's too blurry to read now. Funny how it's sharp enough that I can read from the image without even zooming in but they don't have that technology I guess. Waste of time. Use Ibotta if you want to get money back.

title: Scanner doesn't work
body: Can't scan the receipt to submit. My phones scans everything else but will not work for this. Really a pain to do by computer. Not worth the time it takes.

title: #checkout51
body: I

title: Great but not the Best
body: I really like SavingStar but I also feel some things are more complicated than needed. If we don't have a loyalty card for a store we should still be able to take a photo of the receipt instead. I know for at least some stores this isn't an option. When you buy certain items... Only to find out you can't redeem the receipt: it's a bit obnoxious.  Other than little quirks like that: I do love it.

title: My favorite app
body: Love this app. Love saving money. So easy to use. Great customer service.

title: Great app - wonderful customer support
body: I've used Savingstar for several years via my Kroger card. Once that program changed I learned about all the other stores I could submit savings for and save more money. When I've had a question or a problem submitting a receipt customer support answers my email in under 24 hours. Easy cash out and great coupons. I don't mind submitting my receipts - but have difficulty finding the credits from Kmart SYW card.

title: Great App!
body: What could be wrong with free $ on items I already purchase? Great app and money is put in my account fast!

title: Good but needs improvement
body: I like this but not many of the deals are things I buy normally.  It's nice to get money back on the items that I do though!!

title: Love the savings
body: I have a few grocery rebate apps and I love that this one automatically syncs with my main grocery store reward cards. I will often forget the coupons I have loaded and will be surprised with the amount ready to withdraw from my savingstar account.

title: I like it
body: Even if I get $.25 a week I like it.

title: Great savings app!
body: Easy to use! Click the offers - purchase the products - receive rebates! Love it!

title: Great
body: Nice app but needs some improvement.

title: Love this app!
body: Getting money back on things you buy everyday is great!

title: Not much I purchase offered
body: Don't find much I need in rebates offered. No more free items. I still check weekly to see if anything I need.  Great customer service when I contacted them in the past.

title: Lots of missing rewards
body: Quite frequently rewards take extended periods of time to be processed and quite often never show up. Right now I see that two receipts that i have submitted have been processed but the rewards that they are for have not.

title: Love this app
body: Good extra cash.

title: Love this app!!!
body: Extra cash!!!

title: Great if offers are for products you shop for
body: I've had this app for over a year and earned an extra $35 on items I normally purchase.  I have never had an issue with an item being created but you have to have patience. It can take up to 3 weeks (like they say) to be credited. I hate having to hold onto receipts in case something is missed but I have not had an issue yet.  It's easier to use than other apps no snapping barcodes and copies of receipts just scan your loyalty card at checkout.  Some months the same items reappear which is fine for me because I buy those items regularly but I can see how it's frustrating for some people.  I've cashed out for an Amazon gift card before and recently a PayPal deposit. PayPal deposit took only 24 hours.  Best of all you can combine printed coupons with the offers for double savings!

title: Good app
body: I love saving money with this app but I wish I could link any loyalty card in my area not just a couple.

title: Saving Star great idea
body: I like the app really well!  It doesn't pick up my items some times from the grocery card I have saved but it is good!

title: Needs improving but still good
body: I love this app. I've used it for a while now and earned a lot of cash back. There is a good variety of rebates. However the app lately takes a while to load account info or the receipt scan page. And offers are taking a long time to credit. Time to update!

title: Good app
body: I do like the app with one exception when a rebate is no longer available please remove from being an offer!

title: Waiting for more improvements
body: I loved it when I first started using this app. Seems like it takes longer for the receipts to go through especially the ones you have to spend $20 or so. Even though I have been using it for awhile now the account history only has two or three transaction recorded on there it has not updated at all. I don't mind taking a picture of the receipt but having to verify and scan all my products gets old especially when the app shuts down or my camera doesn't work and I have to start the WHOLE process over again!  But I am making money on it and wish to see more improvements in the future.

title: Love love this app!
body: Must have for all those wishing to save money. I like the ability to connect my store cards with it however was sad when they lost Kroger - since I shop there a lot. Other than that the app is great!

title: Alliegator1129
body: My receipts process yet no money is ever added to my account. I have close to $10 not in my account and I'm annoyed. Customer service never responds so asking for help is useless. Don't bother with this app

title: Love this app!!!
body: It's great when you can earn money just buying things you were gonna buy anyway. It's a plus that I'm a couponer and most of the deals usually match up with coupons for extra savings!

title: Good potential
body: I joined SavingStar in the last month. The offers are updated often. I have more on my grocery list to remind me to cash out!

title: Some hiccups with the app
body: I have enjoyed the savings since starting with the program. Lately the scan function hasn't worked properly. I end up having to email my information to customer service. They are typically quick to respond but lately it is taking quite some time and me having to follow-up on my emails. Overall I still like the app.

title: Missing Savings!
body: I was very excited someone recommended I sign up and use this. I did glad to see a lot of my local stores. 1/2 of my list is from Harris Teeter I scan the items to make sure they qualify yet there are still over 10 things on my list purchased months ago and I have not received my credit. I even bought the small ice cream to get it fee.

title: Good App
body: Good App

title: More highly used products
body: Great app but I would to see more commonly used products and the addition of more stores such as Publix and Military Commissary. Takes too long to credit money to account and even then it's usually wrong.

title: Soright
body: Could be a whole lot better.

title: Great
body: Love this app. Especially the weekly healthy deals.

title: Very happy!
body: Started using this app back in March 2015. I just requested my first payout of 45.00. I try to pair my  Savingstar list each week with my coupons and store sales to make the most of the savings. Love that I can enter my supermarket card!

title: Easy to use
body: I've been using this for over a year and love it. Nice to not have to trying to find coupons and cut them out.

title: Difficult to earn why bother with produce when uploads are never approved?
body: It's taken me two years to earn $10. My redemptions for healthy offers are never approved but they have to be loose/no bar code so why bother? Why do I want an Amex card? I can't use it anywhere and I'm not going to ask my server to pay Amex fees.

title: Love it
body: Love getting the rebates and it's so simple!

title: So easy to use and makes shopping fun!
body: I've saved quite a bit with this app. I pair store sales with the saving star rebates and it's great!!

title: A good app to have
body: I have had no problems with using this app. There has been an improvement on brands/items offered on the site. As long as they keep improving on that I will be a happy customer.

title: Not many offerings
body: I rarely purchase things that are on this app. Considering deleting because it's taking up space and not very useful.

title: Not as good as others
body: I use this app but it doesn't have very many offers. I use another one that has way more choices and nice earned about 5 times as much on the other one than on saving star in the same amount of time. I still like it. The one or many offers are nice and if I can save even a small amount it's money I didn't have!

title: Works okay selection limited
body: Easy to use and functions as it promises so far.  Strongest feature is the Healthy Offer of The Week - wish there were more offers from the grocery store perimeter.  Lots of junk to slough through but we still find it worthwhile to have.  No downside.

title: It's NOT great
body: Not updated enough one healthy offer a week?! Other sites offer way more!

title: Not so great
body: This app is great in the sense it has coupons on its site but the app is not as great as it once was. First they took away the free weekly item to all but a select few and I have received one since then but don't know how or why just that one and no other. It would be wise to let us know so we can choose whether to participate in receiving a free item. Also not enough stores in this app.

title: Good App
body: Like saving money. Would like to see more rebates and more stores added.

title: SavingStar
body: Was excited to find savings but customer support does not get back to you.  When it says you can buy any you can't!  You have to buy specific items or you get an error message stating not eligible!  Frustrating because customer support does not reply.  Haven't had the same problem with a different app!  Hope they make corrections!

title: Has gotten bad
body: I used to like it I liked some stores automatically post your savings. But the past few months have been terrible. My offers are not being credited several times or incorrect amount gets credited. Takes almost 2 weeks to get response. Looking into other apps and will be deleting saving star if issues are not resolved

title: Great App
body: This app is better than Ibotta.  I don't have to scan anything.  Love it keep up the great work.

title: MnQueenie
body: Awesome app!

title: Done with this app
body: One star too many. The rebates take too long. I've bought a few items and then they expire so no rebate. Even though the item was purchased within the correct dates. Items are gone too quick not available. Choices available aren't worth it. Don't think I'll continue. Not worth the aggravation.

title: Good app
body: Easy to use and easy money!  What's not to love?

title: Decent app
body: If you want a coupon you have to save it right away. Otherwise they run out. Processing receipts takes awhile but they have a low cash-out.

title: M
body: It takes too long to load the rebates. Navigation can be hard to follow. For example if your rebate did not load and you have to do it manually you should be able to select from any store instead of a select few. I still use the app but I am hoping that there will be upgrades in the near future that will make it easier to use. Customer service is slow as well.

title: Love it
body: Really saves

title: Could be better
body: I've used ibotta and snap for the same type of coupons. I have never had any issues with ibotta or snap reading my receipt but with star its 75% of the time I have to re submit my receipt?!?! It's also less things I regularly buy. And no any brand coupons.

title: Not worth the effort
body: I found this app to be less rewarding and more of a hassle than what it professes to be.  I don't purchase most of the items on the offers list.  Also have to resubmit receipts often even when they can be read. I don't find it worth my time.

title: Pretty Good
body: Doesn't have a lot of products that I use but does give a fresh food offer every week.  While it does want you to buy multiples of a product to get your money usually you can buy them in more than one trip. Quicker response time to get your money than Savings Catcher but slower than Ibotta and Checkout 51.

title: Saving star
body: This is a wonderful app. It always have deals I buy. I have not had any bad experiences with them. If I do have a problem I just contact them and they are quick to respond and resolve the issue. Love their customer service.

title: Love it
body: One of the best money saving Ap's

title: Great concept but.......
body: There aren't a whole lot of rebates to choose from & its mostly stuff I don't buy anyway so my potential savings is low. Second why can't the rebates be used at any store like some of the other rebate apps and then I've purchased items at an approved store only to realize after I got home that I had to have a loyalty card for that store so I bought something I wouldn't normally buy and then never got the rebate. No savings there! And third and most frustrating as mentioned by another reviewer is that a rebate looks "legit" meaning that it appears that you'll actually get money back so u buy the item and try to redeem as soon as u get home only to find out that the limit has been reached. I contacted customer service about this in the past. All they did was apologize & say that they try to remove items from the list as soon as they r no longer valid but I've seen items remain on there for weeks after it says limit reached. Sometimes it'll say it when ur looking thru all of the offers but other times everything looks good until u actually try to add that offer to ur list. More time wasted than money saved with this app ????

title: Great app!
body: Been using this for over a year and it's a quick easy way to earn money on items I'm already buying at the grocery store. Plus the percentage back thru online shopping is fantastic!!

title: Do not waste your time
body: This app was great for the first month or so. Now there is not much that I actually buy and when I do....they can never process my receipt. By the time they let me know and I contact customer service it's been so long that the offer is no longer available or expired.  A waste of time!

title: Great payback app
body: Been using this app for a while love it!!

title: Definitely not my fave savings app
body: I have tried several other savings apps and this one is my least favorite to work with. I was not fully paid for the first 100% freebie offer I tried the app seems to take quite awhile to process and credit your account while others pay within 24 hours and I hate the activation requirements. This app allows you to activate an offer before you purchase the item and then once a certain number of activations have been met you can't take advantage of that offer anymore. My problem with that method is that just because you activate an offer it doesn't mean you will take advantage of it. AND the offer is still being displayed on the main page leading you to believe that you can use only to discover that you can't. This has messed me up a few times now I just go and add everything to my list that I might possibly take advantage of knowing that I probably won't use quite a few of them but I have to play their game.

title: Worst app ever
body: What a rip off!  I have had this app for months and have tried to redeem offers and something is always wrong and it never works.  Have never been able to redeem even one offer.  I send questions and no response.  I wasted money buying products thinking I would get a refund but not one worked and no response from the "contact us".  Do not get this app.

title: Ibotta
body: The best app!! I love it it works great & is very easy to use.

title: Great
body: I've been using for a while now. I don't use the picture receipt part to much of a hassle for me. The store card works well. I use this for extra savings and coupons for immediate savings. I'm very pleased overall.

title: Fabulous
body: I absolutely adore this app. This is the only app I've ever had that gives me cash back straight up. I've never had an app work this well- I've never even had to text them asking for a refund. I've  made over $60 in the last four months simply purchasing things that I would normally buy.

title: Such a let down
body: When I first started using this app around a year ago it was so promising. Fun and easy to use and earned money quickly. Now there's hardly ever any worthy rebates. Never any rebates for fresh foods and most of the products are rare and hard to find in any stores near me. I very rarely use this app anymore. There are way better money making apps out there! Ibotta receipt hog mobisave!

title: Very Disappointed
body: At first I just tried the free items. Almost every time I had an issue. Either didn't get complete credit item says it qualifies but is then rejected or something else. It has been very frustrating! Also when you try to claim deals they are not available. I have pretty much decided to just try to claim only the free items and hope for the best! Ibotta works much better.

title: Great way to save!
body: I love this app. It is fairly easy to use and has lots of great offers. My only complaint is the limited number of stores that I can shop at.

title: Love it
body: So easy especially when you link your loyalty cards!  It does all the work for you after selecting items!

title: Love It
body: I love this app. All you have to do is activate the offers that you want and then buy them at the store and use your loyalty card. There are lots of good products on here.

title: Love it!
body: I love this app! I have done so well with it in saving money. I had one that didn't take off of a card & after contacting SavingStar & sending a picture of my receipt they credited my account. I especially like the deals where when you but $40 of different items that you get $5 or $10 back. Update. I still like this quite a bit but there are glitches. Sometimes it says it isn't a match & it is which is very disappointing. This is the 2nd best saving app I have & recommend it to my friends.

title: App
body: This is very time consuming uploading pictures of receipts! And the app kicks me out every time I try to submit a receipt. Go back to loyalty card swipes!

title: Great app
body: Great app.

title: LOVE THE APP
body: Great way to save money especially couponing.. Lots of great items..

title: Disapointing app!
body: It takes forever to get your cash back. Customer service is horribly slow. Can't cash out now due to my email not being verified. Requested to link 2 days ago and nothing yet. I stay with ibotta and mobi save waaaaay faster and better customer service!

title: Some Good Offers
body: Some good offers but not updated frequently enough with new items.

title: Can't even reset my password
body: I try resetting my password and I received no email. So this app is pretty much useless. Bye!

title: Awesome
body: this app give so much and many options on the rebate.

title: Can't Really Complain
body: I really don't have any issues. I always get responses from customer service I get my money quickly into my PayPal and the products are popular items. Great app to have alongside iBotta!

title: Disappointed
body: This app is a great way to save a little money that is if it worked efficiently! From the get go I would verify the items before submitting the receipts  only to get declined a week later for no matching offers found.  Customer service is very slow to respond to inquiries.  I only get credit for partial of the purchases  from the automatic savings stores. It seems like I have to contact customer service with each purchase I try to redeem. So frustrated with this app!!! Ready to just stop using it! It's more of a headache then anything else! Would be a great app if they fixed their issues!!!

title: Like the app
body: I really like the app but I think they should have more offers Credit your account faster and get more stores.

title: Great App
body: Easy way to make money just buying products you will normally buy!!! Love it!!!

title: DONT TRY IT
body: I have use lot of apps Ibotta Checkout51 and a few other apps. Saving star has been the most irritating app I have ever tired to use. I bought a few items and tried to redeem them like I do with all the other apps. It told me everything qualified I sent in the receipt days later I get a email saying it didn't qualify and that I needed to retry it so I had to pull everything out of the trash and it still didn't want to work. DONT TRY this app I'm not the only one who has had problems I knew a few people. This app wouldn't be so bad if they work the kinks out but until they do I won't use this app. I will just still with Ibotta and the others

title: Very slow
body: Although I have been using Saving Star I see the difference as compared to other saving apps. Very slow in posting the savings and customer service states we will reply in 5 days.Good program but needs work. Often app is not working correctly.

title: Would like to give it a zero
body: I haven't been credited for most items.  Scanning of barcodes produces errors.  Emails to customer service are answered so late you may no longer have the items to scan.  This is no longer worth the effort.

title: Additional savings!!!
body: Love the app. Additional way to save.

title: Awesome
body: Nice app.  Right way to save money.

title: Love it!!!
body: Easy to use great offers and fast pay out. Completely worth it !!

title: $ saver
body: Easy to use. Wish more stores were linked automatically

title: Has benefits
body: I like saving money on things I am already buying.  Occasionally I have had delays in receipts being processed but not a huge problem.

title: Not enough selection and doesn't credit ur card
body: Sounds like a great app and I try an use it. But even if I use my CVS card and they scan it THROUGH THIS APP my stuff never credits. It's a Pain. And there is no way to submit receipt for places with the card. It's a waste of time

title: Disappointed
body: Problems with timely turn around for receipt processing. I have scanned legitimate items and submitted the receipt then 18 days later it is rejected. If the offer is still available and I try to resubmit I get an error saying the receipt was already processed. I have tried contacting customer service with no reply

title: Worst app I've ever used

title: Great app!

title: Not bad

title: Never sure if will receive rebate
body: I like the app but if I am trying to complete a one or many offer I am never sure if savings star has computed the amount the same.  It takes a long time for the rebate to post.  So many other programs or apps post within 24 hours or less.

title: Awesome! Love in' it!

There are a few times that the receipt has issues with being accepted but keep at it it'll work out. I especially like that the offers seem in line with the coupons of the month as well giving you double savings! Quick and easy with saving money! Praise Jesus!

title: So far so good

I am happy with the app.   I like the fact that some store cards automatically send your savings over. Never had an issue with it taking weeks. The longest time I've waited was 3 days. I'm ok with that

title: Much easier than coupons
body: I've been using this app for  about 6 months. It makes saving $ on groceries very easy. I'm often frustrated with the hassle of paper coupons--cutting sorting remembering to use them. This app is much easier to use than paper coupons. Sometimes there's a long delay in getting the cash back savings--mostly because the stores don't provide the info right away. When I send a receipt I get the cash in a few days.

title: Not a top favorite of mine...
body: I am frustrated at times with this app because it takes so long to get the submission approved that I gave had two receipts denied because they took so long to approve it the offer expired and so the reason was "no current offers".  I like that it's a bonus but accuracy and speed should be valued as without the consumer you would not exist .

title: Disappointing
body: This initially was a great app. Lately there have been more problems than savings. Not sure what is going on but i am thinking if it continues i will quit using it.

title: Was good having issues now

title: Savings star
body: I simply love it

title: Love the app
