body: Great app

title: Can't even get it to work
body: The only reason I'm giving this app a one star rating is because I can't even use it. It won't let me sign up I keep getting an error message. And then I tried to contact support and that didn't work either. Hopefully they can get it together.

title: Great app!
body: I was very skeptical at first but once I received my first payout I was sold. Love This!

title: Less than impressed
body: So far I have not received a single credit. It does say it can take up to 22 days for loyalty card rebates to post I personally think this an absurd period of time to have to wait. I am now having to hold on to all my receipts to make sure I receive credit. However credits from other apps like Ibotta and Checkout 51 appear within 48 hours. I'm going to wait the 22 days and if I still do not see a credit it will be deleted...it's just not worth it.

title: Perfect For When I Forget
body: To check for new coupons online. I use savings tar for cash back on online purchases as well. Love it!

title: Always a problem with receipts.
body: Everytime I submit a receipt I get a email stating there was a problem. I also use Ibotta and check out 51 never have any issues there.

title: LOVE THIS APP
body: Coupons are a thing of the past! this is one of my favorite coupon Apps. Love the one or many offers!

title: Okay...but
body: Takes a little too long to get rebates. I have rebates from almost a month ago that still haven't processed. One item on the receipt did. But the others haven't. Waiting 2 weeks for a response back from customer service

title: Love it
body: I'm still getting used to this but have received $$. It encourages me to try new products "stockpile" - a couponers rule I'm learning additional ways to earn & am thrilled. But for a "newbee" BE PATIENT when starting to coupon ... It takes about 3 months to ... See the fruits of your labor but sooo worth it

title: Slow
body: Very slow to get a response and then it says my items were bought outside of time period for when rebate was available because it took too long to process. Very disappointed.

title: Good app
body: I don't save a tremendous amount but every little bit helps;)  The variety is not always great. Would like to see more offers. Have given less stars than before. I do not like the one or many offers. It would be nice if you could get some credit for the amount you have bought instead of nothing (if you don't purchase the max amount).

title: Superstar!!
body: I love it

title: ????Awesome $
body: Great app. Easy savings $$$

title: Savings star is grreat
body: I've got a lot of money back by using SavingStar. And now I can get iTunes cards that's awesome b

title: Good
body: I love that it is linked to the store card so you don't have to scan in receipts. It does seem to take longer to get a refund. It used to be just 1-2 days now it's taking weeks.

title: Nice app!
body: I love savings star. Plenty of everyday products to make some extra spare change on. You won't get rich but over time it adds up. Have unfortunately had some trouble with the rite aid loyalty card and some products that are featured but for some reason don't qualify. Frustrating.

title: Frustrating...Very Frustrating!!
body: After going out of my way to purchase items that had an offer... Yes you guessed it I never received the promised offer. It was a store with a loyalty card linked to the app so you cant even submit a receipt. Not just one item but 10 items that i never received credit for. You will get some offers but for me it is more like 1 out of 5 that actually work. If you are going to offer something like this please...please make sure your app/system works properly.   I'm ready to throw in the towel. Its just not worth the aggravation!!

title: Great way to get money back!
body: I don't review apps like this unless I actually get a payout from them this one pays!

title: Frustrating..
body: The first day I downloaded the app it kept telling me there was a login error. You get what you pay for

title: Won't Allow Me To Enter Zip or location
body: I know it's a gees app based off of feedback from others but there's a bug in the app that won't allow me to enter zip or location. The screen keeps flashing the numbers and closes the number screen. Deleted and re-added app still having same issue. Once the bug is fixed I'm sure it'll be a great app.

title: App issues
body: This is my second attempt to contact Savingstar about app issues. I did not receive a response to the first email I sent. I can not sign into my account via the app. My password works on the website but not the app. I have tried changing my password. Please fix this so I can fix the one star rating.

title: Great app
body: No problems love it

title: Great!!
body: Awesome!!!

title: Stater Bros
body: Has no reward cards so move it to normal scan receipts list

title: Easy to use
body: This app is easier to use than other similar apps because for some stores you don't even need to scan your receipt.  You just have to enter your rewards card info one time.  I wish they would include more healthy foods but otherwise this app is great.

title: Great..
body: I'd probably say that the app is good just sometimes it's hard to load the barcode.

title: Great app!
body: Love this app and website! Great customer service BUT (and this is why I went from 5 star to 3) it is taking much to long to get a response these days- over 10 days is way to long! Scanning receipts has become more difficult in the last month where I have had to redo receipts multiple times. Also some of the offers are very frustrating for example oranges or lettuce. Not all stores especially big box stores like Costco or SAMs sell loose produce- what is the difference if I buy 3 loose heads (that I put in a bag) of lettuce or 3 already in a bag? Putting restrictions on offers like this is discouraging to your users. When offers have reached the limit please move them change the color or remove them- it is also frustrating to click on offers and have pop ups come up that they are not available.   Awesome that there are offers that are not just processed junk foods.   They are very reliable for pay out I have saved and received over $100 already.

title: Slow but sure
body: I have used this app for a long time and will still continue to use it.  It just takes forever for your savings to appear as opposed to other apps that are instantaneous or take about 24 hours.

title: Great app
body: Effortless and saves me money!!!!

title: Used to be ok
body: This app used to just be okay but now it's ridiculous. I buy exactly what is pictured and submit clear detailed receipts from listed stores. Later I get an email stating that my submission was not accepted. The only time my receipts were accepted In the past is when there was only one item on them. Not worth the time.

title: Not fun
body: Very rarely do I get rebates .... I auto load cards I shop ... And if I don't pay VERY CLOSE attention I get NOTHING.  I tried having customer service help ( after writing bad reviews on Facebook I FINALLY got someone to answer me) and she admitted she saw some products (not all) yet she NEVER credited me.   I finally deleted my account.  I went shopping one day based on what I had for coupons what was on here and what was on sale ...  I should have made at least a minimum of $2.00 ...got nothing. Another time I purchased a bunch of products not even realizing they were on list and never got $5 credit ( I think it was sc Johnson).   ***shrug*** I'm sure some of it's my fault but since I started paying attention and I KNOW I'm doing it right ..still nothing.  I

title: Fun!!

title: Savingstar

title: AWESOME

I have contact customer support a few times about this issue but it takes a week or more for them to get back to you.

title: Great app

title: Disappointed
body: I was pleased after using the app for a short while but then it took longer and longer for receipts to be processed. Lately I've been waiting a week or more. It's been 10 days so far for one of my receipts and still no word. Sometimes after even a longer period I receive notice that the receipt wasn't legible or something frustrating like that. I'm not sure I will keep using this app if processing times don't improve.

title: Like it !!!

Now that I've had a chance to really get into it It's still Just O-K. I'm starting to do the Friday Freebies to get that Extra change. The Friday freebies have stopped for getting them every Friday. The offers remain the same and you can't use certain stores. You also have to purchase $18-$20 worth of stuff to get a $5 rebate. I'm still with it but it's almost beginning to be a waste of time.

body: It's frustrating that I can't redeem many times bc I went to buy my groceries to Publix which happens to be the most important chain in FL and is not included in the store list this app has.

title: Variety
body: I love that you can just use your store cards and get credit for your purchase.    I just wish they'd take onto consideration that there are sometimes one or two people on a household who can't use the larger sizes of some items or the quantities that you must buy to get the rebate. Also would love to see more items for older people to purchase. Now they're making it that you need to buy a very large quantity to get many of the rebates. That's just NOT practical for some of us!

title: One of the best!
body: This is one of my favorite savings app..   Would be better if rebates didn't take so long to receive.  Have had a lot of savings but have not tried to cash out yet.   Not sure if I like the one or many..

title: Every penny helps
body: Good app and helps save a little money. Like it when they have free products but don't have as often as they did in past. Wished the free items lasted longer than s few days to collect before expiration. Wished could link to stores with savings cards and it automatically take off savings.

title: So far so good!
body: Ok so I'm not going all in with a 5 star because I haven't cashed out yet.  But so far this is the third best rebate app on my list.  And I must have linked some of my cards because I got rebates without even scanning my receipt.  Or I was groggy when I scanned the receipt lol after a long night of coupon organization.  Anyway I like that it gives you more freedom in where you shop and the buy one or many is a cool option to make a bigger cash back all at once.  All in all if you are trying narrow your options on which cash back apps to use this should be one of them if you are looking for everyday purchases and not the organic all natural blah blah blah purchases.

title: Easy to use great deals
body: When something doesn't go as you would expect customer service is willing to rectify the issue. It does take a while to hear back but they are always courteous and helpful.

title: Won't scan barcodes or pick stores
body: I downloaded this app three times and it never let me type in my zip code or find stores so I did it manually  when that was finally finished it would not take any of my store bar codes! By picture or when I typed it in. I tried three times. There are too many apps out there that do the same thing to waste my time with this one. Deleted!

title: Fair compared to others

It can't decide. I took a picture of my receipt it denied it. So I took more pictures of the receipt & sent those in denied as "already processed" when it should have not been denied in the first place. I activated the rebate before I bought the product like I was supposed to. I like Ibotta much better. I'm going to delete this from my phone.

Albertson's stopped tracking anything with their keychain card over two years ago that's the only way that you're allowed to go ahead and get any of these discounts at Albertson's on this app!

title: Good
body: I use this app for grocery shopping. I have had great success. It only takes a day or 2 to add money to your account. I would have given it five stars but they need to offer more fresh fruit and vegetables offers and not so many one or more offers.

title: Middle of the road
body: It's ok. I wish they offered more variety. I also wish the turn around time was quicker. Ibotta credits within 24 hours and has tons of rebates on stuff. I do like that you don't have to pick a certain store or category to see the offered rebates like you do with ibotta.

title: Good gain
body: This is a great way to make some money from buying you grocery items. Just scan the product code and picture the receipt. Then you receive your money.

title: Hurry up and wait
body: I like the products that are offered but I shop at Kroger and it takes about two weeks for the receipts to process. They stopped doing the free Friday items and now you have to earn them. I also don't like the one or many rebates.

title: Great app!
body: I really like it- it's easy to use and while it doesn't always have a ton of stuff I buy it has a variety of things. And hey why not get money back for stuff your gonna buy anyway?

title: Love this app
body: It was super easy to make $20 in two shopping trips for products that are on sale.  The small savings are ok but I would rather get $5 for buying $20 of sale product.  Very fast turnaround on scanned receipt.  It took a bit longer to get credit from a linked store.

title: A money saving app
body: I've been using this for several years now. Always saves me money. Never a problem.

title: Used to be great now not so much
body: Positives: FAST turnaround and great customer service. Good variety of offers for products that are NOT obscure.  I like their shopping portal and earn more money from that than from the product rebates I think.   Negatives: used to offer a freebie every weekend. As of May 1st touted their "freebie anytime" change as well as pushed their "get to Gold level to know about freebies in advance!" Against all odds I made it to Gold level was told of 1 freebie and since then nothing. Not an improvement but a step back. Also not fond of the push on "one or many" offers since I don't buy tons of the products they promote. I'd rather have one or two $0.50 offers that interest me than have to spent $25 in Clorox products to earn $5 back for instance.  Also I wish I could use offers at any stores. I shop at Aldi & Save A Lot mostly. I do buy some of the products promoted by SavingStar but since those stores aren't included in the program I can't take advantage of the offers.  So it's a mixed bag but I dislike the latest changes which spurred my not-so-great review. YMMV.  The app works great for me and so does the website.

title: The worst rebate app- don't bother!!
body: This is by far the worst rebate app. They don't process receipts in the amount of time they promise to and do not answer customer service emails promptly either! Still waiting 12 days for a receipt that hasn't even been reviewed and they haven't returned my email. I'm in a Facebook group with thousands of other coupon and rebate app users and everyone is always complaining about how awful Savingstar is. So I am not alone! Buyers beware! And also if any marketing departments of potential products they are thinking of listing in this app are reading this - don't! I will definitely be deleting this!

title: Good app
body: The app is good. It takes a while for you to get credit in purchases. Sometimes you have to email them to give you credit.

title: Saving money feel so good

title: Could be better...

title: Thumbs down
body: I am not impressed with this app. It is easy to use but it can take up to a month to get your rebate. My other apps take less than 24 hours this is just crazy.

title: Love saving money but my app isn't working right now
body: I love saving money with saving star but I am unable to see amount that is in my account right now.   That page just keeps thinking & is a blank page :(.

title: Great App!

title: Easy. Awesome.
body: Much easier to use than similar apps that make you watch a video or post to Facebook. With most stores you can link your loyalty card so it is completely effortless. Love it.

title: Love it!!!
body: Free money without having to clipping carry coupons what could be better!

title: Great app!
body: They credit my purchases in a timely manner and cash outs to my PayPal are quick

title: It's ok

title: Love
body: Great and easy way to save. I LOVE the way I can link my savings to my Upromise account or just take the cash to my bank account.

title: So so
body: Saves money. Takes forever to get support when a receipt does not go thru or an automatic savings is not credited to your account. Takes too much effort to stay on top of it.  Customer service reps are nice though.

title: Not Impressed
body: I will probably keep on using Saving Star because of the freebies but I like Ibotta Checkout51 and Snap by Groupon way better. I often have trouble with items scanning. Then I have to send a message to customer service with the bar code info. They never e-mail me back although they do fix the bar codes. I just have to keep re-checking to see if they have fixed it which means I have to keep receipts lying around.   Also if you submit a receipt and forget an item you wanted to submit that is on that receipt they will not take it because the receipt has "already been processed". All the other savings app let you submit a receipt more than once for different items.

title: So far so good:)
body: I've had this app for a few weeks and am already using it and saving money! I don't feel it's difficult to use and I like it am thankful to save any amount of money!!

title: Love saying money. Thank you SavingStar!
body: Got my first deposit. Got it within two days. Everyone who's looking into saving money should try SavingStar.

title: Love it!!
body: I love it!!

title: Free money
body: I've been using it a while and it's been pretty easy to use. I did have a couple problems that were solved through email correspondence. I love it!

title: Worthless
body: Never get money back for my receipts.

title: Easy and fast
body: I saved over $100 and the hardest part was registering my store cards. Once that was done the money started rolling in and with a $5 cash out it is easier to get your money than I outta and check out 51

title: Horrible! Do not download.
body: App used to be the best. Now I recommend to nobody. Was easy to use and automatic. Now impossible to upload receipt the barcode scanner does not work and absolutely no customer service. Was making a little money. Now nothing but a headache. Go somewhere else. I am!

title: Don't like it!
body: I have a hard time getting my credit they still owe me $10. I use it because I need the savings. It does not pick up some of my purchases and I have to enter them myself.

title: Scanning does not work well
body: Having to scan each item purchased is not only time consuming but most of the time items will not scan because they are to glossy for the scanner to read....not worth it.

title: Ok
body: Still fairly new to the app but it's been great so far. It's very easy and user friendly

title: Perfect
body: I love it and it easy to use

title: Easy to use HINTS I've earned $67.66 as of 12/31/2014
body: I have been using SavingStar since April 2014 and have found it easy to use to help with the grocery budget. SS is accessible thru both the app and their website.  When accessing thru the web you can email yourself the offers you have activated with all the details. This is helpful to transfer to your shopping list spreadsheet with your other rebates sales and coupons.   Simply LINK YOUR STORE LOYALTY CARDS and your rebate is automatically submitted. ALWAYS MAKE SURE YOU HAVE ACTIVATED THE OFFER BY CLICKING ON IT  and then checking your list in the app to make sure it appears.  I don't understand why others are having such a hard time with this app.  It's as easy to use as ibotta checkout51 and others.  I usually get my savings within 48 hours paid to my PayPal  account.  I have only had to deal with customer service one time and they were extremely prompt and  courteous and fixed my issue immediately. Highly recommend in conjunction with the other rebate apps out there.

title: Great App!
body: I love this app! Easy to use & never had a problem getting $$. Had a question once & received great customer service. Just wish there was a way to print the "list" of offers!

title: Easy to use and earn $$$
body: Love it!

title: Denied my receipts!
body: I have used Ibotta and checkout 51 and snap groupon and have never had an issue like I have with this one! They denied my receipt since it was emailed to me instead of a physical copy. Said that Lowes wasn't a store that supported my promo when it makes you click Lowes scan the item and upload your receipt. Funny now since it's an online receipt they won't credit me. Bad app don't use!

title: Not bad
body: If you use registered store discount cards it's easy. I've only submitted one receipt and didn't get the credit for it. Overall not bad considering all you have to do is shop with your member card.

title: Mixed feelings
body: Happy that I can make money but constantly have to contact customer service about things that didn't show up. Mostly online shopping but also submitting a receipt. It's annoying that I have to pay so much attention. Then they take weeks at least to fix the problem. This is basically a review of saving star. The app seems pretty great for submitting receipts  and checking my balance.

title: Great app so far
body: I've only been using this app less than two months I like that it links to some store cards

title: The app would be a LOT BETTER if
body: ...they allowed you to scan your receipt for stores that have bonus cards. The only way you can get the savings is if you remember to scan your phone at the register. Juggling kids printed coupons etc I always forget and lose the savings. :-(

title: Not getting rebates
body: The last 2 receipts I've tried submitting I wind up getting an email saying my receipt has already been processed.

title: Love this app
body: I always make a ton of money with this app. I love the fact that some stores are just tied into it with the loyalty cards so that I don't have to submit all these receipts.

title: Best ever!
body: Wow! This app is the easiest to use. I love it. Have saved a lot of money. ????

title: Easy to use & Request for more coupons

title: Love getting paid for items I buy all the time

title: Annette Baker
body: This app is amazing! The best thing I've ever downloaded...and I always get a quick response from emails if I have a question or problem forgetting my password! You guys ROCK!!! I love you!!!❤️❤️❤️

title: Great app
body: Easy way to earn cash and love the freebie on Fridays!

title: Great little savings app
body: I like the one or many savings on this app.  Also like the variety...wish other stores I shop more frequent was listed...like the Military Commissary...only give 4 stars because sometimes it takes a few tries to get the app to open or load and it will freeze in the middle of trying to upload a receipt

title: Great App!
body: I've been using Saving Star for over a year and I absolutely love it. Quickly redeems offers pay out is reasonable and not $20 or more like other apps and payouts are very quick. I use Checkout 51 Ibotta and Snap and they don't compare to Saving Star. Definitely recommend!

title: GREAT app
body: Save over $10 per month. Have used over 4 months.  Very easy to use!  Automatic when you shop at certain stores...select your "deal" purchase and watch the money accumulate????

title: Love this app!
body: This is a great app that has been easy to use with minimal issues. Awesome way to save money on groceries! Deposits in tha bank quickly!

title: It's ok
body: I like cash back apps but this one can take a while to show up in your account.

title: Pretty decent app
body: This is a pretty decent app. It has it's quirks but still decent. Sometimes it doesn't want to take receipts and I have to scan them again but overall it is usable.

title: Almost $50 so far - YAY
body: Good app.  Easy to use and many products I would use anyway.  Some issues with Harris Teeter items not being credited and it takes quite a while for credits from HT to post to your account (hence the 4 stars). But Wegman's posts accurately and very quickly so I chalk that up to HT issues not Savingstar.  Been a user for more than a year and I would definitely recommend.  Got to say I don't submit receipts - so I can't speak to that...  look a few dollars is better than none - enjoy the savings you get! Love the tiered rebates too - lots of time to get to a $20 or $25 threshhold to earn $5 - that's a great deal.

title: It's making me money
body: My sister in law introduced me to this app. I've made over $50 with it already. I am a coupon shopper and use this app as well. It's not flawless. I did have an issue with crediting for items I purchased but CS resolved them and credited my account. Overall I'm a happy user and encourage others to try it. It's like getting $50 cash for products you were going to buy anyway. Can't beat that! And it adds up fast.

title: Very good app!
body: I like the variety of products with saving star. I also like the fact that you can save on multiple items of the same brand over a period of time. I am a but saddened that I can only use it at one of 3 places in town. We are looking for more accessibility in the future with more stores available to this app.

title: Good App
body: The only negative I can think of is that it takes a while for your savings to load to the app. Other than that it's good -- refreshes the coupons frequently.

title: Hate cash out options
body: Either have to give them bank account info PayPal or donate it. Rip off.

title: Unreliable
body: Can't always save items. Frequently prompted to log in. Didn't get approved scanned item credit. Hmmmm. Could be better

title: Nice easy app

I also really like the weekly freebie that has been added. I am always anxious to see what it is and almost always buy it. I love getting something for nothing!!

title: Never worked
body: I was never able to process a rebate successfully. The app works to look at offers but it won't scan barcodes or take pictures of receipts. Customer service was semi-responsive but only with generic help like "Are you sure your app is up to date?" Or "Maybe your operating system is too old." It's pretty disappointing when you buy products because of the offer but they don't uphold their end of the deal. Don't waste your time like I did stick with ibotta.

title: Great app!
body: Easy to use and definitely gives money back for all the things we normally buy! Referred friends to this and they love it!

title: It's ok.. Not used as much as before

title: Good App!

title: Not too bad

title: Still unsure

I mainly use it for the Friday freebie and one or many offers since you can use coupons with those for the most part. But lately it hasn't been calculating correctly. I never got a response to my first support ticket. Just sent in another one. Hopefully I'll hear back and they'll fix it. Otherwise I may just delete the app and chalk it up to another bad rebate app.

title: Awesome!

title: Frustrating

title: Best money saving app ever

title: Love the new upgrade
body: I've been using this ap for years and have saved more than $300. I found the new update reliable and easy to use. Now I can shop at favorites like Walmart. Love this ap!!

I've been using this app for about two months and have earned nearly $20 rebates. That's $20 in my pocket that I otherwise wouldn't have - because I don't do paper coupons. Love the app and have recommended to others.

title: Awesome!
body: The app is great! So easy to save money shopping!

title: Refused my reciepts
body: I have Checkout 51 and ibotta and used them both successfully for months before i got this app.  I bought several items and tried to redeem only to have an email sent days later refusing my receipt due to clarity issues or items not matching ( which definitely was not the case) ive done rebates for years and the items matched.  So i had to resubmit everything which involved digging in my trash because i had used most of the items and threw away the empty packaging! I regathered everything together and this time used a magnifying glass to see that the receipt pic was totally in focus before i sent it. After all that work i Never received any reply this time no credits to my account no nothing. And checkout 51 and ibotta both use the same method for redemption and i have never had either app refuse any receipt i submitted.  I am uninstalling this app it cost me alot of my time and trash digging to boot. Also it can take up to 22 days to get credited??? My other two apps (checkout 51 & ibotta) do it the same day you submit first they let you know they received it and then usually within the hour  they let you know your money has been credited .

title: Great Savings App

The offer was still good and I submitted a receipt with the item.  Ibotta and Checkout51 have been a much better experience.

title: Great way to save!

title: Poor service
body: I have to submit a rebate over and over and over and then gripe and they will FINALLY give me my rebate. I get a canned email every single time stating either it's not the right item the store does not qualify or they can't see my entire receipt. This is total BS because the first thing I do is VERIFY the item to see if it qualifies and when I submit the receipt I have to CHOOSE the store where I purchased the item from THEIR list!! Then I look at my receipt and it's perfect. I think they have got to where they deny first and pay if forced not worth all the frustration. I give up!

title: Easy!
body: This app is easy to use. Store discount cards are saved on it so getting my rebate money back is a breeze!! Love the healthy discounts on Tuesdays and the Friday freebies!

title: Love this app!!

title: Great money savings app
body: I love the ability to cash out at $5. I would like more rebates for products I frequently buy.

title: Easiest

title: Works as expected and if I update while at the store I still get my rewards
body: Works and even if I update my savings star in the parking lot it's still enough time to update and get my rewards

title: Can't login... Support is a joke
body: I've used this app for over a year. Recently the app logged me out and will not let me sign back in. I get a generic "error occurred" pop up. I tried resetting my password since it's now a guessing game as to what the "error" is. Won't let me reset that either. App is now useless and I've lost $$...

title: Solid app
body: Can be a lengthy waiting for rebates to process sometimes but I always get them eventually. Also shout out for being one of the only apps left to still work on iOS 6. My old iPod 4th gen thanks you.

title: Hang on to your receipts
body: Don't throw away any receipts until you get your rebates! I have had several instances where I never got my money or they denied my claim stating I didn't meet the requirements when my receipt clearly shows that I did.

title: Love this app
body: I have used this app for almost two years and have saved around $150.

title: Like it
body: I like this app and I have saved money using it. It does seem to have some problems though. I can never redeem any of the produce offers. Any time I scan the produce it either says it doesn't match or the app states that it is having difficulty scanning the item and to try back later. I have never gotten it to work on produce no matter how many times I've tried it. I hope that this problem can be solved soon. Other than that I have enjoyed saving money by using this app.

title: Already have money in account
body: I just re-discovered this program. I downloaded the app made one shopping trip and already have $6.00 in my account. Works well!

title: I love it
body: Great app!

title: Love it
body: Love this app. Just wish it has more stores. But for the stores available to me it's great!!

title: A bit confusing
body: Tip: activate all offers or you do not receive money back. It is confusing why you have to activate the offer prior to using it. Do not like this rule and find it hard to really want to use the app and make money.

title: Great app
body: The concept of this app is far better than it's competitors. You link your store card and it automatically will calculate the savings you sign up for. Other apps require you to submit a receipt (weekly..one day late and you miss your savings). This app keeps track for you and if you opt in for push notifications you will know every time a new offer is posted. Easiest savings app out there!!! Setup takes minutes to link all your cards!

title: Good but staff not checking receipts correctly
body: Staff not checking receipts correctly and it takes a minimum of 6 business days for them to respond to an email. Really frustrating. Besides the one incident it's my favorite so far. I like that you can cash outstanding $5 and the Friday freebees.

title: App is much easier than using the web site
body: I love that I have access to the details at the store!

title: It's $. I'm happy to wait for it.
body: I've had no troubles as-of yet. Linked to my PriceChopper card so it's a no-brainer. If I have to wait for some moula I wait. It's still money in my pocket.

title: I like it but can't get used to the new color to find it on my phone lol
body: I like the email reminders. I've been so busy with sickness in my family that the emails help me remember to check for  sales/rebates. Thank you! I also like that I don't have to cash out at a particular  amount. The savings can keep on  accruing till I'm ready.

title: Frustrating!!
body: As of today I have submitted 9 receipts and have not earned $0.01. Each time I have gotten a message stating my items didn't qualify yet they are fine when I check them prior to submitting my receipts. How can they qualify during the submission process but not afterwards? It is frustrating to say the least.

title: $aving $ makes me happy!

title: Like the web version hate the app

title: Not worth the hassle- there are better grocery apps!
body: Don't waste your time with this one. There are a lot better grocery savings apps. This one takes days or weeks to process. Others apps take sometimes minutes but never more than 48 hours. Half the time when you buy the required purchase in the right time frame you won't get credit. It will say the code is invalid or if you enter a produce code it says not valid. Customer service is ridiculous. You send a message about a purchase that can't be verified and the response is "we will review your email within 3-5 business days." That's an unacceptable time frame for  a response especially when so many offers are only good for 2-5 days! Save yourself the headache and download the other grocery savings apps. There are several that are easier and earn you more money!

title: Saving Star

title: Great App

title: Great app!
body: Very easy to use and easy way to earn money. Might take a while to cash out but it's still a great app!

title: Kinda more trouble than it's worth...IMO
body: I'm disappointed. The grocery store I shop at doesn't have loyalty card so this app is hardly worth the trouble. Why? First it takes a while to scan each item and then you have to photograph your receipts section by section. Then you have to deal with the fact that the app crashes frequently. Frustratingly if you are almost finished with the entire process you have to start over from the beginning bc it doesn't save the data you've entered thus far. This means you have to rescan every item and retake photos of receipt. Basically it will cost you 20 minutes to save 50¢. I'm running ios7 and I've tried updating app restarting Phone and using a different phone. Crashes everywhere. I'm baffled as to why they haven't designed a way to save what is entered so starting over isn't required. My advice:  Don't waste your time.

title: I enjoy using the app and love getting money back
body: I love using this app as it save me from cutting coupons.  It allows me to print a list so I don't forget any thing.  Makes saving money easy

title: Super easy!
body: What a great way to save money! Easy to use!

title: Great App!!
body: Super user friendly.

title: Love SavingStar and Love the App!
body: 1/5/2014 Update: I am still loving the SavingStar website and app. I have saved so much money through my grocery purchases and online shopping. I have also noticed that the SavingStar team has been updating and improving the app since I last wrote a review. It makes me feel good as a consumer to see that they are working hard on making their product the best it can be.  I appreciate that I can rely on SavingStar to continue to help me save money in my day to day life. I did have a problem with one of my rewards (the cashier didn’t scan my Hannaford sticker) but customer service was really nice and understanding about it. Thanks so much!  6/27/2014: I absolutely love the new App! SavingStar you did a superb and awesome job! I cannot believe how much improved you have made it the SavingStar team must have been hard at work for quite some time.   I will admit it was a bit of a shock at first and took me a few minutes to get used to it. To whomever is reading this review—give it the benefit of the doubt. I know you’ll come to really like the changes as I do once you’ve had a little while to play with it.   As far as updated features go I love the new list feature. Now when I go shopping I can check items off the list once I’ve bought them so I know not to pick those items up again before my credits post.   I also really like how clean and organized it now is. Before it was very clunky and often would freeze up when I was at the store. It is now a breeze!   Great work SavingStar! It’s really nice to know that you’re hard at work improving the service that I know and love. Keep it up!

title: Great concept
body: Love the app only difficulty is that my local grocery store doesn't participate so I don't get to use it as much as I'd like. Spending online works well just takes quite a bit longer for funds to hit than in store shopping! Overall would recommend for anyone who has time to coupon but hates the hassle of paper!

title: Savings

title: Easy money

title: Easy to save!

title: Love IT! Savings Star Is The BEST!

title: Too Cumbersome
body: I use multiple apps to help save money on my groceries and I must say Savings Star is the least user friendly most cumbersome app of all.  I have lost out on more money than I have saved with this app because I neglected to 'add' the items to my list prior  to  making the purchase.  None of my other apps require this additional action to redeem their offers.  I am deleting this app.

title: Great app
body: Love this app! I able to save money and that's always a plus in my books no matter how big or small the savings may be.

title: Great app so far!
body: I love the concept of this app and would give it five stars and maybe will in the future when I am more adjusted to it. So far I find it somewhat difficult to make money from this and think I just maybe buy different products than what they offer.  I think the best way to use it is before you go shopping check your shopping list and if anything on there is the same item as in their list get the brand they're offering. I use coupons too so sometime I just have to figure which is going to save me more money.

title: Slowwww

I've only been a member for a few months and have to contact customer service 3-4 times for "lost" receipts and credits. They have nice customer service but you'd save them a lot of work if you'd put more towards processing receipts

title: Don't waste your time
body: Save all UPCs with a copy of your receipt and a printout of the coupons you redeemed. The app will say items qualify but 2 weeks later the reviewer will say they aren't. As a user for over a year this app has gone downhill fast and I will be deleting it as soon as my payout clears. My time and sanity is worth so much more than any savings this app might promise.

title: If has gotten more frustrating.
body: It works fine when you are able to use the loyalty cards for the store. But if you have to scan the receipt it becomes difficult. You will get emails if the receipt doesn't scan correctly or show enough information. But recently they said that a receipt I submitted was the wrong store. But I didn't even have a receipt for that store. So it would be nice if they had a way I could go back and see what I recently submitted. Sometimes I submit 2 or 3 different receipts in one day so when they say I submitted the wrong receipt on that day we tell which one it was how much it was for or what items were submitted. So when I submit 3 Kroger and 1 Walmart receipts and I get an email that the Walgreens receipt is not valid; am I suppose to resubmit all of the receipts from that day? How do I know for sure which one you are mis-reading? Some times it is not worth the time.

title: Not the best coupon app out there
body: Takes forever for your receipts to be processed. The other apps guarantee 24-48 hour returns but usually get it done in about an hour. Not so with this app. Add that to the other problems people have mentioned and this app isn't worth it. Go back to automatically tracking Kroger purchases and I'll be happy for now I'm going back to ibotta snap and checkout51.

title: Shaws
body: Shaws no longer has loyalty  cards in nh so I can't register my main shopping site. Please fix

title: Great Way To Save!
body: I've been using this app for several months now and really love it! While there is not always something for me weekly to use I often find things that I would have bought anyway and I'm getting money back-and that is great!

title: sloppy work Apple!
body: I think Apple is getting sloppy about which apps are 100% voiceover compliant.this app works okay but there seems to be an assumption that those don't see well don't use the camera. So therefore it appears not much effort has been put into making sure that those of us who use voice over have a good fair access to the cameradocument and it would also help when scanning barcodes if there was a audible signal that could alert us home use voiceover that the item was scanned. I don't see how it could be hard to do that since every grocery store that you go to has a beeping scanner.that's why I only give this app three stars. Sloppy work. But not terrible.

title: Pretty good
body: It's a pretty decent app too bad it no longer redeems Amazon money.

title: Good idea but......

Every time I try to submit a receipt the app closes on me and since it doesn't save I have to rescan every item and the receipt again just for it to close on me AGAIN right when I hit submit....very frustrating

title: Love app

title: Not working

title: Love this site

title: Good

title: So convenient!

title: Love this app

title: Great savings

The effortless savings on name brand items are already reason enough to use this app but now they have included a free item every Friday (available til Sunday) and rebates on produce and sometimes meat. To date I've claimed $70 from savingstar which helps a lot with small internet purchases. And you only need $5 to cash out compared to $10-$20 from other similar apps. Keep it up savingstar!!

title: Savings Star

title: Money saver!!

title: Awesome app

title: REVISED From 4 Stars due to Changes
body: Just got an email that I can no longer redeem for Amazon certificates as of 10/31/14 right after I wrote the review praising them below. No I will not be giving you my bank account information for reward deposits. I'll revise if a better alternative is presented that is as good as or better than the Amazon reward.  Old 4-star review: It's limited in the number of coupons for food I actually will eat or subject my family to. Yay for Starbucks coupons! Nay for frankenfood coupons very highly processed crap I try not to buy. However the redemption process is great very easy and fast to get Amazon codes. So there's a lot of promise here they just need to attract coupons for food we actually eat.

title: Works great

title: Need to bring back organization option

title: Not worth the effort
body: This is a great app for the small easy money but try for the $5 savings and forget it.  I have tried three times to post a receipt and it keeps getting rejected i use just about every rebate app and this one is the worst.  I submitted a receipt with frebreze and little debbies to get the $25 & $20 goal.  They do not give you partial credit or tell you anything but your receipt  is not readable i have done it every way close far away.  And just three days ago i submitted a receipt from Target with all the same items and no problem.  Now that i would get the money back there is a problem... Not worth my time and everyone will hear too.

title: Doesn't work with coupons

So if I buy groceries and saving star says spend $25 and get back $5 and I spent $25 but used coupons to lower my total to $2 or something I wouldn't be able to get the $5 back because I didn't spend "$25" after I had used my coupons. I'd rather use coupons than this app.

So overall I really like the app. (4 stars)  Update (9/24/14): There was an update two days ago but there was also one last month. Maybe that's when I started having trouble with the scanner. It won't work. How am I supposed to redeem an offer at Walmart or Target if I can't scan the barcode?  (3 stars now)

title: Love it

title: Mostly Good
body: This ap is essentially like iBotta and Checkout 51. You scan receipts to earn money back on eligible items. The problem is that SavingStar is late to this party and is playing catchup. Their ap doesn't store a copy of the receipt you uploaded like the others do. That means if you are scanning multiple trips to earn a discount that involves making a number of purchases and there is some sort of problem with an upload it's nearly impossible to know which receipt is the problem. I have had an issue nearly every other time I have submitted a receipt. Of the three aps that I use SavingStar is consistently telling me that I didn't get the rebate or that there is a problem with a submission. Now they are very nice on the customer service side. Issues usually get resolved with an email or two. However it is a huge pain in the butt to have to email them constantly. They need to look at how their competitors are doing the same thing and adjust accordingly. It's a little odd that they have issues because they have been doing this kind of thing longer than either iBotta or 51 just not in a phone based ap. Their menu is a little clunky and it's hard to tell what you have just selected to redeem what is still active that you have selected and what is no longer active. It's hard to tell where you are in meeting the terms of a large purchase offer. All of these things could be improved upon. All they need to do is give Receipt Hog a look to see how to do that right. This ap is OKAY but it has huge room for improvement to bring it up to the same level as everyone else.

title: One of my favs!!!!

title: What happened!?!
body: I started using this app last month and now when I try to access it I keep getting a pop up over and over of stores I can upload receipts from. It won't let me past I just deleted the app to try to reinstall it hopefully that works!

title: App never works when you need it to
body: The app for the iPhone never works when you need it. One must delete it and reinstall it so it will work.  I've complained to Support 3 times and they've done nothing to fix the problem.

title: New updates are awful
body: When I log in I get pop up after pop up reminding me to use my savings at various stores and you can't make them stop. Also it takes forever to load now and you can't re-organize them. I used to change it to alphabetical then by expiration (can't do that now). I might delete the app and just use the website. It's easier to navigate.

title: La Mack
body: I love this app. So easy to use. I also enjoy that I can save money.

title: Update
body: Love this app!! I have saved so much money!!! However..... The update is awful!! I have to sign in every time I open the app that's hard when I am planning my trips for shopping and I am trying to go back and forth to make sure I have all my deals!! Please fix this!!!! It's enough to make me want to delete this app!!!!

title: Update crashes app!!!
body: I've used this app successfully for several months but after the update a couple of days ago the app will not stay open. Quite frustrating!

title: Submit a receipt does not work
body: I have used Savingstar since its inception. I've saved a lot with the coupons I add to my loyalty cards. I was excited that this update was going to allow me to submit receipts to stores without cards. However it isn't worth your time! Every receipt I've tried to submit crashes the app multiple times. When I am actually successful the purchase isn't credited to my account. Please fix this!

title: Great Update
body: I have saved a lot of money with SavingStar in the past and this new update helps me save even more! Now I can save money at Walgreens Target and Walmart just by submitting my receipt - it’s great!

title: Crashes and doesn't scan
body: After spending 15 frustrating minutes trying to scan my UPCs I just gave up. I'll give the developers one month to update the app. After that I'm walking away.

title: Crashes!! Please fix..
body: I just recently started using your app & I have to say it's been nothing but frustrating. It frequently crashes while I'm taking a picture of my receipt which means I have to start all over. I've also gotten more than 1 email telling me my receipt couldn't be rewarded when I know I submitted it correctly & all the offers were on the receipt. After resubmitting it as suggested I still get an email. Not worth the time other similar apps are so much more user friendly & rewards are given much quicker.

title: Bad update
body: That last update is horrible! I click a button and it takes 20 seconds for a page to load. Then all of a sudden it loads one page after another (all the buttons I pressed trying to get it to work).  The layout is also quite confusing. Not sure why they needed to change so many things around. I hope they revert back to the previous layout... when everything actually worked. ????

title: Disappointed
body: Put app on my phone . When I put notification of my location on my phone to be alerted when I'm near a store  the site disappeared. Savingstar icon still on my phone but I can't open it up. When I try site appears for a second then disappears. What's that all about? So SS not on my phone. What use us that when I'm shopping? Nonsense!

title: No longer functional
body: Since the last upgrade the page layout has become confusing and visually unappealing. Also I'm constantly required to log in. Since today's upgrade it crashes.

title: Love it!
body: This is soooo much easier than paper coupons! *BUT* there was an upgrade done July 2014 that has really downgraded my opinion of Saving Star. Previously the app was refreshed on my iphone with new offers & acct balance. Now I have to log out & log back in each time I go to the store. I wish they would add a refresh button to their app.  I shop exclusively at City Market which is slow at redemptions...seems like it takes about 2 weeks for funds to be deposited into my acct.

title: Update
body: Updated app won't open. I missed the Friday freebie!

title: Upgrade not working !!
body: I love this app also but new upgrade on july 10 is not working. I'm confident saving star will fix this shortly in a few days. They added Walgreens target and others so it a big upgrade. Most stores get the money in your account within a day but Kroger could take close to 30 days. I will be anxious to see how this app will work with Walmart when they fix the bug since Walmart does not have a rewards card. The app continues to improve in the last 3 years. I hope they stick around for years to come. I save about $100 a year on top of using paper coupons with this app and there save $5 off $20 type offers are awesome. Keep up the great work saving star. My family loves you!!!

title: Horrible update
body: I used to love this app not any more. Just cashed out so I can uninstall. I used this on a regular basis until this new update now I guess there are limits on how many activations per rebate. Plus I can only use it at 2 stores in my area. I am saving more with Ibotta and Checkout51. If they would go back to the old version and add more stores I would use it.

title: Hate new look
body: Not user friendly like before. Ought to be changed back.

title: Bad update
body: I used to love this app but the update was a bad step for saving star. It's very hard to tell which offers are current - the expired offers should disappear automatically. I miss the old version.

title: Great program - needs some bugs fixed in new version
body: I love the look and function of the redesigned versions - BUT there is no way to get or automatically remove expired offers from the list - very frustrating to purchase a product that the offer has expired for!!!!!

title: How do I go back to the old version?
body: How can I get back to the previous version?  The newest update is awful!

title: Fix new version
body: The design of it looks great but it won't allow me to log in since the new update. Works fine from the desktop. PLEASE FIX

body: This is my new review:  I HATE THE CHANGES TO THE MOBILE APP. It's inconvenient keeps crashing is difficult to navigate. I just absolutely hate it. Go back to something closer to the old one. PLEASE. I still use it on the computer but now I don't enjoy the convenience of using it from my iPhone because I hate the app changes so much. Sorry.    Old review from before the changes:   I love love love this ap! I've been using saving star for a year now and I can't get enough. Over the past year I've saved almost $20 on stuff Id be buying anyway that I can never find other coupons for. The app is great never any problems and extremely convenient!  5 stars!

title: Easy to use but could use a tweak or two

The only improvement I'd like to see is a way to purge expired offers from your list or sort somehow between clipped offers redeemed offers and expired offers. I choose a lot of offers but don't always get to redeem them in time so checking my account becomes a hassle to view which offers actually credited.

title: Bad app! Bought qualifying items no credits received
body: I thought this app was going to be great. I activated some of the coupons and linked my kroger card to the app. Shopped at kroger and purchased items that would give me a total of $7.40 on saving star. Waited the 30 days to see the money in my account and it never showed up. I contacted saving star to get an I'm sorry but we don't have any info for the purchases on your card. They varieties my card number and still said sorry. So upset!!! Beware of the scheme

Personally I feel this app was created strictly to get your email address and sell it off. Again just my personal opinion.

title: Needs update

title: Worked Great and then it stopped
body: This app was a great way to save while grocery shopping and it worked great. Suddenly though my purchases stopped being counted. When I reported it I was told that I needed to produce a receipt for credit. Since the app was so easy to work I had purchases that were made over an extended period of time. I had no clue which ones were tied to the app. If something becomes too confusing to use consumers will stop using it. Hence I no longer use this app.

title: ONE OF THE BEST APPS I HAVE EVER USED!!
body: I love this App! This really couldn't be any easier to use - you just register your shopping loyalty cards with SS (I registered five myself) then select only the Coupon Offerings from their assortment that you like/want. From there you only have to remember to purchase your selected items BEFORE the coupons expire and make sure to scan your card at checkout. Once you have completed these three simple steps of selecting purchasing and scanning you will then see the savings amount deposited into (or towards) whatever your election was at registration - within seven days.  I gave this App five stars because of it's incredible usefulness - and the fact that it does just what it states it will do i.e. credit you for your purchases and deposit that money right into your Bank Account or towards whatever you elected. So far I have managed to save almost $20.00 through SS and they have always deposited the coupon savings money into my elected Savings Account within seven days of purchase.  I also wanted to add that the coupon selections SS offers are pretty good. In fact most of the items that they offer coupons for would have already existed on almost anyone's average shopping list i.e. tin foil yogurt paper towels toilet paper cereal candy snacks toiletries household cleaning items etc... etc... Yes - there are some occasional clunkers that SS might offer (I really could do without the magazine subscription offerings!) but overall I have been more than pleased with the Savings Star Coupon Program and it's results!

title: Improvements needed but it works.
body: It does work. My suggestions for improvement are the following: 1) Allow user to deactivate coupons once activated or after it's used so that it no longer appears; 2) add more coupons on a more regular basis as users have to wait nearly a month sometimes to see new coupons; 3) expand the variety of coupons as many of them I would never use. It can take months to build up enough savings to qualify for a payout if you rarely use the coupons offered.

I have found many of the coupons are for things that I don't buy and some of them sell out before they expire. I have received the money in my account without delay. The site states that it takes up to a month for the stores to update their systems for coupons to show up. Some of the reviewers have commented about this but you can't blame that on this app. It's the stores that are slow. I have saved $7.40 over the past two months and I love this app!!!

The help desk is useless they said reboot my iPhone update my app(3.0.2) and also suggested calling PG&E(why it's your app).

body: I've been using your app for a long time now but I notice an error popping out every time I tried to pay my bill. This has been happening for a week now and I still haven't been able to pay my bill need help!!!

title: Convenient but no warning before extra fee
body: I like how easy it is to pay my bill but I'd like to know beforehand that I'm going to be charged an additional fee for using the app not after I've submitted my payment. I won't be using this again because I'm not notified or given the option to cancel my payment if I don't want to pay the extra fee.

title: My payment won't submit since last update
body: Please fix so I don't have to go into the office...wherever that is ????

title: Split amount being paid
body: This new update for app does not let you edit amount being paid. Please fix issue. For example if you want to pay bill within 2 different people (2 different cards).

title: $1.25 transaction fee? Really??
body: Easy to navigate the app and Touch ID is about the only cool thing this app has. Cmon Pge you supposed to make things more convenient for YOUR customers to pay you your money for the services but not to try to rob us with that $1.25 service fee to pay through the app.

title: Forces me to portrait position.
body: Forces me to portrait position. Until signature page then I have to turn to landscape. Lost my history and it won't process my payment. The old version worked just fine. Don't see any improvements even if it starts working.

title: Fix deduction on app
body: I really like the new look for the app a lot. It's very convenient but when you make a payment it doesn't deduct from the previous amount that's posted. Please can someone fix it. But over all it's a great app.

title: Update should be reversed
body: App worked GREAT.  I have used it for months.  But with this update my payment method disappeared and it won't let me put it back in.  I also agree that it is not as enjoyable to look at.     I liked the old app.   Now I need to find a new way to pay this bill.  :(

title: Great update!
body: Love the simple look and feel. Touch ID support is amazing!

title: What good is the app?
body: I have several apps where I make payments and this is the only one that charges a fee. $1.25 really? Even a postage stamp is cheaper. I have found no other use for the app other than to make a payment. I can't view my bill only the amount due. And it doesn't even show a due date. I really don't care about my usage from a year and a half ago. I'll keep mailing my payment and keep my paper bill. At least I can see what the exorbitant charges are for. I'll rate it a 2 only because it actually does let you make a payment.

title: Bring back the old app
body: It keeps crashing! Don't change what ain't broken

title: Transaction fees?!
body: $1.25 transaction fee to pay your bill with the app?  Absurd. Thanks but no thanks.

title: Plain & boring
body: The new update is horrible. App should have been left alone. It's so plain with no color or graphics. One of the worst updates I've seen on an app. I'm not sure who had this brilliant idea to change and who designed this app but they should be fired...seriously...

title: Not happy
body: Horrible app. Never has the correct payment amount. Doesn't show statements. Can't even get anything done.

title: Awesome App!
body: Super easy to pay my bill no hassle.

title: Works great!
body: Love how easy it is to pay my pg&e bill. Easy Peasy! Get this app!

title: 1 Star
body: They shouldn't charge a fee for paying with C.C.

title: App Payment
body: Don't understand why I am paying a transaction fee for paying on the app when I don't when I use my lap top??? seems incredible ridiculous!

title: I WISH
body: Wish I could view the whole bill on here and also see payment arrangements!

title: It's okay
body: This app is okay. I think it's absolutely ridiculous that I'm charged a fee every single time to pay a bill. Also to there's no way to future payments which is a real disappointment because sometimes I want to future my payments out. This would make it a lot easier so wrong to keep going into the app every time I want to make a payment to be nice to build a schedule to three payments out. Also the fact that you can't see your bills is a huge disappointment. If somebody's excepting a payment from you than you should have the ability of seeing your bill

title: Simple way to pay part or all of your bill
body: No wait on phone. No buttons to beep. If you want to view your bill this is not the place. Just pays your bill fast and it shows up ASAP if you're on a 7 day 48 or 24 hour alert. No looking for a pay station

title: Great Easy App
body: Love it! Makes my life so easy!

title: Perfect
body: FINALLY AN EASY WAY TO PAY BILLS!!

title: Deceptive use of utility info
body: This is not owned or managed by PG&E.  Your actually providing your account info to a third party.  You get no statement info or usage info.  However the app uses PG&E's logo. The website link sends you to PG&E not their own app company website.  It's enough to show they're deceptive.

title: Horrible
body: Horrible App and they charge you to pay your bill. You can just go online directly to PG&E and pay there for no charge.

title: Ok
body: Nice to have but with it showed you month by month bills without the payment arrangements

title: Don't use to make your payments!
body: I'm warning you all now!  I have used this app for a lot of payments.  UNTIL TODAY when my POWER WAS SHUT OFF!    I honestly thought I was calling in for a power outage reporting!  When I was hooked up to the non payment line I thought there's no way!   After making my payment over the phone I was then told I had to make a $700.00 deposit because my power was turned off!   I got a supervisor on the line who only wanted to give me the script to tell customers that don't like hearing they have to now pay $700.  When I told him to save his speech because my issue is they can't do this to people.  I told him they have to fix this issue!  You can't let your app give people a confirmation page and then oh well it's your problem them when the payment them drops into the abyss!   I am deleting this app now and will NEVER TRUST AGAIN!

title: Easy to use
body: Took only a minute to set-up. Hopefully it continues to work well

title: Worthless
body: I downloaded this app a long time before my bank accessed ebills for automatic payment. I quickly found out that you have to pay a fee to pay your bill so I never used it.  I didn't delete the app because I thought they would build a better app that actually gives you a bill breakdown.  Guess the third party app doesn't have that capability probably for security reasons. Time to delete it.

title: Works for payment but that's it
body: I love that I can pay my bill from my home. That really is wonderful. The app does not allow you to see your bill and check your usage at all. This would be a great feature to add. Also adding a feature to change your banking information as well would be helpful as well as being able to change the information on the bill. Such as the name you have assigned to the account number. I have noticed you can not see multiple bills on this app either. If you have multiple address on a pge account the app only show the total due or paid.

title: PG&E; bill pay app.
body: Nice to be able to pay away from desktop don't care for the $1.35 fee to pay with this app!

title: Interface
body: Super easy to use and navigate. Couldn't have asked for a more professional app.

title: Quick and easy peasy
body: Bill pay is great. No driving to a pge bill pay center and no waiting on a phone call. Love technology! Just wish I had found this app sooner!

title: Horrible
body: Charges a fee for paying that isn't charged if I just go online to pay.

title: Convenient!
body: Stupid easy to use. A little frustrated that I didn't start using it sooner. I don't need to review my bill. I'm holding it in my hand. Got it from my mailbox. I just need to get it paid. And I don't care about a $1.25 fee. I'd pay that for everything to be this easy.

title: Great app
body: Quick and easy to pay bill from anywhere.

title: Convienent
body: I find the app really convenient by being able to pay my bill but I don't like that I can't view my bill and usage charges.

title: Simplicity
body: Easy to use. Just wish the convenience fee would go away.

title: Great app
body: I never knew there was an app for PG&E is easy and convenient. But anyways you know what they say there's an app for that. Lol keep up the great work . Btw I'm a first time user . Lol

title: I love it
body: This is a good app is easy simple gets things done so I recommend this app

title: Awesome and fast!!!!
body: I've been using this app for five years... Fast and EASY!

title: No statement history
body: This app is awful. I can see what I owe but no precious payment history or breakdown. Simplified to a horrible fault. Why have an app at all if it's this stripped down?!

title: Legit
body: Paid most recent bill without any problems. Added my C.Bill information confirmed it with a signature and that's that. Pretty straightforward.

title: Bank charge????
body: This app was ok up until I had to pay a fee in order to pay my bill. Really?? Don't you make enough off of me? So basically it's cheaper to kill trees to pay my bill? Not happy.

title: It's ok ...Convenient but there's a fee
body: There's $1.25 for convenience fee... If you can go to their website instead no fee... If you're broke and late  use this ????

title: Good app for paying bill
body: Makes it very easy to pay your bill.

title: It gets the job done..
body: While the app gets the job done it's kinda annoying that after a bill is paid and you check up on your bill latter to see if a bill posted it posts the same bill you just paid in addition if your pass due and may have a higher balance or lower balance the info given isn't accurate. I'm not one for paying more money just to pay a bill but I'll pay for convenience. So if this could get fixed the fee would continue to be justified

title: Love it!
body: Easy to use- love it!

title: There is a transaction fee!!?
body: Very disappointed so there is a transaction fee for using PG&E APP?? instead of a discount? What is this? Plus it doesn't tell you that you get charged you just see it at the end after it had processed your payment. Shame on you PG&E THIS IS A VERY CHEAP WAY TO CHEAT PEOPLE  very upset all the other companies and services offer you discounts to download and use their app and what does PG&E DO?? They cheat and charge you without telling you before hand a transaction fee.

title: Expecting more out of a fee.
body: One-time-99-cents apps do better than this. I pay for this 25% more recurrently (every time I use it) to get an "Ok" service. I mean the thing clearly hasn't been updated for ages. Is just lame and it's not moronic but mediocre not to speak it out.

title: Easiest Bill Pay App EVER!!
body: Its super easy to use! No hassles! Set up was easy and bill pay was fast! I love it!

title: Needs more...
body: The app shows me when my automatic payments go through but it needs a feature to let you view your previous PDF statements edit account info have a profile show you your past transactions...basically everything you'd expect from an app...I give it one  star because it does tell me when my bill is paid and it successfully processes my automatic payment each month on time.

title: PG&E
body: I love the simplicity of this app!!

title: Pg&e App
body: Love this app. Very convenient

title: I wish all bills were this easy to pay!!!
body: Best way to pay a bill! Can we get the rest of the world onboard?

title: Works Great!
body: Does what its supposed to and easy to use!!

title: Great app
body: Finally don't have to talk to an automated service anymore.

title: Terrible App
body: It doesn't even give my correct bill info.

title: It works but it's disappointing
body: The app does let you make payments but I liked the older one much better. You could see the bill and history. I get that it's a mobile app but other mobile apps let you see your account activity and payment history based on the account not just the app's history.

title: Could be better
body: Easy to pay your bill however it does not show a past balance nor any bills pay history (past the most recent receipt) etc. it would be better to have the ability to view statements or see messages such as the mail stuffers received if I enrolled in paper statements.  We need a functional PG&E app.  Super easy to make a payment though! ????

title: I love this app
body: I tried paying my bill using the automated line but it wouldn't take my card. It was odd because it didn't ask for them expiration date or pin on the back.   It then referred me to a live voice.  James said it appeared to be a system malfunction.  So he tried it he said there seemed to be something wrong with the card  I opened my pg&e app and used a checking account instead and all is right with the world!

title: This app is so easy
body: Makes paying my bill literally just a few clicks of a button. From mom of six I don't have time to be trying to manage full site accounts. This app allows me to sign in type in my code Press pay bill and confirm... that's it!! it's awesome

title: Wasted Space
body: This app is a waste of time effort and space on your phone.

title: Awesome
body: I hate the bill but love the simplicity of paying :-)

title: So easy
body: I didn't have my account number but easily found my account and paid my bill in just a minute.

title: Perfect
body: Awesome works great

title: Easiest App
body: Quick and easy to use ????????????

title: Simple
body: I wish all payment methods are done this way!!!!!! So simple!!!!  Excellent job PG&E!!!  Can you please tell others to follow your lead?  Thanks.

title: Covenience
body: The app is convenient to only pay your bill which is all I want it for. It does its job as an app. Thanks

title: Great and easy
body: Safe and a headache relief

title: Nuttin
body: Worthless!! Does PG&E know about this bogus site? Want info re: your usage and separating gas from electric? Go to the real site.  Fine a bit of convenience use this and spend $1.25 than needed. Thanks ya'll
